44 static KEYWORD formatoptions[] = {
45  {"allfloat", (TFUN)0, ALLINTEGERDOUBLE, 0}
46  ,{"c", (TFUN)0, CMODE, 0}
47  ,{"doublefortran", (TFUN)0, DOUBLEFORTRANMODE, 0}
48  ,{"float", (TFUN)0, 0, 2}
49 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
50  ,{"floatprecision", (TFUN)0, 0, 5}
51 #endif
52  ,{"fortran", (TFUN)0, FORTRANMODE, 0}
53  ,{"fortran90", (TFUN)0, FORTRANMODE, 4}
54  ,{"maple", (TFUN)0, MAPLEMODE, 0}
55  ,{"mathematica", (TFUN)0, MATHEMATICAMODE, 0}
56  ,{"normal", (TFUN)0, NORMALFORMAT, 1}
57  ,{"nospaces", (TFUN)0, NOSPACEFORMAT, 3}
58  ,{"pfortran", (TFUN)0, PFORTRANMODE, 0}
59  ,{"quadfortran", (TFUN)0, QUADRUPLEFORTRANMODE, 0}
60  ,{"quadruplefortran", (TFUN)0, QUADRUPLEFORTRANMODE, 0}
61  ,{"rational", (TFUN)0, RATIONALMODE, 1}
62  ,{"reduce", (TFUN)0, REDUCEMODE, 0}
63  ,{"spaces", (TFUN)0, NORMALFORMAT, 3}
64  ,{"vortran", (TFUN)0, VORTRANMODE, 0}
65 };

68  {"contract", (TFUN)0, CHISHOLM, 0 }

73  ,{"trick", (TFUN)0, 0, NOTRICK }

77  {"nosymmetrize",(TFUN)0, 0, ALSOREVERSE}
78  ,{"symmetrize", (TFUN)0, ALSOREVERSE, 0 }

81 static KEYWORDV writeoptions[] = {
82  {"stats", &(AC.StatsFlag), 1, 0}
83  ,{"statistics", &(AC.StatsFlag), 1, 0}

90  ,{"allnames", &(AC.NamesFlag), 2, 0}
91  ,{"codes", &(AC.CodesFlag), 1, 0}
92  ,{"highfirst", &(AC.SortType), SORTHIGHFIRST, SORTLOWFIRST}

94  ,{"powerfirst", &(AC.SortType), SORTPOWERFIRST, SORTHIGHFIRST}
95  ,{"tokens", &(AC.TokensWriteFlag),1, 0}

98 static KEYWORDV onoffoptions[] = {
99  {"compress", &(AC.NoCompress), 0, 1}
100  ,{"checkpoint", &(AC.CheckpointFlag), 1, 0}
101  ,{"insidefirst", &(AC.insidefirst), 1, 0}
102  ,{"propercount", &(AC.BottomLevel), 1, 0}
103  ,{"stats", &(AC.StatsFlag), 1, 0}

129  ,{"indentspace", &(AO.IndentSpace),INDENTSPACE,0}
130  ,{"totalsize", &(AM.PrintTotalSize), 1, 0}
131  ,{"flag", (int *)&(AC.debugFlags), 1, 0}
132  ,{"oldfactarg", &(AC.OldFactArgFlag), 1, 0}
133  ,{"memdebugflag", &(AC.MemDebugFlag), 1, 0}
134  ,{"oldgcd", &(AC.OldGCDflag), 1, 0}

139 static WORD one = 1;
140 
141 /*
142  #] includes :
143  #[ CoFormat :
144 */
145 
146 int CoFormat(UBYTE *s)
147 {
148  int error = 0, x;
149  KEYWORD *key;
150  UBYTE *ss;
151  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' ) s++;
152  if ( *s == 0 ) {
153  AC.OutputMode = 72;
154  AC.OutputSpaces = NORMALFORMAT;
155  return(error);
156  }
157 /*
158  First the optimization level
159 */
160  if ( *s == 'O' || *s == 'o' ) {
161  if ( ( FG.cTable[s[1]] == 1 ) ||
162  ( s[1] == '=' && FG.cTable[s[2]] == 1 ) ) {
163  s++; if ( *s == '=' ) s++;
164  x = 0;
165  while ( *s >= '0' && *s <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *s++ - '0';
166  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
167  AO.OptimizationLevel = x;
168  AO.Optimize.greedytimelimit = 0;
169  AO.Optimize.mctstimelimit = 0;
170  AO.Optimize.printstats = 0;
171  AO.Optimize.debugflags = 0;
172  AO.Optimize.schemeflags = 0;
173  AO.Optimize.mctsdecaymode = 1; /* default is decreasing C_p with iteration number */
174  if ( AO.inscheme ) {
175  M_free(AO.inscheme,"Horner input scheme");
176  AO.inscheme = 0; AO.schemenum = 0;
177  }
178  switch ( x ) {
179  case 0:
180  break;
181  case 1:
182  AO.Optimize.mctsconstant.fval = -1.0;
183  AO.Optimize.horner = O_OCCURRENCE;
184  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_FORWARDORBACKWARD;
185  AO.Optimize.method = O_CSE;
186  break;
187  case 2:
188  AO.Optimize.horner = O_OCCURRENCE;
189  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_FORWARDORBACKWARD;
190  AO.Optimize.method = O_GREEDY;
191  AO.Optimize.greedyminnum = 10;
192  AO.Optimize.greedymaxperc = 5;
193  break;
194  case 3:
195  AO.Optimize.mctsconstant.fval = 1.0;
196  AO.Optimize.horner = O_MCTS;
197  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_FORWARDORBACKWARD;
198  AO.Optimize.method = O_GREEDY;
199  AO.Optimize.mctsnumexpand = 1000;
200  AO.Optimize.mctsnumkeep = 10;
201  AO.Optimize.mctsnumrepeat = 1;
202  AO.Optimize.greedyminnum = 10;
203  AO.Optimize.greedymaxperc = 5;
204  break;
205  case 4:
206  AO.Optimize.horner = O_SIMULATED_ANNEALING;
207  AO.Optimize.saIter = 1000;
208  AO.Optimize.saMaxT.fval = 2000;
209  AO.Optimize.saMinT.fval = 1;
210  break;
211  default:
212  error = 1;
213  MesPrint("&Illegal optimization specification in format statement");
214  break;
215  }
216  if ( error == 0 && *s != 0 && x > 0 ) return(CoOptimizeOption(s));
217  return(error);
218  }
219 #ifdef EXPOPT
220  { UBYTE c;
221  ss = s;
222  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
223  c = *s; *s = 0;
224  if ( StrICont(ss,(UBYTE *)"optimize") == 0 ) {
225  *s = c;
226  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
227  if ( *s == '=' ) s++;
228  AO.OptimizationLevel = 3;
229  AO.Optimize.mctsconstant.fval = 1.0;
230  AO.Optimize.horner = O_MCTS;
231  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_FORWARDORBACKWARD;
232  AO.Optimize.method = O_GREEDY;
233  AO.Optimize.mctstimelimit = 0;
234  AO.Optimize.mctsnumexpand = 1000;
235  AO.Optimize.mctsnumkeep = 10;
236  AO.Optimize.mctsnumrepeat = 1;
237  AO.Optimize.greedytimelimit = 0;
238  AO.Optimize.greedyminnum = 10;
239  AO.Optimize.greedymaxperc = 5;
240  AO.Optimize.printstats = 0;
241  AO.Optimize.debugflags = 0;
242  AO.Optimize.schemeflags = 0;
243  AO.Optimize.mctsdecaymode = 1;
244  if ( AO.inscheme ) {
245  M_free(AO.inscheme,"Horner input scheme");
246  AO.inscheme = 0; AO.schemenum = 0;
247  }
248  return(CoOptimizeOption(s));
249  }
250  else {
251  error = 1;
252  MesPrint("&Illegal optimization specification in format statement");
253  return(error);
254  }
255  }
256 #endif
257  }
258  else if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
259  x = 0;
260  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) x = 10*x + *s++ - '0';
261  if ( x <= 0 || x >= MAXLINELENGTH ) {
262  error = 1;
263  MesPrint("&Illegal value for linesize: %d",x);
264  x = 72;
265  }
266  if ( x < 39 ) {
267  MesPrint(" ... Too small value for linesize corrected to 39");
268  x = 39;
269  }
270  AO.DoubleFlag = 0;
271 /*
272  The next line resets the mode to normal. Because the special modes
273  reset the line length we have a little problem with the special modes
274  and customized line length. We try to improve by removing the next line
275 */
276 /* AC.OutputMode = 0; */
277  AC.LineLength = x;
278  if ( *s != 0 ) {
279  error = 1;
280  MesPrint("&Illegal linesize field in format statement");
281  }
282  }
283  else {
284  key = FindKeyWord(s,formatoptions,
285  sizeof(formatoptions)/sizeof(KEYWORD));
286  if ( key ) {
287  if ( key->type == FORTRANMODE || key->type == PFORTRANMODE || key->type == DOUBLEFORTRANMODE
288  || key->type == QUADRUPLEFORTRANMODE || key->type == VORTRANMODE ) {
289  if (AC.LineLength > 72) AC.LineLength = 72;
290  }
291  if ( key->flags == 0 ) {
292  if ( key->type == FORTRANMODE || key->type == PFORTRANMODE
293  || key->type == DOUBLEFORTRANMODE || key->type == ALLINTEGERDOUBLE
294  || key->type == QUADRUPLEFORTRANMODE || key->type == VORTRANMODE ) {
295  AC.IsFortran90 = ISNOTFORTRAN90;
296  if ( AC.Fortran90Kind ) {
297  M_free(AC.Fortran90Kind,"Fortran90 Kind");
298  AC.Fortran90Kind = 0;
299  }
300  }
301  if ( ( key->type == ALLINTEGERDOUBLE ) && AO.DoubleFlag != 0 ) {
302  AO.DoubleFlag |= 4;
303  }
304  else {
305  AO.DoubleFlag = 0;
306  AC.OutputMode = key->type & NODOUBLEMASK;
307  if ( ( key->type & DOUBLEPRECISIONFLAG ) != 0 ) {
308  AO.DoubleFlag = 1;
309  }
310  else if ( ( key->type & QUADRUPLEPRECISIONFLAG ) != 0 ) {
311  AO.DoubleFlag = 2;
312  }
313  }
314  }
315  else if ( key->flags == 1 ) {
316  AC.OutputMode = AC.OutNumberType = key->type;
317  }
318  else if ( key->flags == 2 ) {
319  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
320  if ( *s == 0 ) AC.OutNumberType = 10;
321  else if ( *s == ',' ) {
322  s++;
323  x = 0;
324  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) x = 10*x + *s++ - '0';
325  if ( *s != 0 ) {
326  error = 1;
327  MesPrint("&Illegal float format specifier");
328  }
329  else {
330  if ( x < 3 ) {
331  x = 3;
332  MesPrint("& ... float format value corrected to 3");
333  }
334  if ( x > 100 ) {
335  x = 100;
336  MesPrint("& ... float format value corrected to 100");
337  }
338  AC.OutNumberType = x;
339  }
340  }
341  }
342  else if ( key->flags == 3 ) {
343  AC.OutputSpaces = key->type;
344  }
345  else if ( key->flags == 4 ) {
346  AC.IsFortran90 = ISFORTRAN90;
347  if ( AC.Fortran90Kind ) {
348  M_free(AC.Fortran90Kind,"Fortran90 Kind");
349  AC.Fortran90Kind = 0;
350  }
351  while ( FG.cTable[*s] <= 1 ) s++;
352  if ( *s == ',' ) {
353  s++; ss = s;
354  while ( *ss && *ss != ',' ) ss++;
355  if ( *ss == ',' ) {
356  MesPrint("&No white space or comma's allowed in Fortran90 option: %s",s); error = 1;
357  }
358  else {
359  AC.Fortran90Kind = strDup1(s,"Fortran90 Kind");
360  }
361  }
362  AO.DoubleFlag = 0;
363  AC.OutputMode = key->type & NODOUBLEMASK;
364  }
365 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
366  else if ( key->flags == 5 ) {
367 /*
368  Syntax: Format FloatPrecision number;
369  Format FloatPrecision off;
370 */
371  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
372  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' || *s == ',' ) s++;
373  if ( *s == 0 ) {
374  AO.FloatPrec = 0;
375  }
376  else if ( tolower(*s) == 'o' && tolower(s[1]) == 'f'
377  && tolower(s[2]) == 'f' ) {
378  ss = s;
379  s += 3;
380  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' || *s == ',' ) s++;
381  if ( *s ) { s = ss; goto WrongOption; }
382  AO.FloatPrec = -1;
383  }
384  else if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
385  ss = s;
386  AO.FloatPrec = 0;
387  while ( *s <= '9' && *s >= '0' )
388  AO.FloatPrec = 10*AO.FloatPrec + (*s++ - '0');
389  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' || *s == ',' ) s++;
390  if ( *s ) { s = ss; goto WrongOption; }
391  }
392  else {
393 WrongOption: MesPrint("&Illegal option in Format FloatPrecision: %s",s);
394  error = 1;
395  }
396  }
397 #endif
398  }
399  else if ( ( *s == 'c' || *s == 'C' ) && ( FG.cTable[s[1]] == 1 ) ) {
400  UBYTE *ss = s+1;
401  WORD x = 0;
402  while ( *ss >= '0' && *ss <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *ss++ - '0';
403  if ( *ss != 0 ) goto Unknown;
404  AC.OutputMode = CMODE;
405  AC.Cnumpows = x;
406  }
407  else {
408 Unknown: MesPrint("&Unknown option: %s",s); error = 1;
409  }
410  AC.LineLength = 72;
411  }
412  return(error);
413 }
414 
415 /*
416  #] CoFormat :
417  #[ CoCollect :
418 
419  Collect,functionname
420 */
421 
422 int CoCollect(UBYTE *s)
423 {
424 /* --------------change 17-feb-2003 Added percentage */
425  WORD numfun;
426  int type,x = 0;
427  UBYTE *t = SkipAName(s), *t1, *t2;
428  AC.AltCollectFun = 0;
429  if ( t == 0 ) goto syntaxerror;
430  t1 = t; while ( *t1 == ',' || *t1 == ' ' || *t1 == '\t' ) t1++;
431  *t = 0; t = t1;
432  if ( *t1 && ( FG.cTable[*t1] == 0 || *t1 == '[' ) ) {
433  t2 = SkipAName(t1);
434  if ( t2 == 0 ) goto syntaxerror;
435  t = t2;
436  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
437  *t2 = 0;
438  }
439  else t1 = 0;
440  if ( *t && FG.cTable[*t] == 1 ) {
441  while ( *t >= '0' && *t <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *t++ - '0';
442  if ( x > 100 ) x = 100;
443  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
444  if ( *t ) goto syntaxerror;
445  }
446  else {
447  if ( *t ) goto syntaxerror;
448  x = 100;
449  }
450  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
451  || ( functions[numfun].spec != 0 ) ) {
452  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular function",s);
453  if ( type < 0 ) {
454  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&numfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
455  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
456  }
457  return(1);
458  }
459  AC.CollectFun = numfun+FUNCTION;
460  AC.CollectPercentage = (WORD)x;
461  if ( t1 ) {
462  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,t1,&numfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
463  || ( functions[numfun].spec != 0 ) ) {
464  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular function",t1);
465  if ( type < 0 ) {
466  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,t1,&numfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
467  AddFunction(t1,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
468  }
469  return(1);
470  }
471  AC.AltCollectFun = numfun+FUNCTION;
472  }
473  return(0);
474 syntaxerror:
475  MesPrint("&Collect statement needs one or two functions (and a percentage) for its argument(s)");
476  return(1);
477 }
478 
479 /*
480  #] CoCollect :
481  #[ setonoff :
482 */
483 
484 int setonoff(UBYTE *s, int *flag, int onvalue, int offvalue)
485 {
486  if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"on") == 0 ) *flag = onvalue;
487  else if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"off") == 0 ) *flag = offvalue;
488  else {
489  MesPrint("&Unknown option: %s, on or off expected",s);
490  return(1);
491  }
492  return(0);
493 }
494 
495 /*
496  #] setonoff :
497  #[ CoCompress :
498 */
499 
500 int CoCompress(UBYTE *s)
501 {
502  GETIDENTITY
503  UBYTE *t, c;
504  if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"on") == 0 ) {
505  AC.NoCompress = 0;
506  AR.gzipCompress = 0;
507  }
508  else if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"off") == 0 ) {
509  AC.NoCompress = 1;
510  AR.gzipCompress = 0;
511  }
512  else {
513  t = s; while ( FG.cTable[*t] <= 1 ) t++;
514  c = *t; *t = 0;
515  if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"gzip") == 0 ) {
516 #ifndef WITHZLIB
517  Warning("gzip compression not supported on this platform");
518 #endif
519  s = t; *s = c;
520  if ( *s == 0 ) {
521  AR.gzipCompress = GZIPDEFAULT; /* Normally should be 6 */
522  return(0);
523  }
524  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
525  t = s;
526  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
527  AR.gzipCompress = *s - '0';
528  s++;
529  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
530  if ( *s == 0 ) return(0);
531  }
532  MesPrint("&Unknown gzip option: %s, a digit was expected",t);
533  return(1);
534 
535  }
536  else {
537  MesPrint("&Unknown option: %s, on, off or gzip expected",s);
538  return(1);
539  }
540  }
541  return(0);
542 }
543 
544 /*
545  #] CoCompress :
546  #[ CoFlags :
547 */
548 
549 int CoFlags(UBYTE *s,int value)
550 {
551  int i, error = 0;
552  if ( *s != ',' ) {
553  MesPrint("&Proper syntax is: On/Off Flag,number[s];");
554  error = 1;
555  }
556  while ( *s == ',' ) {
557  do { s++; } while ( *s == ',' );
558  i = 0;
559  if ( FG.cTable[*s] != 1 ) {
560  MesPrint("&Proper syntax is: On/Off Flag,number[s];");
561  error = 1;
562  break;
563  }
564  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) { i = 10*i + *s++ - '0'; }
565  if ( i <= 0 || i > MAXFLAGS ) {
566  MesPrint("&The number of a flag in On/Off Flag should be in the range 0-%d",(int)MAXFLAGS);
567  error = 1;
568  break;
569  }
570  AC.debugFlags[i] = value;
571  }
572  if ( *s ) {
573  MesPrint("&Proper syntax is: On/Off Flag,number[s];");
574  error = 1;
575  }
576  return(error);
577 }
578 
579 /*
580  #] CoFlags :
581  #[ CoOff :
582 */
583 
584 int CoOff(UBYTE *s)
585 {
586  GETIDENTITY
587  UBYTE *t, c;
588  int i, num = sizeof(onoffoptions)/sizeof(KEYWORD);
589  for (;;) {
590  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
591  if ( *s == 0 ) return(0);
592  if ( chartype[*s] != 0 ) {
593  MesPrint("&Illegal character or option encountered in OFF statement");
594  return(-1);
595  }
596  t = s; while ( chartype[*s] == 0 ) s++;
597  c = *s; *s = 0;
598  for ( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
599  if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)(onoffoptions[i].name)) == 0 ) break;
600  }
601  if ( i >= num ) {
602  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in OFF statement: %s",t);
603  *s = c; return(-1);
604  }
605  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"compress") == 0 ) {
606  AR.gzipCompress = 0;
607  }
608  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"checkpoint") == 0 ) {
609  AC.CheckpointInterval = 0;
610  if ( AC.CheckpointRunBefore ) { free(AC.CheckpointRunBefore); AC.CheckpointRunBefore = NULL; }
611  if ( AC.CheckpointRunAfter ) { free(AC.CheckpointRunAfter); AC.CheckpointRunAfter = NULL; }
612  if ( AC.NoShowInput == 0 ) MesPrint("Checkpoints deactivated.");
613  }
614  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"threads") == 0 ) {
615  AS.MultiThreaded = 0;
616  }
617  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"flag") == 0 ) {
618  *s = c;
619  return(CoFlags(s,0));
620  }
621  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"innertest") == 0 ) {
622  *s = c;
623  AC.InnerTest = 0;
624  if ( AC.TestValue ) {
625  M_free(AC.TestValue,"InnerTest");
626  AC.TestValue = 0;
627  }
628  }
629  *s = c;
630  *onoffoptions[i].var = onoffoptions[i].flags;
631  AR.SortType = AC.SortType;
632  AC.mparallelflag = AC.parallelflag | AM.hparallelflag;
633  }
634 }
635 
636 /*
637  #] CoOff :
638  #[ CoOn :
639 */
640 
641 int CoOn(UBYTE *s)
642 {
643  GETIDENTITY
644  UBYTE *t, c;
645  int i, num = sizeof(onoffoptions)/sizeof(KEYWORD);
646  LONG interval;
647  for (;;) {
648  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
649  if ( *s == 0 ) return(0);
650  if ( chartype[*s] != 0 ) {
651  MesPrint("&Illegal character or option encountered in ON statement");
652  return(-1);
653  }
654  t = s; while ( chartype[*s] == 0 ) s++;
655  c = *s; *s = 0;
656  for ( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
657  if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)(onoffoptions[i].name)) == 0 ) break;
658  }
659  if ( i >= num ) {
660  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON statement: %s",t);
661  *s = c; return(-1);
662  }
663  if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"compress") == 0 ) {
664  AR.gzipCompress = 0;
665  *s = c;
666  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
667  if ( *s ) {
668  t = s;
669  while ( FG.cTable[*s] <= 1 ) s++;
670  c = *s; *s = 0;
671  if ( StrICmp(t,(UBYTE *)"gzip") == 0 ) {}
672  else {
673  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON compress statement: %s",t);
674  return(-1);
675  }
676  *s = c;
677  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
678 #ifndef WITHZLIB
679  Warning("gzip compression not supported on this platform");
680 #endif
681  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
682  AR.gzipCompress = *s++ - '0';
683  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
684  if ( *s ) {
685  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON compress gzip statement: %s",t);
686  return(-1);
687  }
688  }
689  else if ( *s == 0 ) {
690  AR.gzipCompress = GZIPDEFAULT;
691  }
692  else {
693  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON compress gzip statement: %s, single digit expected",t);
694  return(-1);
695  }
696  }
697  }
698  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"checkpoint") == 0 ) {
699  AC.CheckpointInterval = 0;
700  if ( AC.CheckpointRunBefore ) { free(AC.CheckpointRunBefore); AC.CheckpointRunBefore = NULL; }
701  if ( AC.CheckpointRunAfter ) { free(AC.CheckpointRunAfter); AC.CheckpointRunAfter = NULL; }
702  *s = c;
703  while ( *s ) {
704  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
705  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
706  interval = 0;
707  t = s;
708  do { interval = 10*interval + *s++ - '0'; } while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 );
709  if ( *s == 's' || *s == 'S' ) {
710  s++;
711  }
712  else if ( *s == 'm' || *s == 'M' ) {
713  interval *= 60; s++;
714  }
715  else if ( *s == 'h' || *s == 'H' ) {
716  interval *= 3600; s++;
717  }
718  else if ( *s == 'd' || *s == 'D' ) {
719  interval *= 86400; s++;
720  }
721  if ( *s != ',' && FG.cTable[*s] != 6 && FG.cTable[*s] != 10 ) {
722  MesPrint("&Unrecognized time interval in ON Checkpoint statement: %s", t);
723  return(-1);
724  }
725  AC.CheckpointInterval = interval * 100; /* in 1/100 of seconds */
726  }
727  else if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) {
728  int type;
729  t = s;
730  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
731  c = *s; *s = 0;
732  if ( StrICmp(t,(UBYTE *)"run") == 0 ) {
733  type = 3;
734  }
735  else if ( StrICmp(t,(UBYTE *)"runafter") == 0 ) {
736  type = 2;
737  }
738  else if ( StrICmp(t,(UBYTE *)"runbefore") == 0 ) {
739  type = 1;
740  }
741  else {
742  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON Checkpoint statement: %s", t);
743  *s = c; return(-1);
744  }
745  *s = c;
746  if ( *s != '=' && FG.cTable[*(s+1)] != 9 ) {
747  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON Checkpoint statement: %s", t);
748  return(-1);
749  }
750  ++s;
751  t = ++s;
752  while ( *s ) {
753  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 9 ) {
754  c = *s; *s = 0;
755  if ( type & 1 ) {
756  if ( AC.CheckpointRunBefore ) {
757  free(AC.CheckpointRunBefore); AC.CheckpointRunBefore = NULL;
758  }
759  if ( s-t > 0 ) {
760  AC.CheckpointRunBefore = Malloc1(s-t+1, "AC.CheckpointRunBefore");
761  StrCopy(t, (UBYTE*)AC.CheckpointRunBefore);
762  }
763  }
764  if ( type & 2 ) {
765  if ( AC.CheckpointRunAfter ) {
766  free(AC.CheckpointRunAfter); AC.CheckpointRunAfter = NULL;
767  }
768  if ( s-t > 0 ) {
769  AC.CheckpointRunAfter = Malloc1(s-t+1, "AC.CheckpointRunAfter");
770  StrCopy(t, (UBYTE*)AC.CheckpointRunAfter);
771  }
772  }
773  *s = c;
774  break;
775  }
776  ++s;
777  }
778  if ( FG.cTable[*s] != 9 ) {
779  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON Checkpoint statement: %s", t);
780  return(-1);
781  }
782  ++s;
783  }
784  }
785 /*
786  if ( AC.NoShowInput == 0 ) {
787  MesPrint("Checkpoints activated.");
788  if ( AC.CheckpointInterval ) {
789  MesPrint("-> Minimum saving interval: %l seconds.", AC.CheckpointInterval/100);
790  }
791  else {
792  MesPrint("-> No minimum saving interval given. Saving after EVERY module.");
793  }
794  if ( AC.CheckpointRunBefore ) {
795  MesPrint("-> Calling script \"%s\" before saving.", AC.CheckpointRunBefore);
796  }
797  if ( AC.CheckpointRunAfter ) {
798  MesPrint("-> Calling script \"%s\" after saving.", AC.CheckpointRunAfter);
799  }
800  }
801 */
802  }
803  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"indentspace") == 0 ) {
804  *s = c;
805  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
806  if ( *s ) {
807  i = 0;
808  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) { i = 10*i + *s++ - '0'; }
809  if ( *s ) {
810  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON IndentSpace statement: %s",t);
811  return(-1);
812  }
813  if ( i > 40 ) {
814  Warning("IndentSpace parameter adjusted to 40");
815  i = 40;
816  }
817  AO.IndentSpace = i;
818  }
819  else {
820  AO.IndentSpace = AM.ggIndentSpace;
821  }
822  return(0);
823  }
824  else if ( ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"fewerstats") == 0 ) ||
825  ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"fewerstatistics") == 0 ) ) {
826  *s = c;
827  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
828  if ( *s ) {
829  i = 0;
830  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) { i = 10*i + *s++ - '0'; }
831  if ( *s ) {
832  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ON FewerStatistics statement: %s",t);
833  return(-1);
834  }
835  if ( i > AM.S0->MaxPatches ) {
836  if ( AC.WarnFlag )
837  MesPrint("&Warning: FewerStatistics parameter greater than MaxPatches(=%d). Adjusted to %d"
838  ,AM.S0->MaxPatches,(AM.S0->MaxPatches+1)/2);
839  i = (AM.S0->MaxPatches+1)/2;
840  }
841  AC.ShortStatsMax = i;
842  }
843  else {
844  AC.ShortStatsMax = 10; /* default value */
845  }
846  return(0);
847  }
848  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"threads") == 0 ) {
849  if ( AM.totalnumberofthreads > 1 ) AS.MultiThreaded = 1;
850  }
851  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"flag") == 0 ) {
852  *s = c;
853  return(CoFlags(s,1));
854  }
855  else if ( StrICont(t,(UBYTE *)"innertest") == 0 ) {
856  UBYTE *t;
857  *s = c;
858  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
859  if ( *s ) {
860  t = s; while ( *t ) t++;
861  while ( t[-1] == ' ' || t[-1] == '\t' ) t--;
862  c = *t; *t = 0;
863  if ( AC.TestValue ) M_free(AC.TestValue,"InnerTest");
864  AC.TestValue = strDup1(s,"InnerTest");
865  *t = c;
866  s = t;
867  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
868  }
869  else {
870  if ( AC.TestValue ) {
871  M_free(AC.TestValue,"InnerTest");
872  AC.TestValue = 0;
873  }
874  }
875  }
876  else { *s = c; }
877  *onoffoptions[i].var = onoffoptions[i].type;
878  AR.SortType = AC.SortType;
879  AC.mparallelflag = AC.parallelflag | AM.hparallelflag;
880  }
881 }
882 
883 /*
884  #] CoOn :
885  #[ CoInsideFirst :
886 */
887 
888 int CoInsideFirst(UBYTE *s) { return(setonoff(s,&AC.insidefirst,1,0)); }
889 
890 /*
891  #] CoInsideFirst :
892  #[ CoProperCount :
893 */
894 
895 int CoProperCount(UBYTE *s) { return(setonoff(s,&AC.BottomLevel,1,0)); }
896 
897 /*
898  #] CoProperCount :
899  #[ CoDelete :
900 */
901 
902 int CoDelete(UBYTE *s)
903 {
904  int error = 0;
905  if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"storage") == 0 ) {
906  if ( DeleteStore(1) < 0 ) {
907  MesPrint("&Cannot restart storage file");
908  error = 1;
909  }
910  }
911  else {
912  UBYTE *t = s, c;
913  while ( *t && *t != ',' && *t != '>' ) t++;
914  c = *t; *t = 0;
915  if ( ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"extrasymbols") == 0 )
916  || ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"extrasymbol") == 0 ) ) {
917  WORD x = 0;
918 /*
919  Either deletes all extra symbols or deletes above a given number
920 */
921  *t = c; s = t;
922  if ( *s == '>' ) {
923  s++;
924  if ( FG.cTable[*s] != 1 ) goto unknown;
925  while ( *s <= '9' && *s >= '0' ) x = 10*x + *s++ - '0';
926  if ( *s ) goto unknown;
927  }
928  else if ( *s ) goto unknown;
929  if ( x < AM.gnumextrasym ) x = AM.gnumextrasym;
930  PruneExtraSymbols(x);
931  }
932  else {
933  *t = c;
934 unknown:
935  MesPrint("&Unknown option: %s",s);
936  error = 1;
937  }
938  }
939  return(error);
940 }
941 
942 /*
943  #] CoDelete :
944  #[ CoKeep :
945 */
946 
947 int CoKeep(UBYTE *s)
948 {
949  if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"brackets") == 0 ) AC.ComDefer = 1;
950  else { MesPrint("&Unknown option: '%s'",s); return(1); }
951  return(0);
952 }
953 
954 /*
955  #] CoKeep :
956  #[ CoFixIndex :
957 */
958 
959 int CoFixIndex(UBYTE *s)
960 {
961  int x, y, error = 0;
962  while ( *s ) {
963  if ( FG.cTable[*s] != 1 ) {
964 proper: MesPrint("&Proper syntax is: FixIndex,number:value[,number,value];");
965  return(1);
966  }
967  ParseNumber(x,s)
968  if ( *s != ':' ) goto proper;
969  s++;
970  if ( *s != '-' && *s != '+' && FG.cTable[*s] != 1 ) goto proper;
971  ParseSignedNumber(y,s)
972  if ( *s && *s != ',' ) goto proper;
973  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
974  if ( x >= AM.OffsetIndex ) {
975  MesPrint("&Fixed index out of allowed range. Change ConstIndex in setup file?");
976  MesPrint("&Current value of ConstIndex = %d",AM.OffsetIndex-1);
977  error = 1;
978  }
979  if ( y != (int)((WORD)y) ) {
980  MesPrint("&Value of d_(%d,%d) outside range for this computer",x,x);
981  error = 1;
982  }
983  if ( error == 0 ) AC.FixIndices[x] = y;
984  }
985  return(error);
986 }
987 
988 /*
989  #] CoFixIndex :
990  #[ CoMetric :
991 */
992 
993 int CoMetric(UBYTE *s)
994 { DUMMYUSE(s); MesPrint("&The metric statement does not do anything yet"); return(1); }
995 
996 /*
997  #] CoMetric :
998  #[ DoPrint :
999 */
1000 
1001 int DoPrint(UBYTE *s, int par)
1002 {
1003  int i, error = 0, numdol = 0, type;
1004  WORD handle = -1;
1005  UBYTE *name, c, *t;
1006  EXPRESSIONS e;
1007  WORD numexpr, tofile = 0, *w, par2 = 0;
1008  CBUF *C = cbuf + AC.cbufnum;
1009  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
1010  if ( ( *s == '+' || *s == '-' ) && ( s[1] == 'f' || s[1] == 'F' ) ) {
1011  t = s + 2; while ( *t == ' ' || *t == ',' ) t++;
1012  if ( *t == '"' ) {
1013  if ( *s == '+' ) { tofile = 1; handle = AC.LogHandle; }
1014  s = t;
1015  }
1016  }
1017  else if ( *s == '<' ) {
1018  UBYTE *filename;
1019  s++; filename = s;
1020  while ( *s && *s != '>' ) s++;
1021  if ( *s == 0 ) {
1022  MesPrint("&Improper filename in print statement");
1023  return(1);
1024  }
1025  *s++ = 0;
1026  tofile = 1;
1027  if ( ( handle = GetChannel((char *)filename,1) ) < 0 ) return(1);
1028  SKIPBLANKS(s) if ( *s == ',' ) s++; SKIPBLANKS(s)
1029  if ( *s == '+' && ( s[1] == 's' || s[1] == 'S' ) ) {
1030  s += 2;
1031  par2 |= PRINTONETERM;
1032  if ( *s == 's' || *s == 'S' ) {
1033  s++;
1034  par2 |= PRINTONEFUNCTION;
1035  if ( *s == 's' || *s == 'S' ) {
1036  s++;
1037  par2 |= PRINTALL;
1038  }
1039  }
1040  SKIPBLANKS(s) if ( *s == ',' ) s++; SKIPBLANKS(s)
1041  }
1042  }
1043  if ( par == PRINTON && *s == '"' ) {
1044  WORD code[3];
1045  if ( tofile == 1 ) code[0] = TYPEFPRINT;
1046  else code[0] = TYPEPRINT;
1047  code[1] = handle;
1048  code[2] = par2;
1049  s++; name = s;
1050  while ( *s && *s != '"' ) {
1051  if ( *s == '\\' ) s++;
1052  if ( *s == '%' && s[1] == '$' ) numdol++;
1053  s++;
1054  }
1055  if ( *s != '"' ) {
1056  MesPrint("&String in print statement should be enclosed in \"");
1057  return(1);
1058  }
1059  *s = 0;
1060  AddComString(3,code,name,1);
1061  *s++ = '"';
1062  while ( *s == ',' ) {
1063  s++;
1064  if ( *s == '$' ) {
1065  s++; name = s; while ( FG.cTable[*s] <= 1 ) s++;
1066  c = *s; *s = 0;
1067  type = GetName(AC.dollarnames,name,&numexpr,NOAUTO);
1068  if ( type == NAMENOTFOUND ) {
1069  MesPrint("&$ variable %s not (yet) defined",name);
1070  error = 1;
1071  }
1072  else {
1073  C->lhs[C->numlhs][1] += 2;
1074  *(C->Pointer)++ = DOLLAREXPRESSION;
1075  *(C->Pointer)++ = numexpr;
1076  numdol--;
1077  }
1078  }
1079  else {
1080  MesPrint("&Illegal object in print statement");
1081  error = 1;
1082  return(error);
1083  }
1084  *s = c;
1085  if ( c == '[' ) {
1086  w = C->Pointer;
1087  s++;
1088  s = GetDoParam(s,&(C->Pointer),-1);
1089  if ( s == 0 ) return(1);
1090  if ( *s != ']' ) {
1091  MesPrint("&unmatched [] in $ factor");
1092  return(1);
1093  }
1094  C->lhs[C->numlhs][1] += C->Pointer - w;
1095  s++;
1096  }
1097  }
1098  if ( *s != 0 ) {
1099  MesPrint("&Illegal object in print statement");
1100  error = 1;
1101  }
1102  if ( numdol > 0 ) {
1103  MesPrint("&More $ variables asked for than provided");
1104  error = 1;
1105  }
1106  *(C->Pointer)++ = 0;
1107  return(error);
1108  }
1109  if ( *s == 0 ) { /* All active expressions */
1110 AllExpr:
1111  for ( e = Expressions, i = NumExpressions; i > 0; i--, e++ ) {
1112  if ( e->status == LOCALEXPRESSION || e->status ==
1113  GLOBALEXPRESSION || e->status == UNHIDELEXPRESSION
1114  || e->status == UNHIDEGEXPRESSION ) e->printflag = par;
1115  }
1116  return(error);
1117  }
1118  while ( *s ) {
1119  if ( *s == '+' ) {
1120  s++;
1121  if ( tolower(*s) == 'f' ) par |= PRINTLFILE;
1122  else if ( tolower(*s) == 's' ) {
1123  if ( tolower(s[1]) == 's' ) {
1124  if ( tolower(s[2]) == 's' ) {
1125  par |= PRINTONEFUNCTION | PRINTONETERM | PRINTALL;
1126  s++;
1127  }
1128  else if ( ( par & 3 ) < 2 ) par |= PRINTONEFUNCTION | PRINTONETERM;
1129  s++;
1130  }
1131  else {
1132  if ( ( par & 3 ) < 2 ) par |= PRINTONETERM;
1133  }
1134  }
1135  else {
1136 illeg: MesPrint("&Illegal option in (n)print statement");
1137  error = 1;
1138  }
1139  s++;
1140  if ( *s == 0 ) goto AllExpr;
1141  }
1142  else if ( *s == '-' ) {
1143  s++;
1144  if ( tolower(*s) == 'f' ) par &= ~PRINTLFILE;
1145  else if ( tolower(*s) == 's' ) {
1146  if ( tolower(s[1]) == 's' ) {
1147  if ( tolower(s[2]) == 's' ) {
1148  par &= ~PRINTALL;
1149  s++;
1150  }
1151  else if ( ( par & 3 ) < 2 ) {
1152  par &= ~PRINTONEFUNCTION;
1153  par &= ~PRINTALL;
1154  }
1155  s++;
1156  }
1157  else {
1158  if ( ( par & 3 ) < 2 ) {
1159  par &= ~PRINTONETERM;
1160  par &= ~PRINTONEFUNCTION;
1161  par &= ~PRINTALL;
1162  }
1163  }
1164  }
1165  else goto illeg;
1166  s++;
1167  if ( *s == 0 ) goto AllExpr;
1168  }
1169  else if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 || *s == '[' ) {
1170  name = s;
1171  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
1172  MesPrint("&Improper name in (n)print statement");
1173  return(1);
1174  }
1175  c = *s; *s = 0;
1176  if ( ( GetName(AC.exprnames,name,&numexpr,NOAUTO) == CEXPRESSION )
1177  && ( Expressions[numexpr].status == LOCALEXPRESSION
1178  || Expressions[numexpr].status == GLOBALEXPRESSION ) ) {
1179 FoundExpr:;
1180  if ( c == '[' && s[1] == ']' ) {
1181  Expressions[numexpr].printflag = par | PRINTCONTENTS;
1182  *s++ = c; c = *++s;
1183  }
1184  else
1185  Expressions[numexpr].printflag = par;
1186  }
1187  else if ( GetLastExprName(name,&numexpr)
1188  && ( Expressions[numexpr].status == LOCALEXPRESSION
1189  || Expressions[numexpr].status == GLOBALEXPRESSION
1190  || Expressions[numexpr].status == UNHIDELEXPRESSION
1191  || Expressions[numexpr].status == UNHIDEGEXPRESSION
1192  ) ) {
1193  goto FoundExpr;
1194  }
1195  else {
1196  MesPrint("&%s is not the name of an active expression",name);
1197  error = 1;
1198  }
1199  *s++ = c;
1200  if ( c == 0 ) return(0);
1201  if ( c == '-' || c == '+' ) s--;
1202  }
1203  else if ( *s == ',' ) s++;
1204  else {
1205  MesPrint("&Illegal object in (n)print statement");
1206  return(1);
1207  }
1208  }
1209  return(0);
1210 }
1211 
1212 /*
1213  #] DoPrint :
1214  #[ CoPrint :
1215 */
1216 
1217 int CoPrint(UBYTE *s) { return(DoPrint(s,PRINTON)); }
1218 
1219 /*
1220  #] CoPrint :
1221  #[ CoPrintB :
1222 */
1223 
1224 int CoPrintB(UBYTE *s) { return(DoPrint(s,PRINTCONTENT)); }
1225 
1226 /*
1227  #] CoPrintB :
1228  #[ CoNPrint :
1229 */
1230 
1231 int CoNPrint(UBYTE *s) { return(DoPrint(s,PRINTOFF)); }
1232 
1233 /*
1234  #] CoNPrint :
1235  #[ CoPushHide :
1236 */
1237 
1238 int CoPushHide(UBYTE *s)
1239 {
1240  GETIDENTITY
1241  WORD *ScratchBuf;
1242  int i;
1243  if ( AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer == 0 ) {
1244  ScratchBuf = (WORD *)Malloc1(AM.HideSize*sizeof(WORD),"hidesize");
1245  AR.Fscr[2].POsize = AM.HideSize * sizeof(WORD);
1246  AR.Fscr[2].POfull = AR.Fscr[2].POfill = AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer = ScratchBuf;
1247  AR.Fscr[2].POstop = AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer + AM.HideSize;
1248  PUTZERO(AR.Fscr[2].POposition);
1249  }
1250  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
1251  AC.HideLevel += 2;
1252  if ( *s ) {
1253  MesPrint("&PushHide statement should have no arguments");
1254  return(-1);
1255  }
1256  for ( i = 0; i < NumExpressions; i++ ) {
1257  switch ( Expressions[i].status ) {
1258  case DROPLEXPRESSION:
1259  case SKIPLEXPRESSION:
1260  case LOCALEXPRESSION:
1261  Expressions[i].status = HIDELEXPRESSION;
1262  Expressions[i].hidelevel = AC.HideLevel-1;
1263  break;
1264  case DROPGEXPRESSION:
1265  case SKIPGEXPRESSION:
1266  case GLOBALEXPRESSION:
1267  Expressions[i].status = HIDEGEXPRESSION;
1268  Expressions[i].hidelevel = AC.HideLevel-1;
1269  break;
1270  default:
1271  break;
1272  }
1273  }
1274  return(0);
1275 }
1276 
1277 /*
1278  #] CoPushHide :
1279  #[ CoPopHide :
1280 */
1281 
1282 int CoPopHide(UBYTE *s)
1283 {
1284  int i;
1285  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
1286  if ( AC.HideLevel <= 0 ) {
1287  MesPrint("&PopHide statement without corresponding PushHide statement");
1288  return(-1);
1289  }
1290  AC.HideLevel -= 2;
1291  if ( *s ) {
1292  MesPrint("&PopHide statement should have no arguments");
1293  return(-1);
1294  }
1295  for ( i = 0; i < NumExpressions; i++ ) {
1296  switch ( Expressions[i].status ) {
1297  case HIDDENLEXPRESSION:
1298  if ( Expressions[i].hidelevel > AC.HideLevel )
1299  Expressions[i].status = UNHIDELEXPRESSION;
1300  break;
1301  case HIDDENGEXPRESSION:
1302  if ( Expressions[i].hidelevel > AC.HideLevel )
1303  Expressions[i].status = UNHIDEGEXPRESSION;
1304  break;
1305  default:
1306  break;
1307  }
1308  }
1309  return(0);
1310 }
1311 
1312 /*
1313  #] CoPopHide :
1314  #[ SetExprCases :
1315 */
1316 
1317 int SetExprCases(int par, int setunset, int val)
1318 {
1319  switch ( par ) {
1320  case SKIP:
1321  switch ( val ) {
1322  case SKIPLEXPRESSION:
1323  if ( !setunset ) val = LOCALEXPRESSION;
1324  break;
1325  case SKIPGEXPRESSION:
1326  if ( !setunset ) val = GLOBALEXPRESSION;
1327  break;
1328  case LOCALEXPRESSION:
1329  if ( setunset ) val = SKIPLEXPRESSION;
1330  break;
1331  case GLOBALEXPRESSION:
1332  if ( setunset ) val = SKIPGEXPRESSION;
1333  break;
1334  case INTOHIDEGEXPRESSION:
1335  case INTOHIDELEXPRESSION:
1336  default:
1337  break;
1338  }
1339  break;
1340  case DROP:
1341  switch ( val ) {
1342  case SKIPLEXPRESSION:
1343  case LOCALEXPRESSION:
1344  case HIDELEXPRESSION:
1345  if ( setunset ) val = DROPLEXPRESSION;
1346  break;
1347  case DROPLEXPRESSION:
1348  if ( !setunset ) val = LOCALEXPRESSION;
1349  break;
1350  case SKIPGEXPRESSION:
1351  case GLOBALEXPRESSION:
1352  case HIDEGEXPRESSION:
1353  if ( setunset ) val = DROPGEXPRESSION;
1354  break;
1355  case DROPGEXPRESSION:
1356  if ( !setunset ) val = GLOBALEXPRESSION;
1357  break;
1358  case HIDDENLEXPRESSION:
1359  case UNHIDELEXPRESSION:
1360  if ( setunset ) val = DROPHLEXPRESSION;
1361  break;
1362  case HIDDENGEXPRESSION:
1363  case UNHIDEGEXPRESSION:
1364  if ( setunset ) val = DROPHGEXPRESSION;
1365  break;
1366  case DROPHLEXPRESSION:
1367  if ( !setunset ) val = HIDDENLEXPRESSION;
1368  break;
1369  case DROPHGEXPRESSION:
1370  if ( !setunset ) val = HIDDENGEXPRESSION;
1371  break;
1372  case INTOHIDEGEXPRESSION:
1373  case INTOHIDELEXPRESSION:
1374  default:
1375  break;
1376  }
1377  break;
1378  case HIDE:
1379  switch ( val ) {
1380  case DROPLEXPRESSION:
1381  case SKIPLEXPRESSION:
1382  case LOCALEXPRESSION:
1383  if ( setunset ) val = HIDELEXPRESSION;
1384  break;
1385  case HIDELEXPRESSION:
1386  if ( !setunset ) val = LOCALEXPRESSION;
1387  break;
1388  case DROPGEXPRESSION:
1389  case SKIPGEXPRESSION:
1390  case GLOBALEXPRESSION:
1391  if ( setunset ) val = HIDEGEXPRESSION;
1392  break;
1393  case HIDEGEXPRESSION:
1394  if ( !setunset ) val = GLOBALEXPRESSION;
1395  break;
1396  case INTOHIDEGEXPRESSION:
1397  case INTOHIDELEXPRESSION:
1398  default:
1399  break;
1400  }
1401  break;
1402  case UNHIDE:
1403  switch ( val ) {
1404  case HIDDENLEXPRESSION:
1405  case DROPHLEXPRESSION:
1406  if ( setunset ) val = UNHIDELEXPRESSION;
1407  break;
1408  case UNHIDELEXPRESSION:
1409  if ( !setunset ) val = HIDDENLEXPRESSION;
1410  break;
1411  case HIDDENGEXPRESSION:
1412  case DROPHGEXPRESSION:
1413  if ( setunset ) val = UNHIDEGEXPRESSION;
1414  break;
1415  case UNHIDEGEXPRESSION:
1416  if ( !setunset ) val = HIDDENGEXPRESSION;
1417  break;
1418  case INTOHIDEGEXPRESSION:
1419  case INTOHIDELEXPRESSION:
1420  default:
1421  break;
1422  }
1423  break;
1424  case INTOHIDE:
1425  switch ( val ) {
1426  case HIDDENLEXPRESSION:
1427  case HIDDENGEXPRESSION:
1428  MesPrint("&Expression is already hidden");
1429  return(-1);
1430  case DROPHLEXPRESSION:
1431  case DROPHGEXPRESSION:
1432  case UNHIDELEXPRESSION:
1433  case UNHIDEGEXPRESSION:
1434  MesPrint("&Cannot unhide and put intohide expression in the same module");
1435  return(-1);
1436  case LOCALEXPRESSION:
1437  case DROPLEXPRESSION:
1438  case SKIPLEXPRESSION:
1439  case HIDELEXPRESSION:
1440  if ( setunset ) val = INTOHIDELEXPRESSION;
1441  break;
1442  case GLOBALEXPRESSION:
1443  case DROPGEXPRESSION:
1444  case SKIPGEXPRESSION:
1445  case HIDEGEXPRESSION:
1446  if ( setunset ) val = INTOHIDEGEXPRESSION;
1447  break;
1448  default:
1449  break;
1450  }
1451  break;
1452  default:
1453  break;
1454  }
1455  return(val);
1456 }
1457 
1458 /*
1459  #] SetExprCases :
1460  #[ SetExpr :
1461 */
1462 
1463 int SetExpr(UBYTE *s, int setunset, int par)
1464 {
1465  WORD *w, numexpr;
1466  int error = 0, i;
1467  UBYTE *name, c;
1468  if ( *s == 0 && ( par != INTOHIDE ) ) {
1469  for ( i = 0; i < NumExpressions; i++ ) {
1470  w = &(Expressions[i].status);
1471  *w = SetExprCases(par,setunset,*w);
1472  if ( *w < 0 ) error = 1;
1473  if ( par == HIDE && setunset == 1 )
1474  Expressions[i].hidelevel = AC.HideLevel;
1475  }
1476  return(0);
1477  }
1478  while ( *s ) {
1479  if ( *s == ',' ) { s++; continue; }
1480  if ( *s == '0' ) { s++; continue; }
1481  name = s;
1482  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
1483  MesPrint("&Improper name for an expression: '%s'",name);
1484  return(1);
1485  }
1486  c = *s; *s = 0;
1487  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,name,&numexpr,NOAUTO) == CEXPRESSION ) {
1488  w = &(Expressions[numexpr].status);
1489  *w = SetExprCases(par,setunset,*w);
1490  if ( *w < 0 ) error = 1;
1491  if ( ( par == HIDE || par == INTOHIDE ) && setunset == 1 )
1492  Expressions[numexpr].hidelevel = AC.HideLevel;
1493  }
1494  else if ( GetName(AC.varnames,name,&numexpr,NOAUTO) != NAMENOTFOUND ) {
1495  MesPrint("&%s is not an expression",name);
1496  error = 1;
1497  }
1498  *s = c;
1499  }
1500  return(error);
1501 }
1502 
1503 /*
1504  #] SetExpr :
1505  #[ CoDrop :
1506 */
1507 
1508 int CoDrop(UBYTE *s) { return(SetExpr(s,1,DROP)); }
1509 
1510 /*
1511  #] CoDrop :
1512  #[ CoNoDrop :
1513 */
1514 
1515 int CoNoDrop(UBYTE *s) { return(SetExpr(s,0,DROP)); }
1516 
1517 /*
1518  #] CoNoDrop :
1519  #[ CoSkip :
1520 */
1521 
1522 int CoSkip(UBYTE *s) { return(SetExpr(s,1,SKIP)); }
1523 
1524 /*
1525  #] CoSkip :
1526  #[ CoNoSkip :
1527 */
1528 
1529 int CoNoSkip(UBYTE *s) { return(SetExpr(s,0,SKIP)); }
1530 
1531 /*
1532  #] CoNoSkip :
1533  #[ CoHide :
1534 */
1535 
1536 int CoHide(UBYTE *inp) {
1537  GETIDENTITY
1538  WORD *ScratchBuf;
1539  if ( AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer == 0 ) {
1540  ScratchBuf = (WORD *)Malloc1(AM.HideSize*sizeof(WORD),"hidesize");
1541  AR.Fscr[2].POsize = AM.HideSize * sizeof(WORD);
1542  AR.Fscr[2].POfull = AR.Fscr[2].POfill = AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer = ScratchBuf;
1543  AR.Fscr[2].POstop = AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer + AM.HideSize;
1544  PUTZERO(AR.Fscr[2].POposition);
1545  }
1546  return(SetExpr(inp,1,HIDE));
1547 }
1548 
1549 /*
1550  #] CoHide :
1551  #[ CoIntoHide :
1552 */
1553 
1554 int CoIntoHide(UBYTE *inp) {
1555  GETIDENTITY
1556  WORD *ScratchBuf;
1557  if ( AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer == 0 ) {
1558  ScratchBuf = (WORD *)Malloc1(AM.HideSize*sizeof(WORD),"hidesize");
1559  AR.Fscr[2].POsize = AM.HideSize * sizeof(WORD);
1560  AR.Fscr[2].POfull = AR.Fscr[2].POfill = AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer = ScratchBuf;
1561  AR.Fscr[2].POstop = AR.Fscr[2].PObuffer + AM.HideSize;
1562  PUTZERO(AR.Fscr[2].POposition);
1563  }
1564  return(SetExpr(inp,1,INTOHIDE));
1565 }
1566 
1567 /*
1568  #] CoIntoHide :
1569  #[ CoNoHide :
1570 */
1571 
1572 int CoNoHide(UBYTE *inp) { return(SetExpr(inp,0,HIDE)); }
1573 
1574 /*
1575  #] CoNoHide :
1576  #[ CoUnHide :
1577 */
1578 
1579 int CoUnHide(UBYTE *inp) { return(SetExpr(inp,1,UNHIDE)); }
1580 
1581 /*
1582  #] CoUnHide :
1583  #[ CoNoUnHide :
1584 */
1585 
1586 int CoNoUnHide(UBYTE *inp) { return(SetExpr(inp,0,UNHIDE)); }
1587 
1588 /*
1589  #] CoNoUnHide :
1590  #[ AddToCom :
1591 */
1592 
1593 void AddToCom(int n, WORD *array)
1594 {
1595  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
1596 #ifdef COMPBUFDEBUG
1597  MesPrint(" %a",n,array);
1598 #endif
1599  while ( C->Pointer+n >= C->Top ) DoubleCbuffer(AC.cbufnum,C->Pointer,18);
1600  while ( --n >= 0 ) *(C->Pointer)++ = *array++;
1601 }
1602 
1603 /*
1604  #] AddToCom :
1605  #[ AddComString :
1606 */
1607 
1608 int AddComString(int n, WORD *array, UBYTE *thestring, int par)
1609 {
1610  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
1611  UBYTE *s = thestring, *w;
1612 #ifdef COMPBUFDEBUG
1613  WORD *cc;
1614  UBYTE *ww;
1615 #endif
1616  int i, numchars = 0, size, zeroes;
1617  while ( *s ) {
1618  if ( *s == '\\' ) s++;
1619  else if ( par == 1 &&
1620  ( ( *s == '%' && s[1] != 't' && s[1] != 'T' && s[1] != '$' &&
1621  s[1] != 'w' && s[1] != 'W' && s[1] != 'r' && s[1] != 0 ) || *s == '#'
1622  || *s == '@' || *s == '&' ) ) {
1623  numchars++;
1624  }
1625  s++; numchars++;
1626  }
1627  AddLHS(AC.cbufnum);
1628  size = numchars/sizeof(WORD)+1;
1629  while ( C->Pointer+size+n+2 >= C->Top ) DoubleCbuffer(AC.cbufnum,C->Pointer,19);
1630 #ifdef COMPBUFDEBUG
1631  cc = C->Pointer;
1632 #endif
1633  *(C->Pointer)++ = array[0];
1634  *(C->Pointer)++ = size+n+2;
1635  for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ ) *(C->Pointer)++ = array[i];
1636  *(C->Pointer)++ = size;
1637 #ifdef COMPBUFDEBUG
1638  ww =
1639 #endif
1640  w = (UBYTE *)(C->Pointer);
1641  zeroes = size*sizeof(WORD)-numchars;
1642  s = thestring;
1643  while ( *s ) {
1644  if ( *s == '\\' ) s++;
1645  else if ( par == 1 && ( ( *s == '%' &&
1646  s[1] != 't' && s[1] != 'T' && s[1] != '$' &&
1647  s[1] != 'w' && s[1] != 'W' && s[1] != 'r' && s[1] != 0 ) || *s == '#'
1648  || *s == '@' || *s == '&' ) ) {
1649  *w++ = '%';
1650  }
1651  *w++ = *s++;
1652  }
1653  while ( --zeroes >= 0 ) *w++ = 0;
1654  C->Pointer += size;
1655 #ifdef COMPBUFDEBUG
1656  MesPrint("LH: %a",size+1+n,cc);
1657  MesPrint(" %s",thestring);
1658 #endif
1659  return(0);
1660 }
1661 
1662 /*
1663  #] AddComString :
1664  #[ Add2ComStrings :
1665 */
1666 
1667 int Add2ComStrings(int n, WORD *array, UBYTE *string1, UBYTE *string2)
1668 {
1669  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
1670  UBYTE *s1 = string1, *s2 = string2, *w;
1671  int i, num1chars = 0, num2chars = 0, size1, size2, zeroes1, zeroes2;
1672  AddLHS(AC.cbufnum);
1673  while ( *s1 ) { s1++; num1chars++; }
1674  size1 = num1chars/sizeof(WORD)+1;
1675  if ( s2 ) {
1676  while ( *s2 ) { s2++; num2chars++; }
1677  size2 = num2chars/sizeof(WORD)+1;
1678  }
1679  else size2 = 0;
1680  while ( C->Pointer+size1+size2+n+3 >= C->Top ) DoubleCbuffer(AC.cbufnum,C->Pointer,20);
1681  *(C->Pointer)++ = array[0];
1682  *(C->Pointer)++ = size1+size2+n+3;
1683  for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ ) *(C->Pointer)++ = array[i];
1684  *(C->Pointer)++ = size1;
1685  w = (UBYTE *)(C->Pointer);
1686  zeroes1 = size1*sizeof(WORD)-num1chars;
1687  s1 = string1;
1688  while ( *s1 ) { *w++ = *s1++; }
1689  while ( --zeroes1 >= 0 ) *w++ = 0;
1690  C->Pointer += size1;
1691  *(C->Pointer)++ = size2;
1692  if ( size2 ) {
1693  w = (UBYTE *)(C->Pointer);
1694  zeroes2 = size2*sizeof(WORD)-num2chars;
1695  s2 = string2;
1696  while ( *s2 ) { *w++ = *s2++; }
1697  while ( --zeroes2 >= 0 ) *w++ = 0;
1698  C->Pointer += size2;
1699  }
1700  return(0);
1701 }
1702 
1703 /*
1704  #] Add2ComStrings :
1705  #[ CoDiscard :
1706 */
1707 
1708 int CoDiscard(UBYTE *s)
1709 {
1710  if ( *s == 0 ) {
1711  Add2Com(TYPEDISCARD)
1712  return(0);
1713  }
1714  MesPrint("&Illegal argument in discard statement: '%s'",s);
1715  return(1);
1716 }
1717 
1718 /*
1719  #] CoDiscard :
1720  #[ CoContract :
1721 
1722  Syntax:
1723  Contract
1724  Contract:#
1725  Contract #
1726  Contract:#,#
1727 */
1728 
1729 static WORD ccarray[5] = { TYPEOPERATION,5,CONTRACT,0,0 };
1730 
1731 int CoContract(UBYTE *s)
1732 {
1733  int x;
1734  if ( *s == ':' ) {
1735  s++;
1736  ParseNumber(x,s)
1737  if ( *s != ',' && *s ) {
1738 proper: MesPrint("&Illegal number in contract statement");
1739  return(1);
1740  }
1741  if ( *s ) s++;
1742  ccarray[4] = x;
1743  }
1744  else ccarray[4] = 0;
1745  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
1746  ParseNumber(x,s)
1747  if ( *s ) goto proper;
1748  ccarray[3] = x;
1749  }
1750  else if ( *s ) goto proper;
1751  else ccarray[3] = -1;
1752  return(AddNtoL(5,ccarray));
1753 }
1754 
1755 /*
1756  #] CoContract :
1757  #[ CoGoTo :
1758 */
1759 
1760 int CoGoTo(UBYTE *inp)
1761 {
1762  UBYTE *s = inp;
1763  int x;
1764  while ( FG.cTable[*s] <= 1 ) s++;
1765  if ( *s ) {
1766  MesPrint("&Label should be an alpha-numeric string");
1767  return(1);
1768  }
1769  x = GetLabel(inp);
1770  Add3Com(TYPEGOTO,x);
1771  return(0);
1772 }
1773 
1774 /*
1775  #] CoGoTo :
1776  #[ CoLabel :
1777 */
1778 
1779 int CoLabel(UBYTE *inp)
1780 {
1781  UBYTE *s = inp;
1782  int x;
1783  while ( FG.cTable[*s] <= 1 ) s++;
1784  if ( *s ) {
1785  MesPrint("&Label should be an alpha-numeric string");
1786  return(1);
1787  }
1788  x = GetLabel(inp);
1789  if ( AC.Labels[x] >= 0 ) {
1790  MesPrint("&Label %s defined more than once",AC.LabelNames[x]);
1791  return(1);
1792  }
1793  AC.Labels[x] = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs;
1794  return(0);
1795 }
1796 
1797 /*
1798  #] CoLabel :
1799  #[ DoArgument :
1800 
1801  Layout:
1802  par,full size,numlhs(+1),par,scale
1803  scale is for normalize
1804 */
1805 
1806 int DoArgument(UBYTE *s, int par)
1807 {
1808  GETIDENTITY
1809  UBYTE *name, *t, *v, c;
1810  WORD *oldworkpointer = AT.WorkPointer, *w, *ww, number, *scale;
1811  int error = 0, zeroflag, type, x;
1812  AC.lhdollarflag = 0;
1813  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
1814  w = AT.WorkPointer;
1815  *w++ = par;
1816  w++;
1817  switch ( par ) {
1818  case TYPEARG:
1819  if ( AC.arglevel >= MAXNEST ) {
1820  MesPrint("@Nesting of argument statements more than %d levels"
1821  ,(WORD)MAXNEST);
1822  return(-1);
1823  }
1824  AC.argsumcheck[AC.arglevel] = NestingChecksum();
1825  AC.argstack[AC.arglevel] = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Pointer
1826  - cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer + 2;
1827  AC.arglevel++;
1828  *w++ = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs;
1829  break;
1830  case TYPENORM:
1831  case TYPENORM4:
1832  case TYPESPLITARG:
1833  case TYPESPLITFIRSTARG:
1834  case TYPESPLITLASTARG:
1835  case TYPEFACTARG:
1836  case TYPEARGTOEXTRASYMBOL:
1837  *w++ = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs+1;
1838  break;
1839  }
1840  *w++ = par;
1841  scale = w;
1842  *w++ = 1;
1843  *w++ = 0;
1844  if ( *s == '^' ) {
1845  s++; ParseSignedNumber(x,s)
1846  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
1847  *scale = x;
1848  }
1849  if ( *s == '(' ) {
1850  t = s+1; SKIPBRA3(s) /* We did check the brackets already */
1851  if ( par == TYPEARG ) {
1852  MesPrint("&Illegal () entry in argument statement");
1853  error = 1; s++; goto skipbracks;
1854  }
1855  else if ( par == TYPESPLITFIRSTARG ) {
1856  MesPrint("&Illegal () entry in splitfirstarg statement");
1857  error = 1; s++; goto skipbracks;
1858  }
1859  else if ( par == TYPESPLITLASTARG ) {
1860  MesPrint("&Illegal () entry in splitlastarg statement");
1861  error = 1; s++; goto skipbracks;
1862  }
1863  v = t;
1864  while ( v < s ) {
1865  if ( *v == '?' ) {
1866  MesPrint("&Wildcarding not allowed in this type of statement");
1867  error = 1; break;
1868  }
1869  v++;
1870  }
1871  v = s++;
1872  if ( *t == '(' && v[-1] == ')' ) {
1873  t++; v--;
1874  if ( par == TYPESPLITARG ) oldworkpointer[0] = TYPESPLITARG2;
1875  else if ( par == TYPEFACTARG ) oldworkpointer[0] = TYPEFACTARG2;
1876  else if ( par == TYPENORM4 ) oldworkpointer[0] = TYPENORM4;
1877  else if ( par == TYPENORM ) {
1878  if ( *t == '-' ) { oldworkpointer[0] = TYPENORM3; t++; }
1879  else { oldworkpointer[0] = TYPENORM2; *scale = 0; }
1880  }
1881  }
1882  if ( error == 0 ) {
1883  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
1884  WORD oldnumrhs = C->numrhs, oldnumlhs = C->numlhs;
1885  WORD prototype[SUBEXPSIZE+40]; /* Up to 10 nested sums! */
1886  WORD *m, *mm;
1887  int i, retcode;
1888  LONG oldpointer = C->Pointer - C->Buffer;
1889  *v = 0;
1890  prototype[0] = SUBEXPRESSION;
1891  prototype[1] = SUBEXPSIZE;
1892  prototype[2] = C->numrhs+1;
1893  prototype[3] = 1;
1894  prototype[4] = AC.cbufnum;
1895  AT.WorkPointer += TYPEARGHEADSIZE+1;
1896  AddLHS(AC.cbufnum);
1897  if ( ( retcode = CompileAlgebra(t,LHSIDE,prototype) ) < 0 )
1898  error = 1;
1899  else {
1900  prototype[2] = retcode;
1901  ww = C->lhs[retcode];
1902  AC.lhdollarflag = 0;
1903  if ( *ww == 0 ) {
1904  *w++ = -2; *w++ = 0;
1905  }
1906  else if ( ww[ww[0]] != 0 ) {
1907  MesPrint("&There should be only one term between ()");
1908  error = 1;
1909  }
1910  else if ( NewSort(BHEAD0) ) { if ( !error ) error = 1; }
1911  else if ( NewSort(BHEAD0) ) {
1912  LowerSortLevel();
1913  if ( !error ) error = 1;
1914  }
1915  else {
1916  AN.RepPoint = AT.RepCount + 1;
1917  m = AT.WorkPointer;
1918  mm = ww; i = *mm;
1919  while ( --i >= 0 ) *m++ = *mm++;
1920  mm = AT.WorkPointer; AT.WorkPointer = m;
1921  AR.Cnumlhs = C->numlhs;
1922  if ( Generator(BHEAD mm,C->numlhs) ) {
1923  LowerSortLevel(); error = 1;
1924  }
1925  else if ( EndSort(BHEAD mm,0) < 0 ) {
1926  error = 1;
1927  AT.WorkPointer = mm;
1928  }
1929  else if ( *mm == 0 ) {
1930  *w++ = -2; *w++ = 0;
1931  AT.WorkPointer = mm;
1932  }
1933  else if ( mm[mm[0]] != 0 ) {
1934  error = 1;
1935  AT.WorkPointer = mm;
1936  }
1937  else {
1938  AT.WorkPointer = mm;
1939  m = mm+*mm;
1940  if ( par == TYPEFACTARG ) {
1941  if ( *mm != ABS(m[-1])+1 ) {
1942  *mm -= ABS(m[-1]); /* Strip coefficient */
1943  }
1944  mm[-1] = -*mm-1; w += *mm+1;
1945  }
1946  else {
1947  *mm -= ABS(m[-1]); /* Strip coefficient */
1948 /*
1949  if ( *mm == 1 ) { *w++ = -2; *w++ = 0; }
1950  else
1951 */
1952  { mm[-1] = -*mm-1; w += *mm+1; }
1953  }
1954  oldworkpointer[1] = w - oldworkpointer;
1955  }
1956  LowerSortLevel();
1957  }
1958  oldworkpointer[5] = AC.lhdollarflag;
1959  }
1960  *v = ')';
1961  C->numrhs = oldnumrhs;
1962  C->numlhs = oldnumlhs;
1963  C->Pointer = C->Buffer + oldpointer;
1964  }
1965  }
1966 skipbracks:
1967  if ( *s == 0 ) { *w++ = 0; *w++ = 2; *w++ = 1; }
1968  else {
1969  do {
1970  if ( *s == ',' ) { s++; continue; }
1971  ww = w; *w++ = 0; w++;
1972  if ( FG.cTable[*s] > 1 && *s != '[' && *s != '{' ) {
1973  MesPrint("&Illegal parameters in statement");
1974  error = 1;
1975  break;
1976  }
1977  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 || *s == '[' || *s == '{' ) {
1978  if ( *s == '{' ) {
1979  name = s+1;
1980  SKIPBRA2(s)
1981  c = *s; *s = 0;
1982  number = DoTempSet(name,s);
1983  name--; *s++ = c; c = *s; *s = 0;
1984  goto doset;
1985  }
1986  else {
1987  name = s;
1988  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
1989  MesPrint("&Illegal name '%s'",name);
1990  return(1);
1991  }
1992  c = *s; *s = 0;
1993  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,name,&number,WITHAUTO) ) == CSET ) {
1994 doset: if ( Sets[number].type != CFUNCTION ) goto nofun;
1995  *w++ = CSET; *w++ = number;
1996  }
1997  else if ( type == CFUNCTION ) {
1998  *w++ = CFUNCTION; *w++ = number + FUNCTION;
1999  }
2000  else {
2001 nofun: MesPrint("&%s is not a function or a set of functions"
2002  ,name);
2003  error = 1;
2004  }
2005  }
2006  *s = c;
2007  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2008  }
2009  ww[1] = w - ww;
2010  ww = w; w++; zeroflag = 0;
2011  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2012  ParseNumber(x,s)
2013  if ( *s && *s != ',' ) {
2014  MesPrint("&Illegal separator after number");
2015  error = 1;
2016  while ( *s && *s != ',' ) s++;
2017  }
2018  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2019  if ( x == 0 ) zeroflag = 1;
2020  if ( !zeroflag ) *w++ = (WORD)x;
2021  }
2022  *ww = w - ww;
2023  } while ( *s );
2024  }
2025  oldworkpointer[1] = w - oldworkpointer;
2026  if ( par == TYPEARG ) { /* To make sure. The Pointer might move in the future */
2027  AC.argstack[AC.arglevel-1] = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Pointer
2028  - cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer + 2;
2029  }
2030  AddNtoL(oldworkpointer[1],oldworkpointer);
2031  AT.WorkPointer = oldworkpointer;
2032  return(error);
2033 }
2034 
2035 /*
2036  #] DoArgument :
2037  #[ CoArgument :
2038 */
2039 
2040 int CoArgument(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgument(s,TYPEARG)); }
2041 
2042 /*
2043  #] CoArgument :
2044  #[ CoEndArgument :
2045 */
2046 
2047 int CoEndArgument(UBYTE *s)
2048 {
2049  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
2050  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2051  if ( *s ) {
2052  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for EndArgument statement");
2053  return(1);
2054  }
2055  if ( AC.arglevel <= 0 ) {
2056  MesPrint("&EndArgument without corresponding Argument statement");
2057  return(1);
2058  }
2059  AC.arglevel--;
2060  cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer[AC.argstack[AC.arglevel]] = C->numlhs;
2061  if ( AC.argsumcheck[AC.arglevel] != NestingChecksum() ) {
2062  MesNesting();
2063  return(1);
2064  }
2065  return(0);
2066 }
2067 
2068 /*
2069  #] CoEndArgument :
2070  #[ CoInside :
2071 */
2072 
2073 int CoInside(UBYTE *s) { return(ExecInside(s)); }
2074 
2075 /*
2076  #] CoInside :
2077  #[ CoEndInside :
2078 */
2079 
2080 int CoEndInside(UBYTE *s)
2081 {
2082  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
2083  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2084  if ( *s ) {
2085  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for EndInside statement");
2086  return(1);
2087  }
2088  if ( AC.insidelevel <= 0 ) {
2089  MesPrint("&EndInside without corresponding Inside statement");
2090  return(1);
2091  }
2092  AC.insidelevel--;
2093  cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer[AC.insidestack[AC.insidelevel]] = C->numlhs;
2094  if ( AC.insidesumcheck[AC.insidelevel] != NestingChecksum() ) {
2095  MesNesting();
2096  return(1);
2097  }
2098  return(0);
2099 }
2100 
2101 /*
2102  #] CoEndInside :
2103  #[ CoNormalize :
2104 */
2105 
2106 int CoNormalize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgument(s,TYPENORM)); }
2107 
2108 /*
2109  #] CoNormalize :
2110  #[ CoMakeInteger :
2111 */
2112 
2113 int CoMakeInteger(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgument(s,TYPENORM4)); }
2114 
2115 /*
2116  #] CoMakeInteger :
2117  #[ CoSplitArg :
2118 */
2119 
2120 int CoSplitArg(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgument(s,TYPESPLITARG)); }
2121 
2122 /*
2123  #] CoSplitArg :
2124  #[ CoSplitFirstArg :
2125 */
2126 
2127 int CoSplitFirstArg(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgument(s,TYPESPLITFIRSTARG)); }
2128 
2129 /*
2130  #] CoSplitFirstArg :
2131  #[ CoSplitLastArg :
2132 */
2133 
2134 int CoSplitLastArg(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgument(s,TYPESPLITLASTARG)); }
2135 
2136 /*
2137  #] CoSplitLastArg :
2138  #[ CoFactArg :
2139 */
2140 
2141 int CoFactArg(UBYTE *s) {
2142  if ( ( AC.topolynomialflag & TOPOLYNOMIALFLAG ) != 0 ) {
2143  MesPrint("&ToPolynomial statement and FactArg statement are not allowed in the same module");
2144  return(1);
2145  }
2146  AC.topolynomialflag |= FACTARGFLAG;
2147  return(DoArgument(s,TYPEFACTARG));
2148 }
2149 
2150 /*
2151  #] CoFactArg :
2152  #[ DoSymmetrize :
2153 
2154  Syntax:
2155  Symmetrize Fun[:[number]] [Fields] -> par = 0;
2156  AntiSymmetrize Fun[:[number]] [Fields] -> par = 1;
2157  CycleSymmetrize Fun[:[number]] [Fields] -> par = 2;
2158  RCycleSymmetrize Fun[:[number]] [Fields]-> par = 3;
2159 */
2160 
2161 int DoSymmetrize(UBYTE *s, int par)
2162 {
2163  GETIDENTITY
2164  int extra = 0, error = 0, err, fix, x, groupsize, num, i;
2165  UBYTE *name, c;
2166  WORD funnum, *w, *ww, type;
2167  for(;;) {
2168  name = s;
2169  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
2170  MesPrint("&Improper function name");
2171  return(1);
2172  }
2173  c = *s; *s = 0;
2174  if ( c != ',' || ( FG.cTable[s[1]] != 0 && s[1] != '[' ) ) break;
2175  if ( par <= 0 && StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"cyclic") == 0 ) extra = 2;
2176  else if ( par <= 0 && StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"rcyclic") == 0 ) extra = 6;
2177  else {
2178  MesPrint("&Illegal option: '%s'",name);
2179  error = 1;
2180  }
2181  *s++ = c;
2182  }
2183  if ( ( err = GetVar(name,&type,&funnum,CFUNCTION,WITHAUTO) ) == NAMENOTFOUND ) {
2184  MesPrint("&Undefined function: %s",name);
2185  AddFunction(name,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
2186  *s++ = c;
2187  return(1);
2188  }
2189  funnum += FUNCTION;
2190  if ( err == -1 ) error = 1;
2191  *s = c;
2192  if ( *s == ':' ) {
2193  s++;
2194  if ( *s == ',' || *s == '(' || *s == 0 ) fix = -1;
2195  else if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2196  ParseNumber(fix,s)
2197  if ( fix == 0 )
2198  Warning("Restriction to zero arguments removed");
2199  }
2200  else {
2201  MesPrint("&Illegal character after :");
2202  return(1);
2203  }
2204  }
2205  else fix = 0;
2206  w = AT.WorkPointer;
2207  *w++ = TYPEOPERATION;
2208  w++;
2209  *w++ = SYMMETRIZE;
2210  *w++ = par | extra;
2211  *w++ = funnum;
2212  *w++ = fix;
2213 /*
2214  And now the argument lists. We have either ,#,#,... or (#,#,..,#),(#,...
2215 */
2216  w += 2; ww = w; groupsize = -1;
2217  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2218  while ( *s ) {
2219  if ( *s == '(' ) {
2220  s++; num = 0;
2221  while ( *s && *s != ')' ) {
2222  if ( *s == ',' ) { s++; continue; }
2223  if ( FG.cTable[*s] != 1 ) goto illarg;
2224  ParseNumber(x,s)
2225  if ( x <= 0 || ( fix > 0 && x > fix ) ) goto illnum;
2226  num++;
2227  *w++ = x-1;
2228  }
2229  if ( *s == 0 ) {
2230  MesPrint("&Improper termination of statement");
2231  return(1);
2232  }
2233  if ( groupsize < 0 ) groupsize = num;
2234  else if ( groupsize != num ) goto group;
2235  s++;
2236  }
2237  else if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2238  if ( groupsize < 0 ) groupsize = 1;
2239  else if ( groupsize != 1 ) {
2240 group: MesPrint("&All groups should have the same number of arguments");
2241  return(1);
2242  }
2243  ParseNumber(x,s)
2244  if ( x <= 0 || ( fix > 0 && x > fix ) ) {
2245 illnum: MesPrint("&Illegal argument number: %d",x);
2246  return(1);
2247  }
2248  *w++ = x-1;
2249  }
2250  else {
2251 illarg: MesPrint("&Illegal argument");
2252  return(1);
2253  }
2254  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2255  }
2256 /*
2257  Now the completion
2258 */
2259  if ( w == ww ) {
2260  ww[-1] = 1;
2261  ww[-2] = 0;
2262  if ( fix > 0 ) {
2263  for ( i = 0; i < fix; i++ ) *w++ = i;
2264  ww[-2] = fix; /* Bugfix 31-oct-2001. Reported by York Schroeder */
2265  }
2266  }
2267  else {
2268  ww[-1] = groupsize;
2269  ww[-2] = (w-ww)/groupsize;
2270  }
2271  AT.WorkPointer[1] = w - AT.WorkPointer;
2272  AddNtoL(AT.WorkPointer[1],AT.WorkPointer);
2273  return(error);
2274 }
2275 
2276 /*
2277  #] DoSymmetrize :
2278  #[ CoSymmetrize :
2279 */
2280 
2281 int CoSymmetrize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoSymmetrize(s,SYMMETRIC)); }
2282 
2283 /*
2284  #] CoSymmetrize :
2285  #[ CoAntiSymmetrize :
2286 */
2287 
2288 int CoAntiSymmetrize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoSymmetrize(s,ANTISYMMETRIC)); }
2289 
2290 /*
2291  #] CoAntiSymmetrize :
2292  #[ CoCycleSymmetrize :
2293 */
2294 
2295 int CoCycleSymmetrize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoSymmetrize(s,CYCLESYMMETRIC)); }
2296 
2297 /*
2298  #] CoCycleSymmetrize :
2299  #[ CoRCycleSymmetrize :
2300 */
2301 
2302 int CoRCycleSymmetrize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoSymmetrize(s,RCYCLESYMMETRIC)); }
2303 
2304 /*
2305  #] CoRCycleSymmetrize :
2306  #[ CoWrite :
2307 */
2308 
2309 int CoWrite(UBYTE *s)
2310 {
2311  GETIDENTITY
2312  UBYTE *option;
2313  KEYWORDV *key;
2314  option = s;
2315  if ( ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) || *s != 0 ) {
2316  MesPrint("&Proper use of write statement is: write option");
2317  return(1);
2318  }
2319  key = (KEYWORDV *)FindInKeyWord(option,(KEYWORD *)writeoptions,sizeof(writeoptions)/sizeof(KEYWORD));
2320  if ( key == 0 ) {
2321  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in write statement");
2322  return(1);
2323  }
2324  *key->var = key->type;
2325  AR.SortType = AC.SortType;
2326  return(0);
2327 }
2328 
2329 /*
2330  #] CoWrite :
2331  #[ CoNWrite :
2332 */
2333 
2334 int CoNWrite(UBYTE *s)
2335 {
2336  GETIDENTITY
2337  UBYTE *option;
2338  KEYWORDV *key;
2339  option = s;
2340  if ( ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) || *s != 0 ) {
2341  MesPrint("&Proper use of nwrite statement is: nwrite option");
2342  return(1);
2343  }
2344  key = (KEYWORDV *)FindInKeyWord(option,(KEYWORD *)writeoptions,sizeof(writeoptions)/sizeof(KEYWORD));
2345  if ( key == 0 ) {
2346  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in nwrite statement");
2347  return(1);
2348  }
2349  *key->var = key->flags;
2350  AR.SortType = AC.SortType;
2351  return(0);
2352 }
2353 
2354 /*
2355  #] CoNWrite :
2356  #[ CoRatio :
2357 */
2358 
2359 static WORD ratstring[6] = { TYPEOPERATION, 6, RATIO, 0, 0, 0 };
2360 
2361 int CoRatio(UBYTE *s)
2362 {
2363  UBYTE c, *t;
2364  int i, type, error = 0;
2365  WORD numsym, *rs;
2366  rs = ratstring+3;
2367  for ( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
2368  if ( *s ) {
2369  t = s;
2370  s = SkipAName(s);
2371  c = *s; *s = 0;
2372  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,t,&numsym,WITHAUTO) ) != CSYMBOL )
2373  && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
2374  MesPrint("&%s is not a symbol",t);
2375  error = 4;
2376  if ( type < 0 ) numsym = AddSymbol(t,-MAXPOWER,MAXPOWER,0,0);
2377  }
2378  *s = c;
2379  if ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2380  }
2381  else {
2382  if ( error == 0 )
2383  MesPrint("&The ratio statement needs three symbols for its arguments");
2384  error++;
2385  numsym = 0;
2386  }
2387  *rs++ = numsym;
2388  }
2389  AddNtoL(6,ratstring);
2390  return(error);
2391 }
2392 
2393 /*
2394  #] CoRatio :
2395  #[ CoRedefine :
2396 
2397  We have a preprocessor variable and a (new) value for it.
2398  This value is inside a string that must be stored.
2399 */
2400 
2401 int CoRedefine(UBYTE *s)
2402 {
2403  UBYTE *name, c, *args = 0;
2404  int numprevar;
2405  WORD code[2];
2406  name = s;
2407  if ( FG.cTable[*s] || ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 || s[-1] == '_' ) {
2408  MesPrint("&Illegal name for preprocessor variable in redefine statement");
2409  return(1);
2410  }
2411  c = *s; *s = 0;
2412  for ( numprevar = NumPre-1; numprevar >= 0; numprevar-- ) {
2413  if ( StrCmp(name,PreVar[numprevar].name) == 0 ) break;
2414  }
2415  if ( numprevar < 0 ) {
2416  MesPrint("&There is no preprocessor variable with the name `%s'",name);
2417  *s = c;
2418  return(1);
2419  }
2420  *s = c;
2421 /*
2422  The next code worries about arguments.
2423  It is a direct copy of the code in TheDefine in the preprocessor.
2424 */
2425  if ( *s == '(' ) { /* arguments. scan for correctness */
2426  s++; args = s;
2427  for (;;) {
2428  if ( chartype[*s] != 0 ) goto illarg;
2429  s++;
2430  while ( chartype[*s] <= 1 ) s++;
2431  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
2432  if ( *s == ')' ) break;
2433  if ( *s != ',' ) goto illargs;
2434  s++;
2435  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
2436  }
2437  *s++ = 0;
2438  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
2439  }
2440  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2441  if ( *s != '"' ) {
2442 encl: MesPrint("&Value for %s should be enclosed in double quotes"
2443  ,PreVar[numprevar].name);
2444  return(1);
2445  }
2446  s++; name = s; /* actually name points to the new string */
2447  while ( *s && *s != '"' ) { if ( *s == '\\' ) s++; s++; }
2448  if ( *s != '"' ) goto encl;
2449  *s = 0;
2450  code[0] = TYPEREDEFPRE; code[1] = numprevar;
2451 /*
2452  AddComString(2,code,name,0);
2453 */
2454  Add2ComStrings(2,code,name,args);
2455  *s = '"';
2456 #ifdef PARALLELCODE
2457 /*
2458  Now we prepare the input numbering system for pthreads.
2459  We need a list of preprocessor variables that are redefined in this
2460  module.
2461 */
2462  {
2463  int j;
2464  WORD *newpf;
2465  LONG *newin;
2466  for ( j = 0; j < AC.numpfirstnum; j++ ) {
2467  if ( numprevar == AC.pfirstnum[j] ) break;
2468  }
2469  if ( j >= AC.numpfirstnum ) { /* add to list */
2470  if ( j >= AC.sizepfirstnum ) {
2471  if ( AC.sizepfirstnum <= 0 ) { AC.sizepfirstnum = 10; }
2472  else { AC.sizepfirstnum = 2 * AC.sizepfirstnum; }
2473  newin = (LONG *)Malloc1(AC.sizepfirstnum*(sizeof(WORD)+sizeof(LONG)),"AC.pfirstnum");
2474  newpf = (WORD *)(newin+AC.sizepfirstnum);
2475  for ( j = 0; j < AC.numpfirstnum; j++ ) {
2476  newpf[j] = AC.pfirstnum[j];
2477  newin[j] = AC.inputnumbers[j];
2478  }
2479  if ( AC.inputnumbers ) M_free(AC.inputnumbers,"AC.pfirstnum");
2480  AC.inputnumbers = newin;
2481  AC.pfirstnum = newpf;
2482  }
2483  AC.pfirstnum[AC.numpfirstnum] = numprevar;
2484  AC.inputnumbers[AC.numpfirstnum] = -1;
2485  AC.numpfirstnum++;
2486  }
2487  }
2488 #endif
2489  return(0);
2490 illarg:;
2491  MesPrint("&Illegally formed name in argument of redefine statement");
2492  return(1);
2493 illargs:;
2494  MesPrint("&Illegally formed arguments in redefine statement");
2495  return(1);
2496 }
2497 
2498 /*
2499  #] CoRedefine :
2500  #[ CoRenumber :
2501 
2502  renumber or renumber,0 Only exchanges (n^2 until no improvement)
2503  renumber,1 All permutations (could be slow)
2504 */
2505 
2506 int CoRenumber(UBYTE *s)
2507 {
2508  int x;
2509  UBYTE *inp;
2510  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
2511  inp = s;
2512  if ( *s == 0 ) { x = 0; }
2513  else ParseNumber(x,s)
2514  if ( *s == 0 && x >= 0 && x <= 1 ) {
2515  Add3Com(TYPERENUMBER,x);
2516  return(0);
2517  }
2518  MesPrint("&Illegal argument in Renumber statement: '%s'",inp);
2519  return(1);
2520 }
2521 
2522 /*
2523  #] CoRenumber :
2524  #[ CoSum :
2525 */
2526 
2527 int CoSum(UBYTE *s)
2528 {
2529  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
2530  UBYTE *ss = 0, c, *t;
2531  int error = 0, i = 0, type, x;
2532  WORD numindex,number;
2533  while ( *s ) {
2534  t = s;
2535  if ( *s == '$' ) {
2536  t++; s++; while ( FG.cTable[*s] < 2 ) s++;
2537  c = *s; *s = 0;
2538  if ( ( number = GetDollar(t) ) < 0 ) {
2539  MesPrint("&Undefined variable $%s",t);
2540  if ( !error ) error = 1;
2541  number = AddDollar(t,0,0,0);
2542  }
2543  numindex = -number;
2544  }
2545  else {
2546  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) return(1);
2547  c = *s; *s = 0;
2548  if ( ( ( type = GetOName(AC.exprnames,t,&numindex,NOAUTO) ) != NAMENOTFOUND )
2549  || ( ( type = GetOName(AC.varnames,t,&numindex,WITHAUTO) ) != CINDEX ) ) {
2550  if ( type != NAMENOTFOUND ) error = NameConflict(type,t);
2551  else {
2552  MesPrint("&%s should have been declared as an index",t);
2553  error = 1;
2554  numindex = AddIndex(s,AC.lDefDim,AC.lDefDim4) + AM.OffsetIndex;
2555  }
2556  }
2557  }
2558  Add3Com(TYPESUM,numindex);
2559  i = 3; *s = c;
2560  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
2561  if ( *s != ',' ) {
2562  MesPrint("&Illegal separator between objects in sum statement.");
2563  return(1);
2564  }
2565  s++;
2566  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 || *s == '[' || *s == '$' ) {
2567  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 || *s == '[' || *s == '$' ) {
2568  if ( *s == '$' ) {
2569  s++;
2570  ss = t = s;
2571  while ( FG.cTable[*s] < 2 ) s++;
2572  c = *s; *s = 0;
2573  if ( ( number = GetDollar(t) ) < 0 ) {
2574  MesPrint("&Undefined variable $%s",t);
2575  if ( !error ) error = 1;
2576  number = AddDollar(t,0,0,0);
2577  }
2578  numindex = -number;
2579  }
2580  else {
2581  ss = t = s;
2582  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) return(1);
2583  c = *s; *s = 0;
2584  if ( ( ( type = GetOName(AC.exprnames,t,&numindex,NOAUTO) ) != NAMENOTFOUND )
2585  || ( ( type = GetOName(AC.varnames,t,&numindex,WITHAUTO) ) != CINDEX ) ) {
2586  if ( type != NAMENOTFOUND ) error = NameConflict(type,t);
2587  else {
2588  MesPrint("&%s should have been declared as an index",t);
2589  error = 1;
2590  numindex = AddIndex(s,AC.lDefDim,AC.lDefDim4) + AM.OffsetIndex;
2591  }
2592  }
2593  }
2594  AddToCB(C,numindex)
2595  i++;
2596  C->Pointer[-i+1] = i;
2597  *s = c;
2598  if ( *s == 0 ) return(error);
2599  if ( *s != ',' ) {
2600  MesPrint("&Illegal separator between objects in sum statement.");
2601  return(1);
2602  }
2603  s++;
2604  }
2605  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2606  C->Pointer[-i+1]--; C->Pointer--; s = ss;
2607  }
2608  }
2609  else if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2610  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2611  t = s;
2612  x = *s++ - '0';
2613  while( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) x = 10*x + *s++ - '0';
2614  if ( *s && *s != ',' ) {
2615  MesPrint("&%s is not a legal fixed index",t);
2616  return(1);
2617  }
2618  else if ( x >= AM.OffsetIndex ) {
2619  MesPrint("&%d is too large to be a fixed index",x);
2620  error = 1;
2621  }
2622  else {
2623  AddToCB(C,x)
2624  i++;
2625  C->Pointer[-i] = TYPESUMFIX;
2626  C->Pointer[-i+1] = i;
2627  }
2628  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
2629  s++;
2630  }
2631  }
2632  else {
2633  MesPrint("&Illegal object in sum statement");
2634  error = 1;
2635  }
2636  }
2637  return(error);
2638 }
2639 
2640 /*
2641  #] CoSum :
2642  #[ CoToTensor :
2643 */
2644 
2645 static WORD cttarray[7] = { TYPEOPERATION,7,TENVEC,0,0,1,0 };
2646 
2647 int CoToTensor(UBYTE *s)
2648 {
2649  UBYTE c, *t;
2650  int type, j, nargs, error = 0;
2651  WORD number, dol[2] = { 0, 0 };
2652  cttarray[1] = 6; /* length */
2653  cttarray[3] = 0; /* tensor */
2654  cttarray[4] = 0; /* vector */
2655  cttarray[5] = 1; /* option flags */
2656 /* cttarray[6] = 0; set veto */
2657 /*
2658  Count the number of the arguments. The validity of them is not checked here.
2659 */
2660  nargs = 0;
2661  t = s;
2662  for (;;) {
2663  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
2664  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
2665  if ( *s == '!' ) {
2666  s++;
2667  if ( *s == '{' ) {
2668  SKIPBRA2(s)
2669  s++;
2670  } else {
2671  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) goto syntax_error;
2672  }
2673  } else {
2674  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) goto syntax_error;
2675  }
2676  nargs++;
2677  }
2678  if ( nargs < 2 ) goto not_enough_arguments;
2679  s = t;
2680 /*
2681  Parse options, which are given as the arguments except the last two.
2682 */
2683  for ( j = 2; j < nargs; j++ ) {
2684  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
2685  if ( *s == '!' ) {
2686 /*
2687  Handle !set or !{vector,...}. Note: If two or more sets are
2688  specified, then only the last one is used.
2689 */
2690  s++;
2691  cttarray[1] = 7;
2692  cttarray[5] |= 8;
2693  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 || *s == '[' || *s == '_' ) {
2694  t = s;
2695  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) goto syntax_error;
2696  c = *s; *s = 0;
2697  type = GetName(AC.varnames,t,&number,WITHAUTO);
2698  if ( type == CVECTOR ) {
2699 /*
2700  As written in the manual, "!p" (without "{}") should work.
2701 */
2702  cttarray[6] = DoTempSet(t,s);
2703  *s = c;
2704  goto check_tempset;
2705  }
2706  else if ( type != CSET ) {
2707  MesPrint("&%s is not the name of a set or a vector",t);
2708  error = 1;
2709  }
2710  *s = c;
2711  cttarray[6] = number;
2712  }
2713  else if ( *s == '{' ) {
2714  t = ++s; SKIPBRA2(s) *s = 0;
2715  cttarray[6] = DoTempSet(t,s);
2716  *s++ = '}';
2717 check_tempset:
2718  if ( cttarray[6] < 0 ) {
2719  error = 1;
2720  }
2721  if ( AC.wildflag ) {
2722  MesPrint("&Improper use of wildcard(s) in set specification");
2723  error = 1;
2724  }
2725  }
2726  } else {
2727 /*
2728  Other options.
2729 */
2730  t = s;
2731  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) goto syntax_error;
2732  c = *s; *s = 0;
2733  if ( StrICmp(t,(UBYTE *)"nosquare") == 0 ) cttarray[5] |= 2;
2734  else if ( StrICmp(t,(UBYTE *)"functions") == 0 ) cttarray[5] |= 4;
2735  else {
2736  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in ToTensor statement: '%s'",t);
2737  *s = c;
2738  return(1);
2739  }
2740  *s = c;
2741  }
2742  }
2743 /*
2744  Now parse a vector and a tensor. The ordering doesn't matter.
2745 */
2746  for ( j = 0; j < 2; j++ ) {
2747  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
2748  t = s;
2749  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) goto syntax_error;
2750  c = *s; *s = 0;
2751  if ( t[0] == '$' ) {
2752  dol[j] = GetDollar(t+1);
2753  if ( dol[j] < 0 ) dol[j] = AddDollar(t+1,DOLUNDEFINED,0,0);
2754  } else {
2755  type = GetName(AC.varnames,t,&number,WITHAUTO);
2756  if ( type == CVECTOR ) {
2757  cttarray[4] = number + AM.OffsetVector;
2758  }
2759  else if ( type == CFUNCTION && ( functions[number].spec > 0 ) ) {
2760  cttarray[3] = number + FUNCTION;
2761  }
2762  else {
2763  MesPrint("&%s is not a vector or a tensor",t);
2764  error = 1;
2765  }
2766  }
2767  *s = c;
2768  }
2769  if ( cttarray[3] == 0 || cttarray[4] == 0 ) {
2770  if ( dol[0] == 0 && dol[1] == 0 ) {
2771  goto not_enough_arguments;
2772  }
2773  else if ( cttarray[3] ) {
2774  if ( dol[1] ) cttarray[4] = dol[1];
2775  else if ( dol[0] ) { cttarray[4] = dol[0]; }
2776  else {
2777  goto not_enough_arguments;
2778  }
2779  }
2780  else if ( cttarray[4] ) {
2781  if ( dol[1] ) { cttarray[3] = -dol[1]; }
2782  else if ( dol[0] ) cttarray[3] = -dol[0];
2783  else {
2784  goto not_enough_arguments;
2785  }
2786  }
2787  else {
2788  if ( dol[0] == 0 || dol[1] == 0 ) {
2789  goto not_enough_arguments;
2790  }
2791  else {
2792  cttarray[3] = -dol[0]; cttarray[4] = dol[1];
2793  }
2794  }
2795  }
2796  AddNtoL(cttarray[1],cttarray);
2797  return(error);
2798 
2799 syntax_error:
2800  MesPrint("&Syntax error in ToTensor statement");
2801  return(1);
2802 
2803 not_enough_arguments:
2804  MesPrint("&ToTensor statement needs a vector and a tensor");
2805  return(1);
2806 }
2807 
2808 /*
2809  #] CoToTensor :
2810  #[ CoToVector :
2811 */
2812 
2813 static WORD ctvarray[6] = { TYPEOPERATION,6,TENVEC,0,0,0 };
2814 
2815 int CoToVector(UBYTE *s)
2816 {
2817  UBYTE *t, c;
2818  int j, type, error = 0;
2819  WORD number, dol[2];
2820  dol[0] = dol[1] = 0;
2821  ctvarray[3] = ctvarray[4] = ctvarray[5] = 0;
2822  for ( j = 0; j < 2; j++ ) {
2823  t = s;
2824  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
2825 proper: MesPrint("&Arguments of ToVector statement should be a vector and a tensor");
2826  return(1);
2827  }
2828  c = *s; *s = 0;
2829  if ( *t == '$' ) {
2830  dol[j] = GetDollar(t+1);
2831  if ( dol[j] < 0 ) dol[j] = AddDollar(t+1,DOLUNDEFINED,0,0);
2832  }
2833  else if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,t,&number,WITHAUTO) ) == CVECTOR )
2834  ctvarray[4] = number + AM.OffsetVector;
2835  else if ( type == CFUNCTION && ( functions[number].spec > 0 ) )
2836  ctvarray[3] = number+FUNCTION;
2837  else {
2838  MesPrint("&%s is not a vector or a tensor",t);
2839  error = 1;
2840  }
2841  *s = c; if ( *s && *s != ',' ) goto proper;
2842  if ( *s ) s++;
2843  }
2844  if ( *s != 0 ) goto proper;
2845  if ( ctvarray[3] == 0 || ctvarray[4] == 0 ) {
2846  if ( dol[0] == 0 && dol[1] == 0 ) {
2847  MesPrint("&ToVector statement needs a vector and a tensor");
2848  error = 1;
2849  }
2850  else if ( ctvarray[3] ) {
2851  if ( dol[1] ) ctvarray[4] = dol[1];
2852  else if ( dol[0] ) ctvarray[4] = dol[0];
2853  else {
2854  MesPrint("&ToVector statement needs a vector and a tensor");
2855  error = 1;
2856  }
2857  }
2858  else if ( ctvarray[4] ) {
2859  if ( dol[1] ) ctvarray[3] = -dol[1];
2860  else if ( dol[0] ) ctvarray[3] = -dol[0];
2861  else {
2862  MesPrint("&ToVector statement needs a vector and a tensor");
2863  error = 1;
2864  }
2865  }
2866  else {
2867  if ( dol[0] == 0 || dol[1] == 0 ) {
2868  MesPrint("&ToVector statement needs a vector and a tensor");
2869  error = 1;
2870  }
2871  else {
2872  ctvarray[3] = -dol[0]; ctvarray[4] = dol[1];
2873  }
2874  }
2875  }
2876  AddNtoL(6,ctvarray);
2877  return(error);
2878 }
2879 
2880 /*
2881  #] CoToVector :
2882  #[ CoTrace4 :
2883 */
2884 
2885 int CoTrace4(UBYTE *s)
2886 {
2887  int error = 0, type, option = CHISHOLM;
2888  UBYTE *t, c;
2889  WORD numindex, one = 1;
2890  KEYWORD *key;
2891  for (;;) {
2892  t = s;
2893  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) break;
2894  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
2895 proper: MesPrint("&Proper syntax for Trace4 is 'Trace4[,options],index;'");
2896  return(1);
2897  }
2898  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
2899  c = *s; *s = 0;
2900  if ( ( key = FindKeyWord(t,trace4options,
2901  sizeof(trace4options)/sizeof(KEYWORD)) ) == 0 ) break;
2902  else {
2903  option |= key->type;
2904  option &= ~key->flags;
2905  }
2906  if ( ( *s++ = c ) != ',' ) {
2907  MesPrint("&Illegal separator in Trace4 statement");
2908  return(1);
2909  }
2910  if ( *s == 0 ) goto proper;
2911  }
2912  s = t;
2913  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2914 retry:
2915  ParseNumber(numindex,s)
2916  if ( *s != 0 ) {
2917  MesPrint("&Last argument of Trace4 should be an index");
2918  return(1);
2919  }
2920  if ( numindex >= AM.OffsetIndex ) {
2921  MesPrint("&fixed index >= %d. Change value of OffsetIndex in setup file"
2922  ,AM.OffsetIndex);
2923  return(1);
2924  }
2925  }
2926  else if ( *s == '$' ) {
2927  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.dollarnames,s+1,&numindex,NOAUTO) ) == CDOLLAR )
2928  numindex = -numindex;
2929  else {
2930  MesPrint("&%s is undefined",s);
2931  numindex = AddDollar(s+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
2932  return(1);
2933  }
2934 tests: s = SkipAName(s);
2935  if ( *s != 0 ) {
2936  MesPrint("&Trace4 should have a single index or $variable for its argument");
2937  return(1);
2938  }
2939  }
2940  else if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numindex,WITHAUTO) ) == CINDEX ) {
2941  numindex += AM.OffsetIndex;
2942  goto tests;
2943  }
2944  else if ( type != -1 ) {
2945  if ( type != CDUBIOUS ) {
2946  if ( ( FG.cTable[*s] != 0 ) && ( *s != '[' ) ) {
2947  if ( *s == '+' && FG.cTable[s[1]] == 1 ) { s++; goto retry; }
2948  goto proper;
2949  }
2950  NameConflict(type,s);
2951  type = MakeDubious(AC.varnames,s,&numindex);
2952  }
2953  return(1);
2954  }
2955  else {
2956  MesPrint("&%s is not an index",s);
2957  numindex = AddIndex(s,AC.lDefDim,AC.lDefDim4) + AM.OffsetIndex;
2958  return(1);
2959  }
2960  if ( error ) return(error);
2961  if ( ( option & CHISHOLM ) != 0 )
2962  Add4Com(TYPECHISHOLM,numindex,(option & ALSOREVERSE));
2963  Add5Com(TYPEOPERATION,TAKETRACE,4 + (option & NOTRICK),numindex);
2964  return(0);
2965 }
2966 
2967 /*
2968  #] CoTrace4 :
2969  #[ CoTraceN :
2970 */
2971 
2972 int CoTraceN(UBYTE *s)
2973 {
2974  WORD numindex, one = 1;
2975  int type;
2976  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
2977 retry:
2978  ParseNumber(numindex,s)
2979  if ( *s != 0 ) {
2980 proper: MesPrint("&TraceN should have a single index for its argument");
2981  return(1);
2982  }
2983  if ( numindex >= AM.OffsetIndex ) {
2984  MesPrint("&fixed index >= %d. Change value of OffsetIndex in setup file"
2985  ,AM.OffsetIndex);
2986  return(1);
2987  }
2988  }
2989  else if ( *s == '$' ) {
2990  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.dollarnames,s+1,&numindex,NOAUTO) ) == CDOLLAR )
2991  numindex = -numindex;
2992  else {
2993  MesPrint("&%s is undefined",s);
2994  numindex = AddDollar(s+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
2995  return(1);
2996  }
2997 tests: s = SkipAName(s);
2998  if ( *s != 0 ) {
2999  MesPrint("&TraceN should have a single index or $variable for its argument");
3000  return(1);
3001  }
3002  }
3003  else if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numindex,WITHAUTO) ) == CINDEX ) {
3004  numindex += AM.OffsetIndex;
3005  goto tests;
3006  }
3007  else if ( type != -1 ) {
3008  if ( type != CDUBIOUS ) {
3009  if ( ( FG.cTable[*s] != 0 ) && ( *s != '[' ) ) {
3010  if ( *s == '+' && FG.cTable[s[1]] == 1 ) { s++; goto retry; }
3011  goto proper;
3012  }
3013  NameConflict(type,s);
3014  type = MakeDubious(AC.varnames,s,&numindex);
3015  }
3016  return(1);
3017  }
3018  else {
3019  MesPrint("&%s is not an index",s);
3020  numindex = AddIndex(s,AC.lDefDim,AC.lDefDim4) + AM.OffsetIndex;
3021  return(1);
3022  }
3023  Add5Com(TYPEOPERATION,TAKETRACE,0,numindex);
3024  return(0);
3025 }
