3026 
3027 /*
3028  #] CoTraceN :
3029  #[ CoChisholm :
3030 */
3031 
3032 int CoChisholm(UBYTE *s)
3033 {
3034  int error = 0, type, option = CHISHOLM;
3035  UBYTE *t, c;
3036  WORD numindex, one = 1;
3037  KEYWORD *key;
3038  for (;;) {
3039  t = s;
3040  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) break;
3041  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
3042 proper: MesPrint("&Proper syntax for Chisholm is 'Chisholm[,options],index;'");
3043  return(1);
3044  }
3045  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
3046  c = *s; *s = 0;
3047  if ( ( key = FindKeyWord(t,chisoptions,
3048  sizeof(chisoptions)/sizeof(KEYWORD)) ) == 0 ) break;
3049  else {
3050  option |= key->type;
3051  option &= ~key->flags;
3052  }
3053  if ( ( *s++ = c ) != ',' ) {
3054  MesPrint("&Illegal separator in Chisholm statement");
3055  return(1);
3056  }
3057  if ( *s == 0 ) goto proper;
3058  }
3059  s = t;
3060  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
3061  ParseNumber(numindex,s)
3062  if ( *s != 0 ) {
3063  MesPrint("&Last argument of Chisholm should be an index");
3064  return(1);
3065  }
3066  if ( numindex >= AM.OffsetIndex ) {
3067  MesPrint("&fixed index >= %d. Change value of OffsetIndex in setup file"
3068  ,AM.OffsetIndex);
3069  return(1);
3070  }
3071  }
3072  else if ( *s == '$' ) {
3073  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.dollarnames,s+1,&numindex,NOAUTO) ) == CDOLLAR )
3074  numindex = -numindex;
3075  else {
3076  MesPrint("&%s is undefined",s);
3077  numindex = AddDollar(s+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
3078  return(1);
3079  }
3080 tests: s = SkipAName(s);
3081  if ( *s != 0 ) {
3082  MesPrint("&Chisholm should have a single index or $variable for its argument");
3083  return(1);
3084  }
3085  }
3086  else if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numindex,WITHAUTO) ) == CINDEX ) {
3087  numindex += AM.OffsetIndex;
3088  goto tests;
3089  }
3090  else if ( type != -1 ) {
3091  if ( type != CDUBIOUS ) {
3092  NameConflict(type,s);
3093  type = MakeDubious(AC.varnames,s,&numindex);
3094  }
3095  return(1);
3096  }
3097  else {
3098  MesPrint("&%s is not an index",s);
3099  numindex = AddIndex(s,AC.lDefDim,AC.lDefDim4) + AM.OffsetIndex;
3100  return(1);
3101  }
3102  if ( error ) return(error);
3103  Add4Com(TYPECHISHOLM,numindex,(option & ALSOREVERSE));
3104  return(0);
3105 }
3106 
3107 /*
3108  #] CoChisholm :
3109  #[ DoChain :
3110 
3111  Syntax: Chainxx functionname;
3112 */
3113 
3114 int DoChain(UBYTE *s, int option)
3115 {
3116  WORD numfunc,type;
3117  if ( *s == '$' ) {
3118  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.dollarnames,s+1,&numfunc,NOAUTO) ) == CDOLLAR )
3119  numfunc = -numfunc;
3120  else {
3121  MesPrint("&%s is undefined",s);
3122  numfunc = AddDollar(s+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
3123  return(1);
3124  }
3125 tests: s = SkipAName(s);
3126  if ( *s != 0 ) {
3127  MesPrint("&ChainIn/ChainOut should have a single function or $variable for its argument");
3128  return(1);
3129  }
3130  }
3131  else if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfunc,WITHAUTO) ) == CFUNCTION ) {
3132  numfunc += FUNCTION;
3133  goto tests;
3134  }
3135  else if ( type != -1 ) {
3136  if ( type != CDUBIOUS ) {
3137  NameConflict(type,s);
3138  type = MakeDubious(AC.varnames,s,&numfunc);
3139  }
3140  return(1);
3141  }
3142  else {
3143  MesPrint("&%s is not a function",s);
3144  numfunc = AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1) + FUNCTION;
3145  return(1);
3146  }
3147  Add3Com(option,numfunc);
3148  return(0);
3149 }
3150 
3151 /*
3152  #] DoChain :
3153  #[ CoChainin :
3154 
3155  Syntax: Chainin functionname;
3156 */
3157 
3158 int CoChainin(UBYTE *s)
3159 {
3160  return(DoChain(s,TYPECHAININ));
3161 }
3162 
3163 /*
3164  #] CoChainin :
3165  #[ CoChainout :
3166 
3167  Syntax: Chainout functionname;
3168 */
3169 
3170 int CoChainout(UBYTE *s)
3171 {
3172  return(DoChain(s,TYPECHAINOUT));
3173 }
3174 
3175 /*
3176  #] CoChainout :
3177  #[ CoExit :
3178 */
3179 
3180 int CoExit(UBYTE *s)
3181 {
3182  UBYTE *name;
3183  WORD code = TYPEEXIT;
3184  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
3185  if ( *s == 0 ) {
3186  Add3Com(TYPEEXIT,0);
3187  return(0);
3188  }
3189  name = s+1;
3190  s++;
3191  while ( *s ) { if ( *s == '\\' ) s++; s++; }
3192  if ( name[-1] != '"' || s[-1] != '"' ) {
3193  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for exit statement");
3194  return(1);
3195  }
3196  s[-1] = 0;
3197  AddComString(1,&code,name,0);
3198  s[-1] = '"';
3199  return(0);
3200 }
3201 
3202 /*
3203  #] CoExit :
3204  #[ CoInParallel :
3205 */
3206 
3207 int CoInParallel(UBYTE *s)
3208 {
3209  return(DoInParallel(s,1));
3210 }
3211 
3212 /*
3213  #] CoInParallel :
3214  #[ CoNotInParallel :
3215 */
3216 
3217 int CoNotInParallel(UBYTE *s)
3218 {
3219  return(DoInParallel(s,0));
3220 }
3221 
3222 /*
3223  #] CoNotInParallel :
3224  #[ DoInParallel :
3225 
3226  InParallel;
3227  InParallel,names;
3228  NotInParallel;
3229  NotInParallel,names;
3230 */
3231 
3232 int DoInParallel(UBYTE *s, int par)
3233 {
3234 #ifdef PARALLELCODE
3235  EXPRESSIONS e;
3236  WORD i;
3237 #endif
3238  WORD number;
3239  UBYTE *t, c;
3240  int error = 0;
3241 #ifndef WITHPTHREADS
3242  DUMMYUSE(par);
3243 #endif
3244  if ( *s == 0 ) {
3245  AC.inparallelflag = par;
3246 #ifdef PARALLELCODE
3247  for ( i = NumExpressions-1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
3248  e = Expressions+i;
3249  if ( e->status == LOCALEXPRESSION || e->status == GLOBALEXPRESSION
3250  || e->status == UNHIDELEXPRESSION || e->status == UNHIDEGEXPRESSION
3251  ) {
3252  e->partodo = par;
3253  }
3254  }
3255 #endif
3256  }
3257  else {
3258  for(;;) { /* Look for a (comma separated) list of variables */
3259  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
3260  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
3261  if ( *s == '[' || FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) {
3262  t = s;
3263  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
3264  MesPrint("&Improper name for an expression: '%s'",t);
3265  return(1);
3266  }
3267  c = *s; *s = 0;
3268  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,t,&number,NOAUTO) == CEXPRESSION ) {
3269 #ifdef PARALLELCODE
3270  e = Expressions+number;
3271  if ( e->status == LOCALEXPRESSION || e->status == GLOBALEXPRESSION
3272  || e->status == UNHIDELEXPRESSION || e->status == UNHIDEGEXPRESSION
3273  ) {
3274  e->partodo = par;
3275  }
3276 #endif
3277  }
3278  else if ( GetName(AC.varnames,t,&number,NOAUTO) != NAMENOTFOUND ) {
3279  MesPrint("&%s is not an expression",t);
3280  error = 1;
3281  }
3282  *s = c;
3283  }
3284  else {
3285  MesPrint("&Illegal object in InExpression statement");
3286  error = 1;
3287  while ( *s && *s != ',' ) s++;
3288  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
3289  }
3290  }
3291 
3292  }
3293  return(error);
3294 }
3295 
3296 /*
3297  #] DoInParallel :
3298  #[ CoInExpression :
3299 */
3300 
3301 int CoInExpression(UBYTE *s)
3302 {
3303  GETIDENTITY
3304  UBYTE *t, c;
3305  WORD *w, number;
3306  int error = 0;
3307  w = AT.WorkPointer;
3308  if ( AC.inexprlevel >= MAXNEST ) {
3309  MesPrint("@Nesting of inexpression statements more than %d levels",(WORD)MAXNEST);
3310  return(-1);
3311  }
3312  AC.inexprsumcheck[AC.inexprlevel] = NestingChecksum();
3313  AC.inexprstack[AC.inexprlevel] = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Pointer
3314  - cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer + 2;
3315  AC.inexprlevel++;
3316  *w++ = TYPEINEXPRESSION;
3317  w++; w++;
3318  for(;;) { /* Look for a (comma separated) list of variables */
3319  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
3320  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
3321  if ( *s == '[' || FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) {
3322  t = s;
3323  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
3324  MesPrint("&Improper name for an expression: '%s'",t);
3325  return(1);
3326  }
3327  c = *s; *s = 0;
3328  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,t,&number,NOAUTO) == CEXPRESSION ) {
3329  *w++ = number;
3330  }
3331  else if ( GetName(AC.varnames,t,&number,NOAUTO) != NAMENOTFOUND ) {
3332  MesPrint("&%s is not an expression",t);
3333  error = 1;
3334  }
3335  *s = c;
3336  }
3337  else {
3338  MesPrint("&Illegal object in InExpression statement");
3339  error = 1;
3340  while ( *s && *s != ',' ) s++;
3341  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
3342  }
3343  }
3344  AT.WorkPointer[1] = w - AT.WorkPointer;
3345  AddNtoL(AT.WorkPointer[1],AT.WorkPointer);
3346  return(error);
3347 }
3348 
3349 /*
3350  #] CoInExpression :
3351  #[ CoEndInExpression :
3352 */
3353 
3354 int CoEndInExpression(UBYTE *s)
3355 {
3356  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
3357  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
3358  if ( *s ) {
3359  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for EndInExpression statement");
3360  return(1);
3361  }
3362  if ( AC.inexprlevel <= 0 ) {
3363  MesPrint("&EndInExpression without corresponding InExpression statement");
3364  return(1);
3365  }
3366  AC.inexprlevel--;
3367  cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer[AC.inexprstack[AC.inexprlevel]] = C->numlhs;
3368  if ( AC.inexprsumcheck[AC.inexprlevel] != NestingChecksum() ) {
3369  MesNesting();
3370  return(1);
3371  }
3372  return(0);
3373 }
3374 
3375 /*
3376  #] CoEndInExpression :
3377  #[ CoSetExitFlag :
3378 */
3379 
3380 int CoSetExitFlag(UBYTE *s)
3381 {
3382  if ( *s ) {
3383  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for the SetExitFlag statement");
3384  return(1);
3385  }
3386  Add2Com(TYPESETEXIT);
3387  return(0);
3388 }
3389 
3390 /*
3391  #] CoSetExitFlag :
3392  #[ CoTryReplace :
3393 */
3394 int CoTryReplace(UBYTE *p)
3395 {
3396  GETIDENTITY
3397  UBYTE *name, c;
3398  WORD *w, error = 0, i, which = -1, c1, minvec = 0;
3399  w = AT.WorkPointer;
3400  *w++ = TYPETRY;
3401  *w++ = 3;
3402  *w++ = 0;
3403  *w++ = REPLACEMENT;
3404  *w++ = FUNHEAD;
3405  FILLFUN(w)
3406 /*
3407  Now we have to read a function argument for the replace_ function.
3408  Current arguments that we allow involve only single arguments
3409  that do not expand further. No brackets!
3410 */
3411  while ( *p ) {
3412 /*
3413  No numbers yet
3414 */
3415  if ( *p == '-' && minvec == 0 && which == (CVECTOR+1) ) {
3416  minvec = 1; p++;
3417  }
3418  if ( *p == '[' || FG.cTable[*p] == 0 ) {
3419  name = p;
3420  if ( ( p = SkipAName(p) ) == 0 ) return(1);
3421  c = *p; *p = 0;
3422  i = GetName(AC.varnames,name,&c1,WITHAUTO);
3423  if ( which >= 0 && i >= 0 && i != CDUBIOUS && which != (i+1) ) {
3424  MesPrint("&Illegal combination of objects in TryReplace");
3425  error = 1;
3426  }
3427  else if ( minvec && i != CVECTOR && i != CDUBIOUS ) {
3428  MesPrint("&Currently a - sign can be used only with a vector in TryReplace");
3429  error = 1;
3430  }
3431  else switch ( i ) {
3432  case CSYMBOL: *w++ = -SYMBOL; *w++ = c1; break;
3433  case CVECTOR:
3434  if ( minvec ) *w++ = -MINVECTOR;
3435  else *w++ = -VECTOR;
3436  *w++ = c1 + AM.OffsetVector;
3437  minvec = 0;
3438  break;
3439  case CINDEX: *w++ = -INDEX; *w++ = c1 + AM.OffsetIndex;
3440  if ( c1 >= AM.WilInd && c == '?' ) { *p++ = c; c = *p; }
3441  break;
3442  case CFUNCTION: *w++ = -c1-FUNCTION; break;
3443  case CDUBIOUS: minvec = 0; error = 1; break;
3444  default:
3445  MesPrint("&Illegal object type in TryReplace: %s",name);
3446  error = 1;
3447  i = 0;
3448  break;
3449  }
3450  if ( which < 0 ) which = i+1;
3451  else which = -1;
3452  *p = c;
3453  if ( *p == ',' ) p++;
3454  continue;
3455  }
3456  else {
3457  MesPrint("&Illegal object in TryReplace");
3458  error = 1;
3459  while ( *p && *p != ',' ) {
3460  if ( *p == '(' ) SKIPBRA3(p)
3461  else if ( *p == '{' ) SKIPBRA2(p)
3462  else if ( *p == '[' ) SKIPBRA1(p)
3463  else p++;
3464  }
3465  }
3466  if ( *p == ',' ) p++;
3467  if ( which < 0 ) which = 0;
3468  else which = -1;
3469  }
3470  if ( which >= 0 ) {
3471  MesPrint("&Odd number of arguments in TryReplace");
3472  error = 1;
3473  }
3474  i = w - AT.WorkPointer;
3475  AT.WorkPointer[1] = i;
3476  AT.WorkPointer[2] = i - 3;
3477  AT.WorkPointer[4] = i - 3;
3478  AddNtoL((int)i,AT.WorkPointer);
3479  return(error);
3480 }
3481 
3482 /*
3483  #] CoTryReplace :
3484  #[ CoModulus :
3485 
3486  Old syntax: Modulus [-] number [:number]
3487  New syntax: Modulus [option(s)] number
3488  Options are: NoFunctions/CoefficientsOnly/AlsoFunctions
3489  PlusMin/Positive
3490  InverseTable
3491  PrintPowersOf(number)
3492  AlsoPowers/NoPowers
3493  AlsoDollars/NoDollars
3494  Notice: We change the defaults. This may cause problems to some.
3495 */
3496 
3497 int CoModulus(UBYTE *inp)
3498 {
3499  GETIDENTITY
3500  int Retval = 0, sign = 1;
3501  UBYTE *p, c;
3502  while ( *inp == ',' || *inp == ' ' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
3503  if ( *inp == 0 ) {
3504 SwitchOff:
3505  if ( AC.modpowers ) M_free(AC.modpowers,"AC.modpowers");
3506  AC.modpowers = 0;
3507  AN.ncmod = AC.ncmod = 0;
3508  if ( AC.halfmod ) M_free(AC.halfmod,"halfmod");
3509  AC.halfmod = 0; AC.nhalfmod = 0;
3510  if ( AC.modinverses ) M_free(AC.modinverses,"modinverses");
3511  AC.modinverses = 0;
3512  AC.modmode = 0;
3513  return(0);
3514  }
3515 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
3516  if ( AT.aux_ != 0 ) {
3517  MesPrint("&Simultaneous use of floating point and modulus arithmetic makes no sense.");
3518  Retval = 1;
3519  }
3520 #endif
3521  AC.modmode = 0;
3522  if ( *inp == '-' ) {
3523  sign = -1;
3524  inp++;
3525  }
3526  else {
3527  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 0 ) {
3528  p = inp;
3529  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 0 ) inp++;
3530  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
3531  if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"nofunctions") == 0 ) {
3532  AC.modmode &= ~ALSOFUNARGS;
3533  }
3534  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"alsofunctions") == 0 ) {
3535  AC.modmode |= ALSOFUNARGS;
3536  }
3537  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"coefficientsonly") == 0 ) {
3538  AC.modmode &= ~ALSOFUNARGS;
3539  AC.modmode &= ~ALSOPOWERS;
3540  sign = -1;
3541  }
3542  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"plusmin") == 0 ) {
3543  AC.modmode |= POSNEG;
3544  }
3545  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"positive") == 0 ) {
3546  AC.modmode &= ~POSNEG;
3547  }
3548  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"inversetable") == 0 ) {
3549  AC.modmode |= INVERSETABLE;
3550  }
3551  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"noinversetable") == 0 ) {
3552  AC.modmode &= ~INVERSETABLE;
3553  }
3554  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"nodollars") == 0 ) {
3555  AC.modmode &= ~ALSODOLLARS;
3556  }
3557  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"alsodollars") == 0 ) {
3558  AC.modmode |= ALSODOLLARS;
3559  }
3560  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"printpowersof") == 0 ) {
3561  *inp = c;
3562  if ( *inp != '(' ) {
3563 badsyntax:
3564  MesPrint("&Bad syntax in argument of PrintPowersOf(number) in Modulus statement");
3565  return(1);
3566  }
3567  while ( *inp == ',' || *inp == ' ' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
3568  inp++; p = inp;
3569  if ( FG.cTable[*inp] != 1 ) goto badsyntax;
3570  do { inp++; } while ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 1 );
3571  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
3572  if ( GetLong(p,(UWORD *)AC.powmod,&AC.npowmod) ) Retval = -1;
3573  if ( TakeModulus((UWORD *)AC.powmod,&AC.npowmod,AC.cmod,AC.ncmod,NOUNPACK) ) Retval = -1;
3574  if ( AC.npowmod == 0 ) {
3575  MesPrint("&Improper value for generator");
3576  Retval = -1;
3577  }
3578  if ( MakeModTable() ) Retval = -1;
3579  AC.DirtPow = 1;
3580  *inp = c;
3581  while ( *inp == ',' || *inp == ' ' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
3582  if ( *inp != ')' ) goto badsyntax;
3583  inp++;
3584  c = *inp;
3585  }
3586  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"alsopowers") == 0 ) {
3587  AC.modmode |= ALSOPOWERS;
3588  sign = 1;
3589  }
3590  else if ( StrICmp(p,(UBYTE *)"nopowers") == 0 ) {
3591  AC.modmode &= ~ALSOPOWERS;
3592  sign = -1;
3593  }
3594  else {
3595  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option %s in Modulus statement",inp);
3596  return(1);
3597  }
3598  *inp = c;
3599  while ( *inp == ',' || *inp == ' ' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
3600  if ( *inp == 0 ) {
3601  MesPrint("&Modulus statement with no value!!!");
3602  return(1);
3603  }
3604  }
3605  }
3606  p = inp;
3607  if ( FG.cTable[*inp] != 1 ) {
3608  MesPrint("&Invalid value for modulus:%s",inp);
3609  if ( AC.modpowers ) M_free(AC.modpowers,"AC.modpowers");
3610  AC.modpowers = 0;
3611  AN.ncmod = AC.ncmod = 0;
3612  if ( AC.halfmod ) M_free(AC.halfmod,"halfmod");
3613  AC.halfmod = 0; AC.nhalfmod = 0;
3614  if ( AC.modinverses ) M_free(AC.modinverses,"modinverses");
3615  AC.modinverses = 0;
3616  return(1);
3617  }
3618  do { inp++; } while ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 1 );
3619  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
3620  Retval = GetLong(p,(UWORD *)AC.cmod,&AC.ncmod);
3621  if ( Retval == 0 && AC.ncmod == 0 ) goto SwitchOff;
3622  if ( sign < 0 ) AC.ncmod = -AC.ncmod;
3623  AN.ncmod = AC.ncmod;
3624  if ( ( AC.modmode & INVERSETABLE ) != 0 ) MakeInverses();
3625  if ( AC.halfmod ) M_free(AC.halfmod,"halfmod");
3626  AC.halfmod = 0; AC.nhalfmod = 0;
3627  return(Retval);
3628 }
3629 
3630 /*
3631  #] CoModulus :
3632  #[ CoRepeat :
3633 */
3634 
3635 int CoRepeat(UBYTE *inp)
3636 {
3637  int error = 0;
3638  AC.RepSumCheck[AC.RepLevel] = NestingChecksum();
3639  AC.RepLevel++;
3640  if ( AC.RepLevel > AM.RepMax ) {
3641  MesPrint("&Too many repeat levels. Maximum is %d",AM.RepMax);
3642  return(1);
3643  }
3644  Add3Com(TYPEREPEAT,-1) /* Means indefinite */
3645  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == ',' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
3646  if ( *inp ) {
3647  error = CompileStatement(inp);
3648  if ( CoEndRepeat(inp) ) error = 1;
3649  }
3650  return(error);
3651 }
3652 
3653 /*
3654  #] CoRepeat :
3655  #[ CoEndRepeat :
3656 */
3657 
3658 int CoEndRepeat(UBYTE *inp)
3659 {
3660  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
3661  int level, error = 0, repeatlevel = 0;
3662  DUMMYUSE(inp);
3663  AC.RepLevel--;
3664  if ( AC.RepLevel < 0 ) {
3665  MesPrint("&EndRepeat without Repeat");
3666  AC.RepLevel = 0;
3667  return(1);
3668  }
3669  else if ( AC.RepSumCheck[AC.RepLevel] != NestingChecksum() ) {
3670  MesNesting();
3671  error = 1;
3672  }
3673  level = C->numlhs+1;
3674  while ( level > 0 ) {
3675  if ( C->lhs[--level][0] == TYPEREPEAT ) {
3676  if ( repeatlevel == 0 ) {
3677  Add3Com(TYPEENDREPEAT,level)
3678  return(error);
3679  }
3680  repeatlevel--;
3681  }
3682  else if ( C->lhs[level][0] == TYPEENDREPEAT ) repeatlevel++;
3683  }
3684  return(1);
3685 }
3686 
3687 /*
3688  #] CoEndRepeat :
3689  #[ DoBrackets :
3690 
3691  Reads in the bracket information.
3692  Storage is in the form of a regular term.
3693  No subterms and arguments are allowed.
3694 */
3695 
3696 int DoBrackets(UBYTE *inp, int par)
3697 {
3698  GETIDENTITY
3699  UBYTE *p, *pp, c;
3700  WORD *to, i, type, *w, error = 0;
3701  WORD c1,c2, *WorkSave;
3702  int biflag;
3703  p = inp;
3704  WorkSave = to = AT.WorkPointer;
3705  to++;
3706  if ( AT.BrackBuf == 0 ) {
3707  AR.MaxBracket = 100;
3708  AT.BrackBuf = (WORD *)Malloc1(sizeof(WORD)*(AR.MaxBracket+1),"bracket buffer");
3709  }
3710  *AT.BrackBuf = 0;
3711  AR.BracketOn = 0;
3712  AC.bracketindexflag = 0;
3713  AT.bracketindexflag = 0;
3714  if ( *p == '+' || *p == '-' ) p++;
3715  if ( p[-1] == ',' && *p ) p--;
3716  if ( p[-1] == '+' && *p ) { biflag = 1; if ( *p != ',' ) { *--p = ','; } }
3717  else if ( p[-1] == '-' && *p ) { biflag = -1; if ( *p != ',' ) { *--p = ','; } }
3718  else biflag = 0;
3719  while ( *p == ',' ) {
3720 redo: AR.BracketOn++;
3721  while ( *p == ',' ) p++;
3722  if ( *p == 0 ) break;
3723  if ( *p == '0' ) {
3724  p++; while ( *p == '0' ) p++;
3725  continue;
3726  }
3727  inp = pp = p;
3728  p = SkipAName(p);
3729  if ( p == 0 ) return(1);
3730  c = *p;
3731  *p = 0;
3732  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c1,WITHAUTO);
3733  if ( c == '.' ) {
3734  if ( type == CVECTOR || type == CDUBIOUS ) {
3735  *p++ = c;
3736  inp = p;
3737  p = SkipAName(p);
3738  if ( p == 0 ) return(1);
3739  c = *p;
3740  *p = 0;
3741  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c2,WITHAUTO);
3742  if ( type != CVECTOR && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
3743  MesPrint("&Not a vector in dotproduct in bracket statement: %s",inp);
3744  error = 1;
3745  }
3746  else type = CDOTPRODUCT;
3747  }
3748  else {
3749  MesPrint("&Illegal use of . after %s in bracket statement",inp);
3750  error = 1;
3751  *p++ = c;
3752  goto redo;
3753  }
3754  }
3755  switch ( type ) {
3756  case CSYMBOL :
3757  *to++ = SYMBOL; *to++ = 4; *to++ = c1; *to++ = 1; break;
3758  case CVECTOR :
3759  *to++ = INDEX; *to++ = 3; *to++ = AM.OffsetVector + c1; break;
3760  case CFUNCTION :
3761  *to++ = c1+FUNCTION; *to++ = FUNHEAD; *to++ = 0;
3762  FILLFUN3(to)
3763  break;
3764  case CDOTPRODUCT :
3765  *to++ = DOTPRODUCT; *to++ = 5; *to++ = c1 + AM.OffsetVector;
3766  *to++ = c2 + AM.OffsetVector; *to++ = 1; break;
3767  case CDELTA :
3768  *to++ = DELTA; *to++ = 4; *to++ = EMPTYINDEX; *to++ = EMPTYINDEX; break;
3769  case CSET :
3770  *to++ = SETSET; *to++ = 4; *to++ = c1; *to++ = Sets[c1].type; break;
3771  default :
3772  MesPrint("&Illegal bracket request for %s",pp);
3773  error = 1; break;
3774  }
3775  *p = c;
3776  }
3777  if ( *p ) {
3778  MesCerr("separator",p);
3779  AC.BracketNormalize = 0;
3780  AT.WorkPointer = WorkSave;
3781  error = 1;
3782  return(error);
3783  }
3784  *to++ = 1; *to++ = 1; *to++ = 3;
3785  *AT.WorkPointer = to - AT.WorkPointer;
3786  AT.WorkPointer = to;
3787  AC.BracketNormalize = 1;
3788  if ( BracketNormalize(BHEAD WorkSave) ) { error = 1; AR.BracketOn = 0; }
3789  else {
3790  w = WorkSave;
3791  if ( *w == 4 || !*w ) { AR.BracketOn = 0; }
3792  else {
3793  i = *(w+*w-1);
3794  if ( i < 0 ) i = -i;
3795  *w -= i;
3796  i = *w;
3797  if ( i > AR.MaxBracket ) {
3798  WORD *newbuf;
3799  newbuf = (WORD *)Malloc1(sizeof(WORD)*(i+1),"bracket buffer");
3800  AR.MaxBracket = i;
3801  if ( AT.BrackBuf != 0 ) M_free(AT.BrackBuf,"bracket buffer");
3802  AT.BrackBuf = newbuf;
3803  }
3804  to = AT.BrackBuf;
3805  NCOPY(to,w,i);
3806  }
3807  }
3808  AC.BracketNormalize = 0;
3809  if ( par == 1 ) AR.BracketOn = -AR.BracketOn;
3810  if ( error == 0 ) {
3811  AC.bracketindexflag = biflag;
3812  AT.bracketindexflag = biflag;
3813  }
3814  AT.WorkPointer = WorkSave;
3815  return(error);
3816 }
3817 
3818 /*
3819  #] DoBrackets :
3820  #[ CoBracket :
3821 */
3822 
3823 int CoBracket(UBYTE *inp)
3824 { return(DoBrackets(inp,0)); }
3825 
3826 /*
3827  #] CoBracket :
3828  #[ CoAntiBracket :
3829 */
3830 
3831 int CoAntiBracket(UBYTE *inp)
3832 { return(DoBrackets(inp,1)); }
3833 
3834 /*
3835  #] CoAntiBracket :
3836  #[ CoMultiBracket :
3837 
3838  Syntax:
3839  MultiBracket:{A|B} bracketinfo:...:{A|B} bracketinfo;
3840 */
3841 
3842 int CoMultiBracket(UBYTE *inp)
3843 {
3844  GETIDENTITY
3845  int i, error = 0, error1, type, num;
3846  UBYTE *s, c;
3847  WORD *to, *from;
3848 
3849  if ( *inp != ':' ) {
3850  MesPrint("&Illegal Multiple Bracket separator: %s",inp);
3851  return(1);
3852  }
3853  inp++;
3854  if ( AC.MultiBracketBuf == 0 ) {
3855  AC.MultiBracketBuf = (WORD **)Malloc1(sizeof(WORD *)*MAXMULTIBRACKETLEVELS,"multi bracket buffer");
3856  for ( i = 0; i < MAXMULTIBRACKETLEVELS; i++ ) {
3857  AC.MultiBracketBuf[i] = 0;
3858  }
3859  }
3860  else {
3861  for ( i = 0; i < MAXMULTIBRACKETLEVELS; i++ ) {
3862  if ( AC.MultiBracketBuf[i] ) {
3863  M_free(AC.MultiBracketBuf[i],"bracket buffer i");
3864  AC.MultiBracketBuf[i] = 0;
3865  }
3866  }
3867  AC.MultiBracketLevels = 0;
3868  }
3869  AC.MultiBracketLevels = 0;
3870 /*
3871  Start with disabling the regular brackets.
3872 */
3873  if ( AT.BrackBuf == 0 ) {
3874  AR.MaxBracket = 100;
3875  AT.BrackBuf = (WORD *)Malloc1(sizeof(WORD)*(AR.MaxBracket+1),"bracket buffer");
3876  }
3877  *AT.BrackBuf = 0;
3878  AR.BracketOn = 0;
3879  AC.bracketindexflag = 0;
3880  AT.bracketindexflag = 0;
3881 /*
3882  Now loop through the various levels, separated by the colons.
3883 */
3884  for ( i = 0; i < MAXMULTIBRACKETLEVELS; i++ ) {
3885  if ( *inp == 0 ) goto RegEnd;
3886 /*
3887  1: skip to ':', determine bracket or antibracket
3888 */
3889  s = inp;
3890  while ( *s && *s != ':' ) {
3891  if ( *s == '[' ) { SKIPBRA1(s) s++; }
3892  else if ( *s == '{' ) { SKIPBRA2(s) s++; }
3893  else s++;
3894  }
3895  c = *s; *s = 0;
3896  if ( StrICont(inp,(UBYTE *)"antibrackets") == 0 ) { type = 1; }
3897  else if ( StrICont(inp,(UBYTE *)"brackets") == 0 ) { type = 0; }
3898  else {
3899  MesPrint("&Illegal (anti)bracket specification in MultiBracket statement");
3900  if ( error == 0 ) error = 1;
3901  goto NextLevel;
3902  }
3903  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 0 ) inp++;
3904  if ( *inp != ',' ) {
3905  MesPrint("&Illegal separator after (anti)bracket specification in MultiBracket statement");
3906  if ( error == 0 ) error = 1;
3907  goto NextLevel;
3908  }
3909  inp++;
3910 /*
3911  2: call DoBrackets.
3912 */
3913  error1 = DoBrackets(inp, type);
3914  if ( error < 0 ) return(error1);
3915  if ( error1 > error ) error = error1;
3916 /*
3917  3: copy bracket information to the multi bracket arrays
3918 */
3919  if ( AR.BracketOn ) {
3920  num = AT.BrackBuf[0];
3921  to = AC.MultiBracketBuf[i] = (WORD *)Malloc1((num+2)*sizeof(WORD),"bracket buffer i");
3922  from = AT.BrackBuf;
3923  *to++ = AR.BracketOn;
3924  NCOPY(to,from,num);
3925  *to = 0;
3926  }
3927 /*
3928  4: set ready for the next level
3929 */
3930 NextLevel:
3931  *s = c; if ( c == ':' ) s++;
3932  inp = s;
3933  *AT.BrackBuf = 0;
3934  AR.BracketOn = 0;
3935  }
3936  if ( *inp != 0 ) {
3937  MesPrint("&More than %d levels in MultiBracket statement",(WORD)MAXMULTIBRACKETLEVELS);
3938  if ( error == 0 ) error = 1;
3939  }
3940 RegEnd:
3941  AC.MultiBracketLevels = i;
3942  *AT.BrackBuf = 0;
3943  AR.BracketOn = 0;
3944  AC.bracketindexflag = 0;
3945  AT.bracketindexflag = 0;
3946  return(error);
3947 }
3948 
3949 /*
3950  #] CoMultiBracket :
3951  #[ CountComp :
3952 
3953  This routine reads the count statement. The syntax is:
3954  count minimum,object,size[,object,size]
3955  Objects can be:
3956  symbol
3957  dotproduct
3958  vector
3959  function
3960  Vectors can have the auxiliary flags:
3961  +v +f +d +?setname
3962 
3963  Output for the compiler:
3964  TYPECOUNT,size,minimum,objects
3965  with the objects:
3966  SYMBOL,4,number,size
3967  DOTPRODUCT,5,v1,v2,size
3968  FUNCTION,4,number,size
3969  VECTOR,5,number,bits,size or VECTOR,6,number,bits,setnumber,size
3970 
3971  Currently only used in the if statement
3972 */
3973 
3974 WORD *CountComp(UBYTE *inp, WORD *to)
3975 {
3976  GETIDENTITY
3977  UBYTE *p, c;
3978  WORD *w, mini = 0, type, c1, c2;
3979  int error = 0;
3980  p = inp;
3981  w = to;
3982  AR.Eside = 2;
3983  *w++ = TYPECOUNT;
3984  *w++ = 0;
3985  *w++ = 0;
3986  while ( *p == ',' ) {
3987  p++; inp = p;
3988  if ( *p == '[' || FG.cTable[*p] == 0 ) {
3989  if ( ( p = SkipAName(inp) ) == 0 ) return(0);
3990  c = *p; *p = 0;
3991  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c1,WITHAUTO);
3992  if ( c == '.' ) {
3993  if ( type == CVECTOR || type == CDUBIOUS ) {
3994  *p++ = c;
3995  inp = p;
3996  p = SkipAName(p);
3997  if ( p == 0 ) return(0);
3998  c = *p;
3999  *p = 0;
4000  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c2,WITHAUTO);
4001  if ( type != CVECTOR && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
4002  MesPrint("&Not a vector in dotproduct in if statement: %s",inp);
4003  error = 1;
4004  }
4005  else type = CDOTPRODUCT;
4006  }
4007  else {
4008  MesPrint("&Illegal use of . after %s in if statement",inp);
4009  if ( type == NAMENOTFOUND )
4010  MesPrint("&%s is not a properly declared variable",inp);
4011  error = 1;
4012  *p++ = c;
4013  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4014  if ( *p == ',' && FG.cTable[p[1]] == 1 ) {
4015  p++;
4016  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4017  }
4018  continue;
4019  }
4020  }
4021  *p = c;
4022  switch ( type ) {
4023  case CSYMBOL:
4024  *w++ = SYMBOL; *w++ = 4; *w++ = c1;
4025 Sgetnum: if ( *p != ',' ) {
4026  MesCerr("sequence",p);
4027  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4028  error = 1;
4029  }
4030  p++; inp = p;
4031  ParseSignedNumber(mini,p)
4032  if ( FG.cTable[p[-1]] != 1 || ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) ) {
4033  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4034  error = 1;
4035  c = *p; *p = 0;
4036  MesPrint("&Improper value in count: %s",inp);
4037  *p = c;
4038  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4039  }
4040  *w++ = mini;
4041  break;
4042  case CFUNCTION:
4043  *w++ = FUNCTION; *w++ = 4; *w++ = c1+FUNCTION; goto Sgetnum;
4044  case CDOTPRODUCT:
4045  *w++ = DOTPRODUCT; *w++ = 5;
4046  *w++ = c2 + AM.OffsetVector;
4047  *w++ = c1 + AM.OffsetVector;
4048  goto Sgetnum;
4049  case CVECTOR:
4050  *w++ = VECTOR; *w++ = 5;
4051  *w++ = c1 + AM.OffsetVector;
4052  if ( *p == ',' ) {
4053  *w++ = VECTBIT | DOTPBIT | FUNBIT;
4054  goto Sgetnum;
4055  }
4056  else if ( *p == '+' ) {
4057  p++;
4058  *w = 0;
4059  while ( *p && *p != ',' ) {
4060  if ( *p == 'v' || *p == 'V' ) {
4061  *w |= VECTBIT; p++;
4062  }
4063  else if ( *p == 'd' || *p == 'D' ) {
4064  *w |= DOTPBIT; p++;
4065  }
4066  else if ( *p == 'f' || *p == 'F'
4067  || *p == 't' || *p == 'T' ) {
4068  *w |= FUNBIT; p++;
4069  }
4070  else if ( *p == '?' ) {
4071  p++; inp = p;
4072  if ( *p == '{' ) { /* } */
4073  SKIPBRA2(p)
4074  if ( p == 0 ) return(0);
4075  if ( ( c1 = DoTempSet(inp+1,p) ) < 0 ) return(0);
4076  if ( Sets[c1].type != CFUNCTION ) {
4077  MesPrint("&set type conflict: Function expected");
4078  return(0);
4079  }
4080  type = CSET;
4081  c = *++p;
4082  }
4083  else {
4084  p = SkipAName(p);
4085  if ( p == 0 ) return(0);
4086  c = *p; *p = 0;
4087  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c1,WITHAUTO);
4088  }
4089  if ( type != CSET && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
4090  MesPrint("&%s is not a set",inp);
4091  error = 1;
4092  }
4093  w[-2] = 6;
4094  *w++ |= SETBIT;
4095  *w++ = c1;
4096  *p = c;
4097  goto Sgetnum;
4098  }
4099  else {
4100  MesCerr("specifier for vector",p);
4101  error = 1;
4102  }
4103  }
4104  w++;
4105  goto Sgetnum;
4106  }
4107  else {
4108  MesCerr("specifier for vector",p);
4109  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4110  error = 1;
4111  *w++ = VECTBIT | DOTPBIT | FUNBIT;
4112  goto Sgetnum;
4113  }
4114  case CDUBIOUS:
4115  goto skipfield;
4116  default:
4117  *p = 0;
4118  MesPrint("&%s is not a symbol, function, vector or dotproduct",inp);
4119  error = 1;
4120 skipfield: while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4121  if ( *p && FG.cTable[p[1]] == 1 ) {
4122  p++;
4123  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4124  }
4125  break;
4126  }
4127  }
4128  else {
4129  MesCerr("name",p);
4130  while ( *p && *p != ',' ) p++;
4131  error = 1;
4132  }
4133  }
4134  to[1] = w-to;
4135  if ( *p == ')' ) p++;
4136  if ( *p ) { MesCerr("end of statement",p); return(0); }
4137  if ( error ) return(0);
4138  return(w);
4139 }
4140 
4141 /*
4142  #] CountComp :
4143  #[ CoIf :
4144 
4145  Reads the if statement: There must be a pair of parentheses.
4146  Much work is delegated to the routines in compi2 and CountComp.
4147  The goto is kept hanging as it is forward.
4148  The address in which the label must be written is pushed on
4149  the AC.IfStack.
4150 
4151  Here we allow statements of the type
4152  if ( condition ) single statement;
4153  compile the if statement.
4154  test character at end
4155  if not ; or )
4156  copy the statement after the proper parenthesis to the
4157  beginning of the AC.iBuffer.
4158  Have it compiled.
4159  generate an endif statement.
4160 */
4161 
4162 static UWORD *CIscratC = 0;
4163 
4164 int CoIf(UBYTE *inp)
4165 {
4166  GETIDENTITY
4167  int error = 0, level;
4168  WORD *w, *ww, *u, *s, *OldWork, *OldSpace = AT.WorkSpace;
4169  WORD gotexp = 0; /* Indicates whether there can be a condition */
4170  WORD lenpp, lenlev, ncoef, i, number;
4171  UBYTE *p, *pp, *ppp, c;
4172  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
4173  LONG x;
4174 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
4175  int spec;
4176 #endif
4177  if ( *inp == '(' && inp[1] == ',' ) inp += 2;
4178  else if ( *inp == '(' ) inp++; /* Usually we enter at the bracket */
4179 
4180  if ( CIscratC == 0 )
4181  CIscratC = (UWORD *)Malloc1((AM.MaxTal+2)*sizeof(UWORD),"CoIf");
4182  lenpp = 0;
4183  lenlev = 1;
4184  if ( AC.IfLevel >= AC.MaxIf ) DoubleIfBuffers();
4185  AC.IfCount[lenpp++] = 0;
4186 /*
4187  IfStack is used for organizing the 'go to' for the various if levels
4188 */
4189  *AC.IfStack++ = C->Pointer-C->Buffer+2;
4190 /*
4191  IfSumCheck is used to test for illegal nesting of if, argument or repeat.
4192 */
4193  AC.IfSumCheck[AC.IfLevel] = NestingChecksum();
4194  AC.IfLevel++;
4195  w = OldWork = AT.WorkPointer;
4196  *w++ = TYPEIF;
4197  w += 2;
4198  p = inp;
4199  for(;;) {
4200  inp = p;
4201  level = 0;
4202 ReDo:
4203  if ( FG.cTable[*p] == 1 ) { /* Number */
4204  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4205 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
4206  pp = CheckFloat(p,&spec);
4207  if ( pp > p ) { /* Got one */
4208 HaveFloat:
4209  if ( spec == 1 ) { /* is zero */
4210  *w++ = LONGNUMBER; *w++ = 3; *w++ = 0;
4211  }
4212  else if ( spec == -1 ) {
4213  MesPrint("&The floating point system has not been started: %s",p);
4214  if ( !error ) error = 1;
4215  }
4216  else {
4217  WORD *ow = AT.WorkPointer;
4218  AT.WorkPointer = w;
4219  c = *pp; c = 0;
4220  ReadFloat((SBYTE *)p); /* Is now at AT.WorkPointer */
4221  *pp = c;
4222  AT.WorkPointer[0] = IFFLOATNUMBER;
4223  w = AT.WorkPointer + AT.WorkPointer[1];
4224  AT.WorkPointer = ow;
4225  if ( level ) w[FUNHEAD+3] = -w[FUNHEAD+3];
4226  }
4227  goto DoneWithNumber;
4228  }
4229 /*
4230  Notation: Same as FLOATFUN but FLOATFUN replaced by IFFLOATNUMBER.
4231 */
4232 
4233 #endif
4234  u = w;
4235  *w++ = LONGNUMBER;
4236 /*
4237  Notation:
4238  LONGNUMBER,size,reducedsize*sign,numerator,denominator
4239  with the length of denominator and numerator equal to reducedsize
4240 */
4241  w += 2;
4242  if ( GetLong(p,(UWORD *)w,&ncoef) ) { ncoef = 1; error = 1; }
4243  w[-1] = ncoef;
4244  while ( FG.cTable[*++p] == 1 );
4245  if ( *p == '/' ) {
4246  p++;
4247  if ( FG.cTable[*p] != 1 ) {
4248  MesCerr("sequence",p); error = 1; goto OnlyNum;
4249  }
4250  if ( GetLong(p,CIscratC,&ncoef) ) {
4251  ncoef = 1; error = 1;
4252  }
4253  while ( FG.cTable[*++p] == 1 );
4254  if ( ncoef == 0 ) {
4255  MesPrint("&Division by zero!");
4256  error = 1;
4257  }
4258  else {
4259  if ( w[-1] != 0 ) {
4260  if ( Simplify(BHEAD (UWORD *)w,(WORD *)(w-1),
4261  CIscratC,&ncoef) ) error = 1;
4262  else {
4263  i = w[-1];
4264  if ( i >= ncoef ) {
4265  i = w[-1];
4266  w += i;
4267  i -= ncoef;
4268  s = (WORD *)CIscratC;
4269  NCOPY(w,s,ncoef);
4270  while ( --i >= 0 ) *w++ = 0;
4271  }
4272  else {
4273  w += i;
4274  i = ncoef - i;
4275  while ( --i >= 0 ) *w++ = 0;
4276  s = (WORD *)CIscratC;
4277  NCOPY(w,s,ncoef);
4278  }
4279  }
4280  }
4281  }
4282  }
4283  else {
4284 OnlyNum:
4285  w += ncoef;
4286  if ( ncoef > 0 ) {
4287  ncoef--; *w++ = 1;
4288  while ( --ncoef >= 0 ) *w++ = 0;
4289  }
4290  }
4291  u[1] = WORDDIF(w,u);
4292  u[2] = (u[1] - 3)/2;
4293  if ( level ) u[2] = -u[2];
4294 DoneWithNumber:
4295  gotexp = 1;
4296  }
4297  else if ( *p == '+' ) { p++; goto ReDo; }
4298  else if ( *p == '-' ) { level ^= 1; p++; goto ReDo; }
4299  else if ( *p == 'c' || *p == 'C' ) { /* Count or Coefficient */
4300  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4301  while ( FG.cTable[*++p] == 0 );
4302  c = *p; *p = 0;
4303  if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"count") ) {
4304  *p = c;
4305  if ( c != '(' ) {
4306  MesPrint("&no ( after count");
4307  error = 1;
4308  goto endofif;
4309  }
4310  inp = p;
4311  SKIPBRA4(p);
4312  c = *++p; *p = 0; *inp = ',';
4313  w = CountComp(inp,w);
4314  *p = c; *inp = '(';
4315  if ( w == 0 ) { error = 1; goto endofif; }
4316  gotexp = 1;
4317  }
4318  else if ( ConWord(inp,(UBYTE *)"coefficient") && ( p - inp ) > 3 ) {
4319  *w++ = COEFFI;
4320  *w++ = 2;
4321  *p = c;
4322  gotexp = 1;
4323  }
4324  else goto NoGood;
4325  inp = p;
4326  }
4327  else if ( *p == 'm' || *p == 'M' ) { /* match */
4328  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4329  while ( !FG.cTable[*++p] );
4330  c = *p; *p = 0;
4331  if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"match") ) {
4332  *p = c;
4333  if ( c != '(' ) {
4334  MesPrint("&no ( after match");
4335  error = 1;
4336  goto endofif;
4337  }
4338  p++; inp = p;
4339  SKIPBRA4(p);
4340  *p = '=';
4341 /*
4342  Now we can call the reading of the lhs of an id statement.
4343  This has to be modified in the future.
4344 */
4345  AT.WorkSpace = AT.WorkPointer = w;
4346  ppp = inp;
4347  while ( FG.cTable[*ppp] == 0 && ppp < p ) ppp++;
4348  if ( *ppp == ',' ) AC.idoption = 0;
4349  else AC.idoption = SUBMULTI;
4350  level = CoIdExpression(inp,TYPEIF);
4351  AT.WorkSpace = OldSpace;
4352  AT.WorkPointer = OldWork;
4353  if ( level != 0 ) {
4354  if ( level < 0 ) { error = -1; goto endofif; }
4355  error = 1;
4356  }
4357 /*
4358  If we pop numlhs we are in good shape
4359 */
4360  s = u = C->lhs[C->numlhs];
4361  while ( u < C->Pointer ) *w++ = *u++;
4362  C->numlhs--; C->Pointer = s;
4363  *p++ = ')';
4364  inp = p;
4365  gotexp = 1;
4366  }
4367  else if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"multipleof") ) {
4368  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4369  *p = c;
4370  if ( c != '(' ) {
4371  MesPrint("&no ( after multipleof");
4372  error = 1; goto endofif;
4373  }
4374  p++;
4375  if ( FG.cTable[*p] != 1 ) {
4376 Nomulof: MesPrint("&multipleof needs a short positive integer argument");
4377  error = 1; goto endofif;
4378  }
4379  ParseNumber(x,p)
4380  if ( *p != ')' || x <= 0 || x > MAXPOSITIVE ) goto Nomulof;
4381  p++;
4382  *w++ = MULTIPLEOF; *w++ = 3; *w++ = (WORD)x;
4383  inp = p;
4384  gotexp = 1;
4385  }
4386  else {
4387 NoGood: MesPrint("&Unrecognized word: %s",inp);
4388  *p = c;
4389  error = 1;
4390  level = 0;
4391  if ( c == '(' ) SKIPBRA4(p)
4392  inp = ++p;
4393  gotexp = 1;
4394  }
4395  }
4396  else if ( *p == 'f' || *p == 'F' ) { /* FindLoop */
4397  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4398  while ( FG.cTable[*++p] == 0 );
4399  c = *p; *p = 0;
4400  if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"findloop") ) {
4401  *p = c;
4402  if ( c != '(' ) {
4403  MesPrint("&no ( after findloop");
4404  error = 1;
4405  goto endofif;
4406  }
4407  inp = p;
4408  SKIPBRA4(p);
4409  c = *++p; *p = 0; *inp = ',';
4410  if ( CoFindLoop(inp) ) goto endofif;
4411  s = u = C->lhs[C->numlhs];
4412  while ( u < C->Pointer ) *w++ = *u++;
4413  C->numlhs--; C->Pointer = s;
4414  *p = c; *inp = '(';
4415  if ( w == 0 ) { error = 1; goto endofif; }
4416  gotexp = 1;
4417  }
4418  else if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"flag") ) {
4419  UBYTE cc = c, *pppp;
4420  *p = cc;
4421  if ( cc != '(' ) {
4422  MesPrint("&no ( after flag");
4423  error = 1;
4424  goto endofif;
4425  }
4426  inp = p;
4427  SKIPBRA4(p);
4428  cc = *++p; *p = 0; *inp = ','; pppp = p;
4429  ww = w;
4430  *w++ = IFUSERFLAG; *w++ = 0;
4431  while ( *inp ) {
4432  int x = 0;
4433  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
4434  if ( *inp == 0 || *inp == ')' ) break;
4435  while ( *inp >= '0' && *inp <= '9' ) x = 10*x+(*inp++-'0');
4436  if ( x < 1 || x > BITSINWORD ) {
4437  MesPrint("&Flag number %d outside the permitted range 1-%d.",BITSINWORD);
4438  error = 1;
4439  }
4440  *w++ = x-1;
4441  }
4442  ww[1] = w-ww;
4443  p = pppp; *p = cc; *inp = '(';
4444  gotexp = 1;
4445  if ( ww[1] <= 2 ) {
4446  MesPrint("&The userflag condition in the if statement needs arguments.");
4447  error = 1;
4448  }
4449  inp = p;
4450  gotexp = 1;
4451  }
4452  else goto NoGood;
4453  }
4454  else if ( *p == 'e' || *p == 'E' ) { /* Expression */
4455  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4456  while ( FG.cTable[*++p] == 0 );
4457  c = *p; *p = 0;
4458  if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"expression") ) {
4459  *p = c;
4460  if ( c != '(' ) {
4461  MesPrint("&no ( after expression");
4462  error = 1;
4463  goto endofif;
4464  }
4465  p++; ww = w; *w++ = IFEXPRESSION; w++;
4466  while ( *p != ')' ) {
4467  if ( *p == ',' ) { p++; continue; }
4468  if ( *p == '[' || FG.cTable[*p] == 0 ) {
4469  pp = p;
4470  if ( ( p = SkipAName(p) ) == 0 ) {
4471  MesPrint("&Improper name for an expression: '%s'",pp);
4472  error = 1;
4473  goto endofif;
4474  }
4475  c = *p; *p = 0;
4476  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,pp,&number,NOAUTO) == CEXPRESSION ) {
4477  *w++ = number;
4478  }
4479  else if ( GetName(AC.varnames,pp,&number,NOAUTO) != NAMENOTFOUND ) {
4480  MesPrint("&%s is not an expression",pp);
4481  error = 1;
4482  *w++ = number;
4483  }
4484  *p = c;
4485  }
4486  else {
4487  MesPrint("&Illegal object in Expression in if-statement");
4488  error = 1;
4489  while ( *p && *p != ',' && *p != ')' ) p++;
4490  if ( *p == 0 || *p == ')' ) break;
4491  }
4492  }
4493  ww[1] = w - ww;
4494  p++;
4495  gotexp = 1;
4496  }
4497  else goto NoGood;
4498  inp = p;
4499  }
4500  else if ( *p == 'i' || *p == 'I' ) { /* IsFactorized */
4501  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4502  while ( FG.cTable[*++p] == 0 );
4503  c = *p; *p = 0;
4504  if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"isfactorized") ) {
4505  *p = c;
4506  if ( c != '(' ) { /* No expression means current expression */
4507  ww = w; *w++ = IFISFACTORIZED; w++;
4508  }
4509  else {
4510  p++; ww = w; *w++ = IFISFACTORIZED; w++;
4511  while ( *p != ')' ) {
4512  if ( *p == ',' ) { p++; continue; }
4513  if ( *p == '[' || FG.cTable[*p] == 0 ) {
4514  pp = p;
4515  if ( ( p = SkipAName(p) ) == 0 ) {
4516  MesPrint("&Improper name for an expression: '%s'",pp);
4517  error = 1;
4518  goto endofif;
4519  }
4520  c = *p; *p = 0;
4521  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,pp,&number,NOAUTO) == CEXPRESSION ) {
4522  *w++ = number;
4523  }
4524  else if ( GetName(AC.varnames,pp,&number,NOAUTO) != NAMENOTFOUND ) {
4525  MesPrint("&%s is not an expression",pp);
4526  error = 1;
4527  *w++ = number;
4528  }
4529  *p = c;
4530  }
4531  else {
4532  MesPrint("&Illegal object in IsFactorized in if-statement");
4533  error = 1;
4534  while ( *p && *p != ',' && *p != ')' ) p++;
4535  if ( *p == 0 || *p == ')' ) break;
4536  }
4537  }
4538  p++;
4539  }
4540  ww[1] = w - ww;
4541  gotexp = 1;
4542  }
4543  else goto NoGood;
4544  inp = p;
4545  }
4546  else if ( *p == 'o' || *p == 'O' ) { /* Occurs */
4547 /*
4548  Tests whether variables occur inside a term.
4549  At the moment this is done one by one.
4550  If we want to do them in groups we should do the reading
4551  a bit different: each as a variable in a term, and then
4552  use Normalize to get the variables grouped and in order.
4553  That way FindVar (in if.c) can work more efficiently.
4554  Still to be done!!!
4555  TASK: Nice little task for someone to learn.
4556 */
4557  UBYTE cc;
4558  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4559  while ( FG.cTable[*++p] == 0 );
4560  c = cc = *p; *p = 0;
4561  if ( !StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"occurs") ) {
4562  WORD c1, c2, type;
4563  *p = cc;
4564  if ( cc != '(' ) {
4565  MesPrint("&no ( after occurs");
4566  error = 1;
4567  goto endofif;
4568  }
4569  inp = p;
4570  SKIPBRA4(p);
4571  cc = *++p; *p = 0; *inp = ','; pp = p;
4572  ww = w;
4573  *w++ = IFOCCURS; *w++ = 0;
4574  while ( *inp ) {
4575  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
4576  if ( *inp == 0 || *inp == ')' ) break;
4577 /*
4578  Now read a list of names
4579  We can have symbols, vectors, dotproducts, indices, functions.
4580  There could also be dummy indices and/or extra symbols.
4581 */
4582  if ( *inp == '[' || FG.cTable[*inp] == 0 ) {
4583  if ( ( p = SkipAName(inp) ) == 0 ) return(0);
4584  c = *p; *p = 0;
4585  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c1,WITHAUTO);
4586  if ( c == '.' ) {
4587  if ( type == CVECTOR || type == CDUBIOUS ) {
4588  *p++ = c;
4589  inp = p;
4590  p = SkipAName(p);
4591  if ( p == 0 ) return(0);
4592  c = *p;
4593  *p = 0;
4594  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c2,WITHAUTO);
4595  if ( type != CVECTOR && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
4596  MesPrint("&Not a vector in dotproduct in if statement: %s",inp);
4597  error = 1;
4598  }
4599  else type = CDOTPRODUCT;
4600  }
4601  else {
4602  MesPrint("&Illegal use of . after %s in if statement",inp);
4603  if ( type == NAMENOTFOUND )
4604  MesPrint("&%s is not a properly declared variable",inp);
4605  error = 1;
4606  *p++ = c;
4607  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4608  if ( *p == ',' && FG.cTable[p[1]] == 1 ) {
4609  p++;
4610  while ( *p && *p != ')' && *p != ',' ) p++;
4611  }
4612  continue;
4613  }
4614  }
4615  *p = c;
4616  switch ( type ) {
4617  case CSYMBOL: /* To worry about extra symbols */
4618  *w++ = SYMBOL;
4619  *w++ = c1;
4620  break;
4621  case CINDEX:
4622  *w++ = INDEX;
4623  *w++ = c1 + AM.OffsetIndex;
4624  break;
4625  case CVECTOR:
4626  *w++ = VECTOR;
4627  *w++ = c1 + AM.OffsetVector;
4628  break;
4629  case CDOTPRODUCT:
4630  *w++ = DOTPRODUCT;
4631  *w++ = c1 + AM.OffsetVector;
4632  *w++ = c2 + AM.OffsetVector;
4633  break;
4634  case CFUNCTION:
4635  *w++ = FUNCTION;
4636  *w++ = c1+FUNCTION;
4637  break;
4638  default:
4639  MesPrint("&Illegal variable %s in occurs condition in if statement",inp);
4640  error = 1;
4641  break;
4642  }
4643  inp = p;
4644  }
4645  else {
4646  MesPrint("&Illegal object %s in occurs condition in if statement",inp);
4647  error = 1;
4648  break;
4649  }
4650  }
4651  ww[1] = w-ww;
4652  p = pp; *p = cc; *inp = '(';
4653  gotexp = 1;
4654  if ( ww[1] <= 2 ) {
4655  MesPrint("&The occurs condition in the if statement needs arguments.");
4656  error = 1;
4657  }
4658  }
4659  else goto NoGood;
4660  inp = p;
4661  }
4662  else if ( *p == '$' ) {
4663  if ( gotexp == 1 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4664  p++; inp = p;
4665  while ( FG.cTable[*p] == 0 || FG.cTable[*p] == 1 ) p++;
4666  c = *p; *p = 0;
4667  if ( ( i = GetDollar(inp) ) < 0 ) {
4668  MesPrint("&undefined dollar expression %s",inp);
4669  error = 1;
4670  i = AddDollar(inp,DOLUNDEFINED,0,0);
4671  }
4672  *p = c;
4673  *w++ = IFDOLLAR; *w++ = 3; *w++ = i;
4674 /*
4675  And then the IFDOLLAREXTRA pieces for [1] [$y] etc
4676 */
4677  if ( *p == '[' ) {
4678  p++;
4679  if ( ( w = GetIfDollarFactor(&p,w) ) == 0 ) {
4680  error = 1;
4681  goto endofif;
4682  }
4683  else if ( *p != ']' ) {
4684  error = 1;
4685  goto endofif;
4686  }
4687  p++;
4688  }
4689  inp = p;
4690  gotexp = 1;
4691  }
4692 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
4693  else if ( *p == '.' ) {
4694  pp = CheckFloat(p,&spec);
4695  if ( pp > p ) goto HaveFloat;
4696  }
4697 #endif
4698  else if ( *p == '(' ) {
4699  if ( gotexp ) {
4700  MesCerr("parenthesis",p);
4701  error = 1;
4702  goto endofif;
4703  }
4704  gotexp = 0;
4705  if ( ++lenlev >= AC.MaxIf ) DoubleIfBuffers();
4706  AC.IfCount[lenpp++] = w-OldWork;
4707  *w++ = SUBEXPR;
4708  w += 2;
4709  p++;
4710  }
4711  else if ( *p == ')' ) {
4712  if ( gotexp == 0 ) { MesCerr("position for )",p); error = 1; }
4713  gotexp = 1;
4714  u = AC.IfCount[--lenpp]+OldWork;
4715  lenlev--;
4716  u[1] = w - u;
4717  if ( lenlev <= 0 ) { /* End if condition */
4718  AT.WorkSpace = OldSpace;
4719  AT.WorkPointer = OldWork;
4720  AddNtoL(OldWork[1],OldWork);
4721  p++;
4722  if ( *p == ')' ) {
4723  MesPrint("&unmatched parenthesis in if/while ()");
4724  error = 1;
4725  while ( *++p == ')' );
4726  }
4727  if ( *p ) {
4728  level = CompileStatement(p);
4729  if ( level ) error = level;
4730  while ( *p ) p++;
4731  if ( CoEndIf(p) && error == 0 ) error = 1;
4732  }
4733  return(error);
4734  }
4735  p++;
4736  }
4737  else if ( *p == '>' ) {
4738  if ( gotexp == 0 ) goto NoExp;
4739  if ( p[1] == '=' ) { *w++ = GREATEREQUAL; *w++ = 2; p += 2; }
4740  else { *w++ = GREATER; *w++ = 2; p++; }
4741  gotexp = 0;
4742  }
4743  else if ( *p == '<' ) {
4744  if ( gotexp == 0 ) goto NoExp;
4745  if ( p[1] == '=' ) { *w++ = LESSEQUAL; *w++ = 2; p += 2; }
4746  else { *w++ = LESS; *w++ = 2; p++; }
4747  gotexp = 0;
4748  }
4749  else if ( *p == '=' ) {
4750  if ( gotexp == 0 ) goto NoExp;
4751  if ( p[1] == '=' ) p++;
4752  *w++ = EQUAL; *w++ = 2; p++;
4753  gotexp = 0;
4754  }
4755  else if ( *p == '!' && p[1] == '=' ) {
4756  if ( gotexp == 0 ) { p++; goto NoExp; }
4757  *w++ = NOTEQUAL; *w++ = 2; p += 2;
4758  gotexp = 0;
4759  }
4760  else if ( *p == '|' && p[1] == '|' ) {
4761  if ( gotexp == 0 ) { p++; goto NoExp; }
4762  *w++ = ORCOND; *w++ = 2; p += 2;
4763  gotexp = 0;
4764  }
4765  else if ( *p == '&' && p[1] == '&' ) {
4766  if ( gotexp == 0 ) {
4767  p++;
4768 NoExp: p++;
4769  MesCerr("sequence",p);
4770  error = 1;
4771  }
4772  else {
4773  *w++ = ANDCOND; *w++ = 2; p += 2;
4774  gotexp = 0;
4775  }
4776  }
4777  else if ( *p == 0 ) {
4778  MesPrint("&Unmatched parentheses");
4779  error = 1;
4780  goto endofif;
4781  }
4782  else {
4783  if ( FG.cTable[*p] == 0 ) {
4784  WORD ij;
4785  inp = p;
4786  while ( ( ij = FG.cTable[*++p] ) == 0 || ij == 1 );
4787  c = *p; *p = 0;
4788  goto NoGood;
4789  }
4790  MesCerr("sequence",p);
4791  error = 1;
4792  p++;
4793  }
4794  }
4795 endofif:;
4796  return(error);
4797 }
4798 
4799 /*
4800  #] CoIf :
4801  #[ CoElse :
4802 */
4803 
4804 int CoElse(UBYTE *p)
4805 {
4806  int error = 0;
4807  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
4808  if ( *p != 0 ) {
4809  while ( *p == ',' ) p++;
4810  if ( tolower(*p) == 'i' && tolower(p[1]) == 'f' && p[2] == '(' )
4811  return(CoElseIf(p+2));
4812  MesPrint("&No extra text allowed as part of an else statement");
4813  error = 1;
4814  }
4815  if ( AC.IfLevel <= 0 ) { MesPrint("&else statement without if"); return(1); }
4816  if ( AC.IfSumCheck[AC.IfLevel-1] != NestingChecksum() - 1 ) {
4817  MesNesting();
4818  error = 1;
4819  }
4820  Add3Com(TYPEELSE,AC.IfLevel)
4821  C->Buffer[AC.IfStack[-1]] = C->numlhs;
4822  AC.IfStack[-1] = C->Pointer - C->Buffer - 1;
4823  return(error);
4824 }
4825 
4826 /*
4827  #] CoElse :
4828  #[ CoElseIf :
4829 */
4830 
4831 int CoElseIf(UBYTE *inp)
4832 {
4833  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
4834  if ( AC.IfLevel <= 0 ) { MesPrint("&elseif statement without if"); return(1); }
4835  Add3Com(TYPEELSE,-AC.IfLevel)
4836  AC.IfLevel--;
4837  C->Buffer[*--AC.IfStack] = C->numlhs;
4838  return(CoIf(inp));
4839 }
4840 
4841 /*
4842  #] CoElseIf :
4843  #[ CoEndIf :
4844 
4845  It puts a RHS-level at the position indicated in the AC.IfStack.
4846  This corresponds to the label belonging to a forward goto.
4847  It is the goto that belongs either to the failing condition
4848  of the if (no else statement), or the completion of the
4849  success path (with else statement)
4850  The code is a jump to the next statement. It is there to prevent
4851  problems with
4852  if ( .. )
4853  if ( .. )
4854  endif;
4855  elseif ( .. )
4856 */
4857 
4858 int CoEndIf(UBYTE *inp)
4859 {
4860  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
4861  WORD i = C->numlhs, to, k = -AC.IfLevel;
4862  int error = 0;
4863  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
4864  if ( *inp != 0 ) {
4865  error = 1;
4866  MesPrint("&No extra text allowed as part of an endif/elseif statement");
4867  }
4868  if ( AC.IfLevel <= 0 ) {
4869  MesPrint("&Endif statement without corresponding if"); return(1);
4870  }
4871  AC.IfLevel--;
4872  C->Buffer[*--AC.IfStack] = i+1;
4873  if ( AC.IfSumCheck[AC.IfLevel] != NestingChecksum() ) {
4874  MesNesting();
4875  error = 1;
4876  }
4877  Add3Com(TYPEENDIF,i+1)
4878 /*
4879  Now the search for the TYPEELSE in front of the elseif statements
4880 */
4881  to = C->numlhs;
4882  while ( i > 0 ) {
4883  if ( C->lhs[i][0] == TYPEELSE && C->lhs[i][2] == to ) to = i;
4884  if ( C->lhs[i][0] == TYPEIF ) {
4885  if ( C->lhs[i][2] == to ) {
4886  i--;
4887  if ( i <= 0 || C->lhs[i][0] != TYPEELSE
4888  || C->lhs[i][2] != k ) break;
4889  C->lhs[i][2] = C->numlhs;
4890  to = i;
4891  }
4892  }
4893  i--;
4894  }
4895  return(error);
4896 }
4897 
4898 /*
4899  #] CoEndIf :
4900  #[ CoWhile :
4901 */
4902 
4903 int CoWhile(UBYTE *inp)
4904 {
4905  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
4906  WORD startnum = C->numlhs + 1;
4907  int error;
4908  AC.WhileLevel++;
4909  error = CoIf(inp);
4910  if ( C->numlhs > startnum && C->lhs[startnum][2] == C->numlhs
4911  && C->lhs[C->numlhs][0] == TYPEENDIF ) {
4912  C->lhs[C->numlhs][2] = startnum-1;
4913  AC.WhileLevel--;
4914  }
4915  else C->lhs[startnum][2] = startnum;
4916  return(error);
4917 }
4918 
4919 /*
4920  #] CoWhile :
4921  #[ CoEndWhile :
4922 */
4923 
4924 int CoEndWhile(UBYTE *inp)
4925 {
4926  int error = 0;
4927  WORD i;
4928  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
4929  if ( AC.WhileLevel <= 0 ) {
4930  MesPrint("&EndWhile statement without corresponding While"); return(1);
4931  }
4932  AC.WhileLevel--;
4933  i = C->Buffer[AC.IfStack[-1]];
4934  error = CoEndIf(inp);
4935  C->lhs[C->numlhs][2] = i - 1;
4936  return(error);
4937 }
4938 
4939 /*
4940  #] CoEndWhile :
4941  #[ DoFindLoop :
4942 
4943  Function,arguments=number,loopsize=number,outfun=function,include=index;
4944 */
4945 
4946 static char *messfind[] = {
4947  "Findloop(function,arguments=#,loopsize(=#|<#)[,include=index])"
4948  ,"Replaceloop,function,arguments=#,loopsize(=#|<#),outfun=function[,include=index]"
4949  };
4950 static WORD comfindloop[7] = { TYPEFINDLOOP,7,0,0,0,0,0 };
4951 
4952 int DoFindLoop(UBYTE *inp, int mode)
4953 {
4954  UBYTE *s, c;
4955  WORD funnum, nargs = 0, nloop = 0, indexnum = 0, outfun = 0;
4956  int type, aflag, lflag, indflag, outflag, error = 0, sym;
4957  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
4958  if ( ( s = SkipAName(inp) ) == 0 ) {
4959 syntax: MesPrint("&Proper syntax is:");
4960  MesPrint("%s",messfind[mode]);
4961  return(1);
4962  }
4963  c = *s; *s = 0;
4964  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&funnum,WITHAUTO) ) == NAMENOTFOUND )
4965  || type != CFUNCTION || ( ( sym = (functions[funnum].symmetric) & ~REVERSEORDER )
4966  != SYMMETRIC && sym != ANTISYMMETRIC ) ) {
4967  MesPrint("&%s should be a (anti)symmetric function or tensor",inp);
4968  }
4969  funnum += FUNCTION;
4970  *s = c; inp = s;
4971  aflag = lflag = indflag = outflag = 0;
4972  while ( *inp == ',' ) {
4973  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
4974  s = inp;
4975  if ( ( s = SkipAName(inp) ) == 0 ) goto syntax;
4976  c = *s; *s = 0;
4977  if ( StrICont(inp,(UBYTE *)"arguments") == 0 ) {
4978  if ( c != '=' ) goto syntax;
4979  *s++ = c;
4980  NeedNumber(nargs,s,syntax)
4981  aflag++;
4982  inp = s;
4983  }
4984  else if ( StrICont(inp,(UBYTE *)"loopsize") == 0 ) {
4985  if ( c != '=' && c != '<' ) goto syntax;
4986  *s++ = c;
4987  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
4988  NeedNumber(nloop,s,syntax)
4989  if ( nloop < 2 ) {
4990  MesPrint("&loopsize should be at least 2");
4991  error = 1;
4992  }
4993  if ( c == '<' ) nloop = -nloop;
4994  }
4995  else if ( tolower(*s) == 'a' && tolower(s[1]) == 'l'
4996  && tolower(s[2]) == 'l' && FG.cTable[s[3]] > 1 ) {
4997  nloop = -1; s += 3;
4998  if ( c != '=' ) goto syntax;
4999  }
5000  inp = s;
5001  lflag++;
5002  }
5003  else if ( StrICont(inp,(UBYTE *)"include") == 0 ) {
5004  if ( c != '=' ) goto syntax;
5005  *s++ = c;
5006  if ( ( inp = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) goto syntax;
5007  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
5008  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&indexnum,WITHAUTO) ) != CINDEX ) {
5009  MesPrint("&%s is not a proper index",s);
5010  error = 1;
5011  }
5012  else if ( indexnum < WILDOFFSET
5013  && indices[indexnum].dimension == 0 ) {
5014  MesPrint("&%s should be a summable index",s);
5015  error = 1;
5016  }
5017  indexnum += AM.OffsetIndex;
5018  *inp = c;
5019  indflag++;
5020  }
5021  else if ( StrICont(inp,(UBYTE *)"outfun") == 0 ) {
5022  if ( c != '=' ) goto syntax;
5023  *s++ = c;
5024  if ( ( inp = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) goto syntax;
5025  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
5026  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&outfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION ) {
5027  MesPrint("&%s is not a proper function or tensor",s);
5028  error = 1;
5029  }
5030  outfun += FUNCTION;
5031  outflag++;
5032  *inp = c;
5033  }
5034  else {
5035  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option in FindLoop or ReplaceLoop: %s",inp);
5036  *s = c; inp = s;
5037  while ( *inp && *inp != ',' ) inp++;
5038  }
5039  }
5040  if ( *inp != 0 && mode == REPLACELOOP ) goto syntax;
5041  if ( mode == FINDLOOP && outflag > 0 ) {
5042  MesPrint("&outflag option is illegal in FindLoop");
5043  error = 1;
5044  }
5045  if ( mode == REPLACELOOP && outflag == 0 ) goto syntax;
5046  if ( aflag == 0 || lflag == 0 ) goto syntax;
5047  comfindloop[3] = funnum;
5048  comfindloop[4] = nloop;
5049  comfindloop[5] = nargs;
5050  comfindloop[6] = outfun;
5051  comfindloop[1] = 7;
5052  if ( indflag ) {
5053  if ( mode == 0 ) comfindloop[2] = indexnum + 5;
5054  else comfindloop[2] = -indexnum - 5;
5055  }
5056  else comfindloop[2] = mode;
5057  AddNtoL(comfindloop[1],comfindloop);
5058  return(error);
5059 }
5060 
5061 /*
5062  #] DoFindLoop :
5063  #[ CoFindLoop :
5064 */
5065 
5066 int CoFindLoop(UBYTE *inp)
5067 { return(DoFindLoop(inp,FINDLOOP)); }
5068 
5069 /*
5070  #] CoFindLoop :
5071  #[ CoReplaceLoop :
5072 */
5073 
5074 int CoReplaceLoop(UBYTE *inp)
5075 { return(DoFindLoop(inp,REPLACELOOP)); }
5076 
5077 /*
5078  #] CoReplaceLoop :
5079  #[ CoFunPowers :
5080 */
5081 
5082 static UBYTE *FunPowOptions[] = {
5083  (UBYTE *)"nofunpowers"
5084  ,(UBYTE *)"commutingonly"
5085  ,(UBYTE *)"allfunpowers"
5086  };
5087 
5088 int CoFunPowers(UBYTE *inp)
5089 {
5090  UBYTE *option, c;
5091  int i, maxoptions = sizeof(FunPowOptions)/sizeof(UBYTE *);
5092  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
5093  option = inp;
5094  inp = SkipAName(inp); c = *inp; *inp = 0;
5095  for ( i = 0; i < maxoptions; i++ ) {
5096  if ( StrICont(option,FunPowOptions[i]) == 0 ) {
5097  if ( c ) {
5098  *inp = c;
5099  MesPrint("&Illegal FunPowers statement");
5100  return(1);
5101  }
5102  AC.funpowers = i;
5103  return(0);
5104  }
5105  }
5106  MesPrint("&Illegal option in FunPowers statement: %s",option);
5107  return(1);
5108 }
5109 
5110 /*
5111  #] CoFunPowers :
5112  #[ CoUnitTrace :
5113 */
5114 
5115 int CoUnitTrace(UBYTE *s)
5116 {
5117  WORD num;
5118  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
5119  ParseNumber(num,s)
5120  if ( *s != 0 ) {
5121 nogood: MesPrint("&Value of UnitTrace should be a (positive) number or a symbol");
5122  return(1);
5123  }
5124  AC.lUniTrace[0] = SNUMBER;
5125  AC.lUniTrace[2] = num;
5126  }
5127  else {
5128  if ( GetName(AC.varnames,s,&num,WITHAUTO) == CSYMBOL ) {
5129  AC.lUniTrace[0] = SYMBOL;
5130  AC.lUniTrace[2] = num;
5131  num = -num;
5132  }
5133  else goto nogood;
5134  s = SkipAName(s);
5135  if ( *s ) goto nogood;
5136  }
5137  AC.lUnitTrace = num;
5138  return(0);
5139 }
5140 
5141 /*
5142  #] CoUnitTrace :
5143  #[ CoTerm :
5144 
5145  Note: termstack holds the offset of the term statement in the compiler
5146  buffer. termsortstack holds the offset of the last sort statement
5147  (or the corresponding term statement)
5148 */
5149 
5150 int CoTerm(UBYTE *s)
5151 {
5152  GETIDENTITY
5153  WORD *w = AT.WorkPointer;
5154  int error = 0;
5155  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
5156  if ( *s ) {
5157  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for Term statement");
5158  return(1);
5159  }
5160  if ( AC.termlevel+1 >= AC.maxtermlevel ) {
5161  if ( AC.maxtermlevel <= 0 ) {
5162  AC.maxtermlevel = 20;
5163  AC.termstack = (LONG *)Malloc1(AC.maxtermlevel*sizeof(LONG),"termstack");
5164  AC.termsortstack = (LONG *)Malloc1(AC.maxtermlevel*sizeof(LONG),"termsortstack");
5165  AC.termsumcheck = (WORD *)Malloc1(AC.maxtermlevel*sizeof(WORD),"termsumcheck");
5166  }
5167  else {
5168  DoubleBuffer((void **)AC.termstack,(void **)AC.termstack+AC.maxtermlevel,
5169  sizeof(LONG),"doubling termstack");
5170  DoubleBuffer((void **)AC.termsortstack,
5171  (void **)AC.termsortstack+AC.maxtermlevel,
5172  sizeof(LONG),"doubling termsortstack");
5173  DoubleBuffer((void **)AC.termsumcheck,
5174  (void **)AC.termsumcheck+AC.maxtermlevel,
5175  sizeof(LONG),"doubling termsumcheck");
5176  AC.maxtermlevel *= 2;
5177  }
5178  }
5179  AC.termsumcheck[AC.termlevel] = NestingChecksum();
5180  AC.termstack[AC.termlevel] = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Pointer
5181  - cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer + 2;
5182  AC.termsortstack[AC.termlevel] = AC.termstack[AC.termlevel] + 1;
5183  AC.termlevel++;
5184  *w++ = TYPETERM;
5185  w++;
5186  *w++ = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs;
5187  *w++ = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs;
5188  AT.WorkPointer[1] = w - AT.WorkPointer;
5189  AddNtoL(AT.WorkPointer[1],AT.WorkPointer);
5190  return(error);
5191 }
5192 
5193 /*
5194  #] CoTerm :
5195  #[ CoEndTerm :
5196 */
5197 
5198 int CoEndTerm(UBYTE *s)
5199 {
5200  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
5201  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
5202  if ( *s ) {
5203  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for EndTerm statement");
5204  return(1);
5205  }
5206  if ( AC.termlevel <= 0 ) {
5207  MesPrint("&EndTerm without corresponding Argument statement");
5208  return(1);
5209  }
5210  AC.termlevel--;
5211  cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer[AC.termstack[AC.termlevel]] = C->numlhs;
5212  cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer[AC.termsortstack[AC.termlevel]] = C->numlhs;
5213  if ( AC.termsumcheck[AC.termlevel] != NestingChecksum() ) {
5214  MesNesting();
5215  return(1);
5216  }
5217  return(0);
5218 }
5219 
5220 /*
5221  #] CoEndTerm :
5222  #[ CoSort :
5223 */
5224 
5225 int CoSort(UBYTE *s)
5226 {
5227  GETIDENTITY
5228  WORD *w = AT.WorkPointer;
5229  int error = 0;
5230  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
5231  if ( *s ) {
5232  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for Sort statement");
5233  error = 1;
5234  }
5235  if ( AC.termlevel <= 0 ) {
5236  MesPrint("&The Sort statement can only be used inside a term environment");
5237  error = 1;
5238  }
5239  if ( error ) return(error);
5240  *w++ = TYPESORT;
5241  w++;
5242  w++;
5243  cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer[AC.termsortstack[AC.termlevel-1]] =
5244  *w = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs+1;
5245  w++;
5246  AC.termsortstack[AC.termlevel-1] = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Pointer
5247  - cbuf[AC.cbufnum].Buffer + 3;
5248  if ( AC.termsumcheck[AC.termlevel-1] != NestingChecksum() - 1 ) {
5249  MesNesting();
5250  return(1);
5251  }
5252  AT.WorkPointer[1] = w - AT.WorkPointer;
5253  AddNtoL(AT.WorkPointer[1],AT.WorkPointer);
5254  return(error);
5255 }
5256 
5257 /*
5258  #] CoSort :
5259  #[ CoPolyFun :
5260 
5261  Collect,functionname
5262 */
5263 
5264 int CoPolyFun(UBYTE *s)
5265 {
5266  GETIDENTITY
5267  WORD numfun;
5268  int type, error = 0;
5269  UBYTE *t;
5270  AR.PolyFun = AC.lPolyFun = 0;
5271  AR.PolyFunInv = AC.lPolyFunInv = 0;
5272  AR.PolyFunType = AC.lPolyFunType = 0;
5273  AR.PolyFunExp = AC.lPolyFunExp = 0;
5274  AR.PolyFunVar = AC.lPolyFunVar = 0;
5275  AR.PolyFunPow = AC.lPolyFunPow = 0;
5276  if ( *s == 0 ) { return(0); }
5277  t = SkipAName(s);
5278  if ( t == 0 || *t != 0 ) {
5279  MesPrint("&PolyFun statement needs a single commuting function for its argument");
5280  return(1);
5281  }
5282  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
5283  || ( functions[numfun].spec != 0 ) || ( functions[numfun].commute != 0 ) ) {
5284  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular commuting function",s);
5285  if ( type < 0 ) {
5286  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&numfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
5287  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
5288  }
5289  error = 1;
5290  }
5291  else {
5292  AR.PolyFun = AC.lPolyFun = numfun+FUNCTION;
5293  AR.PolyFunType = AC.lPolyFunType = 1;
5294  }
5295 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
5296  if ( mpfaux_ != 0 ) {
5297  MesPrint("&Simultaneous use of PolyFun and float_ is not allowed.");
5298  error = 1;
5299  }
5300 #endif
5301  return(error);
5302 }
5303 
5304 /*
5305  #] CoPolyFun :
5306  #[ CoPolyRatFun :
5307 
5308  PolyRatFun [,functionname[,functionname](option)]
5309 */
5310 
5311 int CoPolyRatFun(UBYTE *s)
5312 {
5313  GETIDENTITY
5314  WORD numfun;
5315  int type, error = 0;
5316  UBYTE *t, c;
5317  AR.PolyFun = AC.lPolyFun = 0;
5318  AR.PolyFunInv = AC.lPolyFunInv = 0;
5319  AR.PolyFunType = AC.lPolyFunType = 0;
5320  AR.PolyFunExp = AC.lPolyFunExp = 0;
5321  AR.PolyFunVar = AC.lPolyFunVar = 0;
5322  AR.PolyFunPow = AC.lPolyFunPow = 0;
5323  if ( *s == 0 ) return(error);
5324  t = SkipAName(s);
5325  if ( t == 0 ) goto NumErr;
5326  c = *t; *t = 0;
5327 #ifdef WITHFLOAT
5328  if ( mpfaux_ != 0 ) {
5329  MesPrint("&Simultaneous use of PolyFun and float_ is not allowed.");
5330  error = 1;
5331  }
5332 #endif
5333  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
5334  || ( functions[numfun].spec != 0 ) || ( functions[numfun].commute != 0 ) ) {
5335  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular commuting function",s);
5336  if ( type < 0 ) {
5337  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&numfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
5338  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
5339  }
5340  return(1);
5341  }
5342  AR.PolyFun = AC.lPolyFun = numfun+FUNCTION;
5343  AR.PolyFunInv = AC.lPolyFunInv = 0;
5344  AR.PolyFunType = AC.lPolyFunType = 2;
5345  AC.PolyRatFunChanged = 1;
5346  if ( c == 0 ) return(error);
5347  *t = c;
5348  if ( *t == '-' ) { AC.PolyRatFunChanged = 0; t++; }
5349  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5350  if ( *t == 0 ) return(error);
5351  if ( *t != '(' ) {
5352  s = t;
5353  t = SkipAName(s);
5354  if ( t == 0 ) goto NumErr;
5355  c = *t; *t = 0;
5356  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
5357  || ( functions[numfun].spec != 0 ) || ( functions[numfun].commute != 0 ) ) {
5358  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular commuting function",s);
5359  if ( type < 0 ) {
5360  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&numfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
5361  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
5362  }
5363  return(1);
5364  }
5365  AR.PolyFunInv = AC.lPolyFunInv = numfun+FUNCTION;
5366  if ( c == 0 ) return(error);
5367  *t = c;
5368  if ( *t == '-' ) { AC.PolyRatFunChanged = 0; t++; }
5369  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5370  if ( *t == 0 ) return(error);
5371  }
5372  if ( *t == '(' ) {
5373  t++;
5374  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5375 /*
5376  Next we need a keyword like
5377  (divergence,ep)
5378  (expand,ep,maxpow)
5379 */
5380  s = t;
5381  t = SkipAName(s);
5382  if ( t == 0 ) goto NumErr;
5383  c = *t; *t = 0;
5384  if ( ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"divergence") == 0 )
5385  || ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"finddivergence") == 0 ) ) {
5386  if ( c != ',' ) {
5387  MesPrint("&Illegal option field in PolyRatFun statement.");
5388  return(1);
5389  }
5390  *t = c;
5391  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5392  s = t;
5393  t = SkipAName(s);
5394  if ( t == 0 ) goto NumErr;
5395  c = *t; *t = 0;
5396  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&AC.lPolyFunVar,WITHAUTO) ) != CSYMBOL ) {
5397  MesPrint("&Illegal symbol %s in option field in PolyRatFun statement.",s);
5398  return(1);
5399  }
5400  *t = c;
5401  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5402  if ( *t != ')' ) {
5403  MesPrint("&Illegal termination of option in PolyRatFun statement.");
5404  return(1);
5405  }
5406  AR.PolyFunExp = AC.lPolyFunExp = 1;
5407  AR.PolyFunVar = AC.lPolyFunVar;
5408  symbols[AC.lPolyFunVar].minpower = -MAXPOWER;
5409  symbols[AC.lPolyFunVar].maxpower = MAXPOWER;
5410  }
5411  else if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"expand") == 0 ) {
5412  WORD x = 0, etype = 2;
5413  if ( c != ',' ) {
5414  MesPrint("&Illegal option field in PolyRatFun statement.");
5415  return(1);
5416  }
5417  *t = c;
5418  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5419  s = t;
5420  t = SkipAName(s);
5421  if ( t == 0 ) goto NumErr;
5422  c = *t; *t = 0;
5423  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&AC.lPolyFunVar,WITHAUTO) ) != CSYMBOL ) {
5424  MesPrint("&Illegal symbol %s in option field in PolyRatFun statement.",s);
5425  return(1);
5426  }
5427  *t = c;
5428  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5429  if ( *t > '9' || *t < '0' ) {
5430  MesPrint("&Illegal option field in PolyRatFun statement.");
5431  return(1);
5432  }
5433  while ( *t <= '9' && *t >= '0' ) x = 10*x + *t++ - '0';
5434  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5435  if ( *t != ')' ) {
5436  s = t;
5437  t = SkipAName(s);
5438  if ( t == 0 ) goto ParErr;
5439  c = *t; *t = 0;
5440  if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"fixed") == 0 ) {
5441  etype = 3;
5442  }
5443  else if ( StrICmp(s,(UBYTE *)"relative") == 0 ) {
5444  etype = 2;
5445  }
5446  else {
5447  MesPrint("&Illegal termination of option in PolyRatFun statement.");
5448  return(1);
5449  }
5450  *t = c;
5451  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5452  if ( *t != ')' ) {
5453  MesPrint("&Illegal termination of option in PolyRatFun statement.");
5454  return(1);
5455  }
5456  }
5457  AR.PolyFunExp = AC.lPolyFunExp = etype;
5458  AR.PolyFunVar = AC.lPolyFunVar;
5459  AR.PolyFunPow = AC.lPolyFunPow = x;
5460  symbols[AC.lPolyFunVar].minpower = -MAXPOWER;
5461  symbols[AC.lPolyFunVar].maxpower = MAXPOWER;
5462  }
5463  else {
5464 ParErr: MesPrint("&Illegal option %s in PolyRatFun statement.",s);
5465  return(1);
5466  }
5467  t++;
5468  while ( *t == ',' || *t == ' ' || *t == '\t' ) t++;
5469  if ( *t == 0 ) return(error);
5470  }
5471 NumErr:;
5472  MesPrint("&PolyRatFun statement needs one or two commuting function(s) for its argument(s)");
5473  return(1);
5474 }
5475 
5476 /*
5477  #] CoPolyRatFun :
5478  #[ CoMerge :
5479 */
5480 
5481 int CoMerge(UBYTE *inp)
5482 {
5483  UBYTE *s = inp;
5484  int type;
5485  WORD numfunc, option = 0;
5486  if ( tolower(s[0]) == 'o' && tolower(s[1]) == 'n' && tolower(s[2]) == 'c' &&
5487  tolower(s[3]) == 'e' && tolower(s[4]) == ',' ) {
5488  option = 1; s += 5;
5489  }
5490  else if ( tolower(s[0]) == 'a' && tolower(s[1]) == 'l' && tolower(s[2]) == 'l' &&
5491  tolower(s[3]) == ',' ) {
5492  option = 0; s += 4;
5493  }
5494  if ( *s == '$' ) {
5495  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.dollarnames,s+1,&numfunc,NOAUTO) ) == CDOLLAR )
5496  numfunc = -numfunc;
5497  else {
5498  MesPrint("&%s is undefined",s);
5499  numfunc = AddDollar(s+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
5500  return(1);
5501  }
5502 tests: s = SkipAName(s);
5503  if ( *s != 0 ) {
5504  MesPrint("&Merge/shuffle should have a single function or $variable for its argument");
5505  return(1);
5506  }
5507  }
5508  else if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfunc,WITHAUTO) ) == CFUNCTION ) {
5509  numfunc += FUNCTION;
5510  goto tests;
5511  }
5512  else if ( type != -1 ) {
5513  if ( type != CDUBIOUS ) {
5514  NameConflict(type,s);
5515  type = MakeDubious(AC.varnames,s,&numfunc);
5516  }
5517  return(1);
5518  }
5519  else {
5520  MesPrint("&%s is not a function",s);
5521  numfunc = AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1) + FUNCTION;
5522  return(1);
5523  }
5524  Add4Com(TYPEMERGE,numfunc,option);
5525  return(0);
5526 }
5527 
5528 /*
5529  #] CoMerge :
5530  #[ CoStuffle :
5531 
5532  Important for future options: The bit, given by 256 (bit 8) is reserved
5533  internally for keeping track of the sign in the number of Stuffle
5534  additions.
5535 */
5536 
5537 int CoStuffle(UBYTE *inp)
5538 {
5539  UBYTE *s = inp, *ss, c;
5540  int type;
5541  WORD numfunc, option = 0;
5542  if ( tolower(s[0]) == 'o' && tolower(s[1]) == 'n' && tolower(s[2]) == 'c' &&
5543  tolower(s[3]) == 'e' && tolower(s[4]) == ',' ) {
5544  option = 1; s += 5;
5545  }
5546  else if ( tolower(s[0]) == 'a' && tolower(s[1]) == 'l' && tolower(s[2]) == 'l' &&
5547  tolower(s[3]) == ',' ) {
5548  option = 0; s += 4;
5549  }
5550  ss = SkipAName(s);
5551  c = *ss; *ss = 0;
5552  if ( *s == '$' ) {
5553  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.dollarnames,s+1,&numfunc,NOAUTO) ) == CDOLLAR )
5554  numfunc = -numfunc;
5555  else {
5556  MesPrint("&%s is undefined",s);
5557  numfunc = AddDollar(s+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
5558  return(1);
5559  }
5560 tests: *ss = c;
5561  if ( *ss != '+' && *ss != '-' && ss[1] != 0 ) {
5562  MesPrint("&Stuffle should have a single function or $variable for its argument, followed by either + or -");
5563  return(1);
5564  }
5565  if ( *ss == '-' ) option += 2;
5566  }
5567  else if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfunc,WITHAUTO) ) == CFUNCTION ) {
5568  numfunc += FUNCTION;
5569  goto tests;
5570  }
5571  else if ( type != -1 ) {
5572  if ( type != CDUBIOUS ) {
5573  NameConflict(type,s);
5574  type = MakeDubious(AC.varnames,s,&numfunc);
5575  }
5576  return(1);
5577  }
5578  else {
5579  MesPrint("&%s is not a function",s);
5580  numfunc = AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1) + FUNCTION;
5581  return(1);
5582  }
5583  Add4Com(TYPESTUFFLE,numfunc,option);
5584  return(0);
5585 }
5586 
5587 /*
5588  #] CoStuffle :
5589  #[ CoProcessBucket :
5590 */
5591 
5592 int CoProcessBucket(UBYTE *s)
5593 {
5594  LONG x;
5595  while ( *s == ',' || *s == '=' ) s++;
5596  ParseNumber(x,s)
5597  if ( *s && *s != ' ' && *s != '\t' ) {
5598  MesPrint("&Numerical value expected for ProcessBucketSize");
5599  return(1);
5600  }
5601  AC.ProcessBucketSize = x;
5602  return(0);
5603 }
5604 
5605 /*
5606  #] CoProcessBucket :
5607  #[ CoThreadBucket :
5608 */
5609 
5610 int CoThreadBucket(UBYTE *s)
5611 {
5612  LONG x;
5613  while ( *s == ',' || *s == '=' ) s++;
5614  ParseNumber(x,s)
5615  if ( *s && *s != ' ' && *s != '\t' ) {
5616  MesPrint("&Numerical value expected for ThreadBucketSize");
5617  return(1);
5618  }
5619  if ( x <= 0 ) {
5620  Warning("Negative of zero value not allowed for ThreadBucketSize. Adjusted to 1.");
5621  x = 1;
5622  }
5623  AC.ThreadBucketSize = x;
5624 #ifdef WITHPTHREADS
5625  if ( AS.MultiThreaded ) MakeThreadBuckets(-1,1);
5626 #endif
5627  return(0);
5628 }
5629 
5630 /*
5631  #] CoThreadBucket :
5632  #[ DoArgPlode :
5633 
5634  Syntax: a list of functions.
5635  If the functions have an argument it must be a function.
5636  In the case f(g) we treat f(g(...)) with g any argument.
5637  (not yet implemented)
5638 */
5639 
5640 int DoArgPlode(UBYTE *s, int par)
5641 {
5642  GETIDENTITY
5643  WORD numfunc, type, error = 0, *w, n;
5644  UBYTE *t,c;
5645  int i;
5646  w = AT.WorkPointer;
5647  *w++ = par;
5648  w++;
5649  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
5650  while ( *s ) {
5651  if ( *s == '$' ) {
5652  MesPrint("&We don't do dollar variables yet in ArgImplode/ArgExplode");
5653  return(1);
5654  }
5655  t = s;
5656  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) return(1);
5657  c = *s; *s = 0;
5658  if ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,t,&numfunc,WITHAUTO) ) == CFUNCTION ) {
5659  numfunc += FUNCTION;
5660  }
5661  else if ( type != -1 ) {
5662  if ( type != CDUBIOUS ) {
5663  NameConflict(type,t);
5664  type = MakeDubious(AC.varnames,t,&numfunc);
5665  }
5666  error = 1;
5667  }
5668  else {
5669  MesPrint("&%s is not a function",t);
5670  numfunc = AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1) + FUNCTION;
5671  return(1);
5672  }
5673  *s = c;
5674  *w++ = numfunc;
5675  *w++ = FUNHEAD;
5676 #if FUNHEAD > 2
5677  for ( i = 2; i < FUNHEAD; i++ ) *w++ = 0;
5678 #endif
5679  if ( *s && *s != ',' ) {
5680  MesPrint("&Illegal character in ArgImplode/ArgExplode statement: %s",s);
5681  return(1);
5682  }
5683  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
5684  }
5685  n = w - AT.WorkPointer;
5686  AT.WorkPointer[1] = n;
5687  AddNtoL(n,AT.WorkPointer);
5688  return(error);
5689 }
5690 
5691 /*
5692  #] DoArgPlode :
5693  #[ CoArgExplode :
5694 */
5695 
5696 int CoArgExplode(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgPlode(s,TYPEARGEXPLODE)); }
5697 
5698 /*
5699  #] CoArgExplode :
5700  #[ CoArgImplode :
5701 */
5702 
5703 int CoArgImplode(UBYTE *s) { return(DoArgPlode(s,TYPEARGIMPLODE)); }
5704 
5705 /*
5706  #] CoArgImplode :
5707  #[ CoClearTable :
5708 */
5709 
5710 int CoClearTable(UBYTE *s)
5711 {
5712  UBYTE c, *t;
5713  int j, type, error = 0;
5714  WORD numfun;
5715  TABLES T, TT;
5716  if ( *s == 0 ) {
5717  MesPrint("&The ClearTable statement needs at least one (table) argument.");
5718  return(1);
5719  }
5720  while ( *s ) {
5721  t = s;
5722  s = SkipAName(s);
5723  c = *s; *s = 0;
5724  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,t,&numfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
5725  && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
5726 nofunc: MesPrint("&%s is not a table",t);
5727  error = 4;
5728  if ( type < 0 ) numfun = AddFunction(t,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
5729  *s = c;
5730  if ( *s == ',' ) s++;
5731  continue;
5732  }
5733 /*
5734  else if ( ( ( T = functions[numfun].tabl ) == 0 )
5735  || ( T->sparse == 0 ) ) goto nofunc;
5736 */
5737  else if ( ( T = functions[numfun].tabl ) == 0 ) goto nofunc;
5738  numfun += FUNCTION;
5739  *s = c;
5740  if ( *s == ',' ) s++;
5741 /*
5742  Now we clear the table.
5743 */
5744  if ( T->sparse ) {
5745  if ( T->boomlijst ) M_free(T->boomlijst,"TableTree");
5746  for (j = 0; j < T->buffersfill; j++ ) { /* was <= */
5747  finishcbuf(T->buffers[j]);
5748  }
5749  if ( T->buffers ) M_free(T->buffers,"Table buffers");
5750  finishcbuf(T->bufnum);
5751 
5752  T->boomlijst = 0;
5753  T->numtree = 0; T->rootnum = 0; T->MaxTreeSize = 0;
5754  T->boomlijst = 0;
5755  T->bufnum = inicbufs();
5756  T->bufferssize = 8;
5757  T->buffers = (WORD *)Malloc1(sizeof(WORD)*T->bufferssize,"Table buffers");
5758  T->buffersfill = 0;
5759  T->buffers[T->buffersfill++] = T->bufnum;
5760 
5761  T->totind = 0; /* At the moment there are this many */
5762  T->reserved = 0;
5763 
5764  ClearTableTree(T);
5765 
5766  if ( T->spare ) {
5767  if ( T->tablepointers ) M_free(T->tablepointers,"tablepointers");
5768  T->tablepointers = 0;
5769  TT = T->spare;
5770  if ( TT->tablepointers ) M_free(TT->tablepointers,"tablepointers");
5771  for (j = 0; j < TT->buffersfill; j++ ) {
5772  finishcbuf(TT->buffers[j]);
5773  }
5774  if ( TT->boomlijst ) M_free(TT->boomlijst,"TableTree");
5775  if ( TT->buffers )M_free(TT->buffers,"Table buffers");
5776  if ( TT->mm ) M_free(TT->mm,"tableminmax");
5777  if ( TT->flags ) M_free(TT->flags,"tableflags");
5778  M_free(TT,"table");
5779  SpareTable(T);
5780  }
5781  }
5782  else EmptyTable(T);
5783  }
5784  return(error);
5785 }
5786 
5787 /*
5788  #] CoClearTable :
5789  #[ CoDenominators :
5790 */
5791 
5792 int CoDenominators(UBYTE *s)
5793 {
5794  WORD numfun;
5795  int type;
5796  UBYTE *t = SkipAName(s), *t1;
5797  if ( t == 0 ) goto syntaxerror;
5798  t1 = t; while ( *t1 == ',' || *t1 == ' ' || *t1 == '\t' ) t1++;
5799  if ( *t1 ) goto syntaxerror;
5800  *t = 0;
5801  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,s,&numfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
5802  || ( functions[numfun].spec != 0 ) ) {
5803  if ( type < 0 ) {
5804  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&numfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
5805  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
5806  }
5807  goto syntaxerror;
5808  }
5809  Add3Com(TYPEDENOMINATORS,numfun+FUNCTION);
5810  return(0);
5811 syntaxerror:
5812  MesPrint("&Denominators statement needs one regular function for its argument");
5813  return(1);
5814 }
5815 
5816 /*
5817  #] CoDenominators :
5818  #[ CoDropCoefficient :
5819 */
5820 
5821 int CoDropCoefficient(UBYTE *s)
5822 {
5823  if ( *s == 0 ) {
5824  Add2Com(TYPEDROPCOEFFICIENT)
5825  return(0);
5826  }
5827  MesPrint("&Illegal argument in DropCoefficient statement: '%s'",s);
5828  return(1);
5829 }
5830 /*
5831  #] CoDropCoefficient :
5832  #[ CoDropSymbols :
5833 */
5834 
5835 int CoDropSymbols(UBYTE *s)
5836 {
5837  if ( *s == 0 ) {
5838  Add2Com(TYPEDROPSYMBOLS)
5839  return(0);
5840  }
5841  MesPrint("&Illegal argument in DropSymbols statement: '%s'",s);
5842  return(1);
5843 }
5844 /*
5845  #] CoDropSymbols :
5846  #[ CoToPolynomial :
5847 
5848  Converts the current term as much as possible to symbols.
5849  Keeps a list of all objects converted to symbols in AM.sbufnum.
5850  Note that this cannot be executed in parallel because we have only
5851  a single compiler buffer for this. Hence we switch on the noparallel
5852  module option.
5853 
5854  Option(s):
5855  OnlyFunctions [,name1][,name2][,...,namem];
5856 */
5857 
5858 int CoToPolynomial(UBYTE *inp)
5859 {
5860  int error = 0;
5861  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == ',' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
5862  if ( ( AC.topolynomialflag & ~TOPOLYNOMIALFLAG ) != 0 ) {
5863  MesPrint("&ToPolynomial statement and FactArg statement are not allowed in the same module");
5864  return(1);
5865  }
5866  if ( AO.OptimizeResult.code != NULL ) {
5867  MesPrint("&Using ToPolynomial statement when there are still optimization results active.");
5868  MesPrint("&Please use #ClearOptimize instruction first.");
5869  MesPrint("&This will loose the optimized expression.");
5870  return(1);
5871  }
5872  if ( *inp == 0 ) {
5873  Add3Com(TYPETOPOLYNOMIAL,DOALL)
5874  }
5875  else {
5876  int numargs = 0;
5877  WORD *funnums = 0, type, num;
5878  UBYTE *s, c;
5879  s = SkipAName(inp);
5880  if ( s == 0 ) return(1);
5881  c = *s; *s = 0;
5882  if ( StrICmp(inp,(UBYTE *)"onlyfunctions") ) {
5883  MesPrint("&Illegal option %s in ToPolynomial statement",inp);
5884  *s = c;
5885  return(1);
5886  }
5887  *s = c;
5888  inp = s;
5889  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == ',' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
5890  s = inp;
5891  while ( *s ) s++;
5892 /*
5893  Get definitely enough space for the numbers of the functions
5894 */
5895  funnums = (WORD *)Malloc1(((LONG)(s-inp)+3)*sizeof(WORD),"ToPlynomial");
5896  while ( *inp ) {
5897  s = SkipAName(inp);
5898  if ( s == 0 ) return(1);
5899  c = *s; *s = 0;
5900  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&num,WITHAUTO);
