5901  if ( type != CFUNCTION ) {
5902  MesPrint("&%s is not a function in ToPolynomial statement",inp);
5903  error = 1;
5904  }
5905  funnums[3+numargs++] = num+FUNCTION;
5906  *s = c;
5907  inp = s;
5908  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == ',' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
5909  }
5910  funnums[0] = TYPETOPOLYNOMIAL;
5911  funnums[1] = numargs+3;
5912  funnums[2] = ONLYFUNCTIONS;
5913 
5914  AddNtoL(numargs+3,funnums);
5915  if ( funnums ) M_free(funnums,"ToPolynomial");
5916  }
5917  AC.topolynomialflag |= TOPOLYNOMIALFLAG;
5918 #ifdef WITHMPI
5919  /* In ParFORM, ToPolynomial has to be executed on the master. */
5920  AC.mparallelflag |= NOPARALLEL_CONVPOLY;
5921 #endif
5922  return(error);
5923 }
5924 
5925 /*
5926  #] CoToPolynomial :
5927  #[ CoFromPolynomial :
5928 
5929  Converts the current term as much as possible back from extra symbols
5930  to their original values. Does not look inside functions.
5931 */
5932 
5933 int CoFromPolynomial(UBYTE *inp)
5934 {
5935  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == ',' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
5936  if ( *inp == 0 ) {
5937  if ( AO.OptimizeResult.code != NULL ) {
5938  MesPrint("&Using FromPolynomial statement when there are still optimization results active.");
5939  MesPrint("&Please use #ClearOptimize instruction first.");
5940  MesPrint("&This will loose the optimized expression.");
5941  return(1);
5942  }
5943  Add2Com(TYPEFROMPOLYNOMIAL)
5944  return(0);
5945  }
5946  MesPrint("&Illegal argument in FromPolynomial statement: '%s'",inp);
5947  return(1);
5948 }
5949 
5950 /*
5951  #] CoFromPolynomial :
5952  #[ CoArgToExtraSymbol :
5953 
5954  Converts the specified function arguments into extra symbols.
5955 
5956  Syntax: ArgToExtraSymbol [ToNumber] [<argument specifications>]
5957 */
5958 
5959 int CoArgToExtraSymbol(UBYTE *s)
5960 {
5961  CBUF *C = cbuf + AC.cbufnum;
5962  WORD *lhs;
5963 
5964  /* TODO: resolve interference with rational arithmetic. (#138) */
5965  if ( ( AC.topolynomialflag & ~TOPOLYNOMIALFLAG ) != 0 ) {
5966  MesPrint("&ArgToExtraSymbol statement and FactArg statement are not allowed in the same module");
5967  return(1);
5968  }
5969  if ( AO.OptimizeResult.code != NULL ) {
5970  MesPrint("&Using ArgToExtraSymbol statement when there are still optimization results active.");
5971  MesPrint("&Please use #ClearOptimize instruction first.");
5972  MesPrint("&This will loose the optimized expression.");
5973  return(1);
5974  }
5975 
5976  SkipSpaces(&s);
5977  int tonumber = ConsumeOption(&s, "tonumber");
5978 
5979  int ret = DoArgument(s,TYPEARGTOEXTRASYMBOL);
5980  if ( ret ) return(ret);
5981 
5982  /*
5983  * The "scale" parameter is unused. Instead, we put the "tonumber"
5984  * parameter.
5985  */
5986  lhs = C->lhs[C->numlhs];
5987  if ( lhs[4] != 1 ) {
5988  Warning("scale parameter (^n) is ignored in ArgToExtraSymbol");
5989  }
5990  lhs[4] = tonumber;
5991 
5992  AC.topolynomialflag |= TOPOLYNOMIALFLAG; /* This flag is also used in ParFORM. */
5993 #ifdef WITHMPI
5994  /*
5995  * In ParFORM, the conversion to extra symbols has to be performed on
5996  * the master.
5997  */
5998  AC.mparallelflag |= NOPARALLEL_CONVPOLY;
5999 #endif
6000 
6001  return(0);
6002 }
6003 
6004 /*
6005  #] CoArgToExtraSymbol :
6006  #[ CoExtraSymbols :
6007 */
6008 
6009 int CoExtraSymbols(UBYTE *inp)
6010 {
6011  UBYTE *arg1, *arg2, c, *s;
6012  WORD i, j, type, number;
6013  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == ',' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
6014  if ( FG.cTable[*inp] != 0 ) {
6015  MesPrint("&Illegal argument in ExtraSymbols statement: '%s'",inp);
6016  return(1);
6017  }
6018  arg1 = inp;
6019  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 0 ) inp++;
6020  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
6021  if ( ( StrICmp(arg1,(UBYTE *)"array") == 0 )
6022  || ( StrICmp(arg1,(UBYTE *)"vector") == 0 ) ) {
6023  AC.extrasymbols = 1;
6024  }
6025  else if ( StrICmp(arg1,(UBYTE *)"underscore") == 0 ) {
6026  AC.extrasymbols = 0;
6027  }
6028 /*
6029  else if ( StrICmp(arg1,(UBYTE *)"nothing") == 0 ) {
6030  AC.extrasymbols = 2;
6031  }
6032 */
6033  else {
6034  MesPrint("&Illegal keyword in ExtraSymbols statement: '%s'",arg1);
6035  return(1);
6036  }
6037  *inp = c;
6038  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == ',' || *inp == '\t' ) inp++;
6039  if ( FG.cTable[*inp] != 0 ) {
6040  MesPrint("&Illegal argument in ExtraSymbols statement: '%s'",inp);
6041  return(1);
6042  }
6043  arg2 = inp;
6044  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] <= 1 ) inp++;
6045  if ( *inp != 0 ) {
6046  MesPrint("&Illegal end of ExtraSymbols statement: '%s'",inp);
6047  return(1);
6048  }
6049 /*
6050  Now check whether this object has been declared already.
6051  That would not be allowed.
6052 */
6053  if ( AC.extrasymbols == 1 ) {
6054  type = GetName(AC.varnames,arg2,&number,NOAUTO);
6055  if ( type != NAMENOTFOUND ) {
6056  MesPrint("&ExtraSymbols statement: '%s' has already been declared before",arg2);
6057  return(1);
6058  }
6059  }
6060  else if ( AC.extrasymbols == 0 ) {
6061  if ( *arg2 == 'N' ) {
6062  s = arg2+1;
6063  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) s++;
6064  if ( *s == 0 ) {
6065  MesPrint("&ExtraSymbols statement: '%s' creates conflicts with summed indices",arg2);
6066  return(1);
6067  }
6068  }
6069  }
6070  if ( AC.extrasym ) { M_free(AC.extrasym,"extrasym"); AC.extrasym = 0; }
6071  i = inp - arg2 + 1;
6072  AC.extrasym = (UBYTE *)Malloc1(i*sizeof(UBYTE),"extrasym");
6073  for ( j = 0; j < i; j++ ) AC.extrasym[j] = arg2[j];
6074  return(0);
6075 }
6076 
6077 /*
6078  #] CoExtraSymbols :
6079  #[ GetIfDollarFactor :
6080 */
6081 
6082 WORD *GetIfDollarFactor(UBYTE **inp, WORD *w)
6083 {
6084  LONG x;
6085  WORD number;
6086  UBYTE *name, c, *s;
6087  s = *inp;
6088  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
6089  x = 0;
6090  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
6091  x = 10*x + *s++ - '0';
6092  if ( x >= MAXPOSITIVE ) {
6093  MesPrint("&Value in dollar factor too large");
6094  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) s++;
6095  *inp = s;
6096  return(0);
6097  }
6098  }
6099  *w++ = IFDOLLAREXTRA;
6100  *w++ = 3;
6101  *w++ = -x-1;
6102  *inp = s;
6103  return(w);
6104  }
6105  if ( *s != '$' ) {
6106  MesPrint("&Factor indicator for $-variable should be a number or a $-variable.");
6107  return(0);
6108  }
6109  s++; name = s;
6110  while ( FG.cTable[*s] < 2 ) s++;
6111  c = *s; *s = 0;
6112  if ( GetName(AC.dollarnames,name,&number,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND ) {
6113  MesPrint("&dollar in if statement should have been defined previously");
6114  return(0);
6115  }
6116  *s = c;
6117  *w++ = IFDOLLAREXTRA;
6118  *w++ = 3;
6119  *w++ = number;
6120  if ( c == '[' ) {
6121  s++;
6122  *inp = s;
6123  if ( ( w = GetIfDollarFactor(inp,w) ) == 0 ) return(0);
6124  s = *inp;
6125  if ( *s != ']' ) {
6126  MesPrint("&unmatched [] in $ in if statement");
6127  return(0);
6128  }
6129  s++;
6130  *inp = s;
6131  }
6132  return(w);
6133 }
6134 
6135 /*
6136  #] GetIfDollarFactor :
6137  #[ GetDoParam :
6138 */
6139 
6140 UBYTE *GetDoParam(UBYTE *inp, WORD **wp, int par)
6141 {
6142  LONG x;
6143  WORD number;
6144  UBYTE *name, c;
6145  if ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 1 ) {
6146  x = 0;
6147  while ( *inp >= '0' && *inp <= '9' ) {
6148  x = 10*x + *inp++ - '0';
6149  if ( x > MAXPOSITIVE ) {
6150  if ( par == -1 ) {
6151  MesPrint("&Value in dollar factor too large");
6152  }
6153  else {
6154  MesPrint("&Value in do loop boundaries too large");
6155  }
6156  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] == 1 ) inp++;
6157  return(0);
6158  }
6159  }
6160  if ( par > 0 ) {
6161  *(*wp)++ = SNUMBER;
6162  *(*wp)++ = (WORD)x;
6163  }
6164  else {
6165  *(*wp)++ = DOLLAREXPR2;
6166  *(*wp)++ = -((WORD)x)-1;
6167  }
6168  return(inp);
6169  }
6170  if ( *inp != '$' ) {
6171  return(0);
6172  }
6173  inp++; name = inp;
6174  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] < 2 ) inp++;
6175  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
6176  if ( GetName(AC.dollarnames,name,&number,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND ) {
6177  if ( par == -1 ) {
6178  MesPrint("&dollar in print statement should have been defined previously");
6179  }
6180  else {
6181  MesPrint("&dollar in do loop boundaries should have been defined previously");
6182  }
6183  return(0);
6184  }
6185  *inp = c;
6186  if ( par > 0 ) {
6187  *(*wp)++ = DOLLAREXPRESSION;
6188  *(*wp)++ = number;
6189  }
6190  else {
6191  *(*wp)++ = DOLLAREXPR2;
6192  *(*wp)++ = number;
6193  }
6194  if ( c == '[' ) {
6195  inp++;
6196  inp = GetDoParam(inp,wp,0);
6197  if ( inp == 0 ) return(0);
6198  if ( *inp != ']' ) {
6199  if ( par == -1 ) {
6200  MesPrint("&unmatched [] in $ in print statement");
6201  }
6202  else {
6203  MesPrint("&unmatched [] in do loop boundaries");
6204  }
6205  return(0);
6206  }
6207  inp++;
6208  }
6209  return(inp);
6210 }
6211 
6212 /*
6213  #] GetDoParam :
6214  #[ CoDo :
6215 */
6216 
6217 int CoDo(UBYTE *inp)
6218 {
6219  GETIDENTITY
6220  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
6221  WORD *w, numparam;
6222  int error = 0, i;
6223  UBYTE *name, c;
6224  if ( AC.doloopstack == 0 ) {
6225  AC.doloopstacksize = 20;
6226  AC.doloopstack = (WORD *)Malloc1(AC.doloopstacksize*2*sizeof(WORD),"doloop stack");
6227  AC.doloopnest = AC.doloopstack + AC.doloopstacksize;
6228  }
6229  if ( AC.dolooplevel >= AC.doloopstacksize ) {
6230  WORD *newstack, *newnest, newsize;
6231  newsize = AC.doloopstacksize * 2;
6232  newstack = (WORD *)Malloc1(newsize*2*sizeof(WORD),"doloop stack");
6233  newnest = newstack + newsize;
6234  for ( i = 0; i < newsize; i++ ) {
6235  newstack[i] = AC.doloopstack[i];
6236  newnest[i] = AC.doloopnest[i];
6237  }
6238  M_free(AC.doloopstack,"doloop stack");
6239  AC.doloopstack = newstack;
6240  AC.doloopnest = newnest;
6241  AC.doloopstacksize = newsize;
6242  }
6243  AC.doloopnest[AC.dolooplevel] = NestingChecksum();
6244 
6245  w = AT.WorkPointer;
6246  *w++ = TYPEDOLOOP;
6247  w++; /* Space for the length of the statement */
6248 /*
6249  Now the $loopvariable
6250 */
6251  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
6252  if ( *inp != '$' ) {
6253  error = 1;
6254  MesPrint("&do loop parameter should be a dollar variable");
6255  }
6256  else {
6257  inp++;
6258  name = inp;
6259  if ( FG.cTable[*inp] != 0 ) {
6260  error = 1;
6261  MesPrint("&illegal name for do loop parameter");
6262  }
6263  while ( FG.cTable[*inp] < 2 ) inp++;
6264  c = *inp; *inp = 0;
6265  if ( GetName(AC.dollarnames,name,&numparam,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND ) {
6266  numparam = AddDollar(name,DOLUNDEFINED,0,0);
6267  }
6268  *w++ = numparam;
6269  *inp = c;
6270  AddPotModdollar(numparam);
6271  }
6272  w++; /* space for the level of the enddo statement */
6273  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
6274  if ( *inp != '=' ) goto IllSyntax;
6275  inp++;
6276  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
6277 /*
6278  The start value
6279 */
6280  inp = GetDoParam(inp,&w,1);
6281  if ( inp == 0 || *inp != ',' ) goto IllSyntax;
6282  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
6283 /*
6284  The end value
6285 */
6286  inp = GetDoParam(inp,&w,1);
6287  if ( inp == 0 || ( *inp != 0 && *inp != ',' ) ) goto IllSyntax;
6288 /*
6289  The increment value
6290 */
6291  if ( *inp != ',' ) {
6292  if ( *inp == 0 ) { *w++ = SNUMBER; *w++ = 1; }
6293  else goto IllSyntax;
6294  }
6295  else {
6296  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
6297  inp = GetDoParam(inp,&w,1);
6298  }
6299  if ( inp == 0 || *inp != 0 ) goto IllSyntax;
6300  *w = 0;
6301  AT.WorkPointer[1] = w - AT.WorkPointer;
6302 /*
6303  Put away and set information for placing enddo information.
6304 */
6305  AddNtoL(AT.WorkPointer[1],AT.WorkPointer);
6306  AC.doloopstack[AC.dolooplevel++] = C->numlhs;
6307 
6308  return(error);
6309 
6310 IllSyntax:
6311  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for do statement");
6312  return(1);
6313 }
6314 
6315 /*
6316  #] CoDo :
6317  #[ CoEndDo :
6318 */
6319 
6320 int CoEndDo(UBYTE *inp)
6321 {
6322  CBUF *C = cbuf+AC.cbufnum;
6323  WORD scratch[3];
6324  while ( *inp == ',' ) inp++;
6325  if ( *inp ) {
6326  MesPrint("&Illegal syntax for EndDo statement");
6327  return(1);
6328  }
6329  if ( AC.dolooplevel <= 0 ) {
6330  MesPrint("&EndDo without corresponding Do statement");
6331  return(1);
6332  }
6333  AC.dolooplevel--;
6334  scratch[0] = TYPEENDDOLOOP;
6335  scratch[1] = 3;
6336  scratch[2] = AC.doloopstack[AC.dolooplevel];
6337  AddNtoL(3,scratch);
6338  cbuf[AC.cbufnum].lhs[AC.doloopstack[AC.dolooplevel]][3] = C->numlhs;
6339  if ( AC.doloopnest[AC.dolooplevel] != NestingChecksum() ) {
6340  MesNesting();
6341  return(1);
6342  }
6343  return(0);
6344 }
6345 
6346 /*
6347  #] CoEndDo :
6348  #[ CoFactDollar :
6349 */
6350 
6351 int CoFactDollar(UBYTE *inp)
6352 {
6353  WORD numdollar;
6354  if ( *inp == '$' ) {
6355  if ( GetName(AC.dollarnames,inp+1,&numdollar,NOAUTO) != CDOLLAR ) {
6356  MesPrint("&%s is undefined",inp);
6357  numdollar = AddDollar(inp+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
6358  return(1);
6359  }
6360  inp = SkipAName(inp+1);
6361  if ( *inp != 0 ) {
6362  MesPrint("&FactDollar should have a single $variable for its argument");
6363  return(1);
6364  }
6365  AddPotModdollar(numdollar);
6366  }
6367  else {
6368  MesPrint("&%s is not a $-variable",inp);
6369  return(1);
6370  }
6371  Add3Com(TYPEFACTOR,numdollar);
6372  return(0);
6373 }
6374 
6375 /*
6376  #] CoFactDollar :
6377  #[ CoFactorize :
6378 */
6379 
6380 int CoFactorize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoFactorize(s,1)); }
6381 
6382 /*
6383  #] CoFactorize :
6384  #[ CoNFactorize :
6385 */
6386 
6387 int CoNFactorize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoFactorize(s,0)); }
6388 
6389 /*
6390  #] CoNFactorize :
6391  #[ CoUnFactorize :
6392 */
6393 
6394 int CoUnFactorize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoFactorize(s,3)); }
6395 
6396 /*
6397  #] CoUnFactorize :
6398  #[ CoNUnFactorize :
6399 */
6400 
6401 int CoNUnFactorize(UBYTE *s) { return(DoFactorize(s,2)); }
6402 
6403 /*
6404  #] CoNUnFactorize :
6405  #[ DoFactorize :
6406 */
6407 
6408 int DoFactorize(UBYTE *s,int par)
6409 {
6410  EXPRESSIONS e;
6411  WORD i;
6412  WORD number;
6413  UBYTE *t, c;
6414  int error = 0, keepzeroflag = 0;
6415  if ( *s == '(' ) {
6416  s++;
6417  while ( *s != ')' && *s ) {
6418  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) {
6419  t = s; while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
6420  c = *s; *s = 0;
6421  if ( StrICmp((UBYTE *)"keepzero",t) == 0 ) {
6422  keepzeroflag = 1;
6423  }
6424  else {
6425  MesPrint("&Illegal option in [N][Un]Factorize statement: %s",t);
6426  error = 1;
6427  }
6428  *s = c;
6429  }
6430  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
6431  if ( *s && *s != ')' && FG.cTable[*s] != 0 ) {
6432  MesPrint("&Illegal character in option field of [N][Un]Factorize statement");
6433  error = 1;
6434  return(error);
6435  }
6436  }
6437  if ( *s ) s++;
6438  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
6439  }
6440  if ( *s == 0 ) {
6441  for ( i = NumExpressions-1; i >= 0; i-- ) {
6442  e = Expressions+i;
6443  if ( e->replace >= 0 ) {
6444  e = Expressions + e->replace;
6445  }
6446  if ( e->status == LOCALEXPRESSION || e->status == GLOBALEXPRESSION
6447  || e->status == UNHIDELEXPRESSION || e->status == UNHIDEGEXPRESSION
6448  || e->status == INTOHIDELEXPRESSION || e->status == INTOHIDEGEXPRESSION
6449  ) {
6450  switch ( par ) {
6451  case 0:
6452  e->vflags &= ~TOBEFACTORED;
6453  break;
6454  case 1:
6455  e->vflags |= TOBEFACTORED;
6456  e->vflags &= ~TOBEUNFACTORED;
6457  break;
6458  case 2:
6459  e->vflags &= ~TOBEUNFACTORED;
6460  break;
6461  case 3:
6462  e->vflags |= TOBEUNFACTORED;
6463  e->vflags &= ~TOBEFACTORED;
6464  break;
6465  }
6466  }
6467  if ( ( e->vflags & TOBEFACTORED ) != 0 ) {
6468  if ( keepzeroflag ) e->vflags |= KEEPZERO;
6469  else e->vflags &= ~KEEPZERO;
6470  }
6471  else e->vflags &= ~KEEPZERO;
6472  }
6473  }
6474  else {
6475  for(;;) { /* Look for a (comma separated) list of variables */
6476  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
6477  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
6478  if ( *s == '[' || FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) {
6479  t = s;
6480  if ( ( s = SkipAName(s) ) == 0 ) {
6481  MesPrint("&Improper name for an expression: '%s'",t);
6482  return(1);
6483  }
6484  c = *s; *s = 0;
6485  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,t,&number,NOAUTO) == CEXPRESSION ) {
6486  e = Expressions+number;
6487  if ( e->replace >= 0 ) {
6488  e = Expressions + e->replace;
6489  }
6490  if ( e->status == LOCALEXPRESSION || e->status == GLOBALEXPRESSION
6491  || e->status == UNHIDELEXPRESSION || e->status == UNHIDEGEXPRESSION
6492  || e->status == INTOHIDELEXPRESSION || e->status == INTOHIDEGEXPRESSION
6493  ) {
6494  switch ( par ) {
6495  case 0:
6496  e->vflags &= ~TOBEFACTORED;
6497  break;
6498  case 1:
6499  e->vflags |= TOBEFACTORED;
6500  e->vflags &= ~TOBEUNFACTORED;
6501  break;
6502  case 2:
6503  e->vflags &= ~TOBEUNFACTORED;
6504  break;
6505  case 3:
6506  e->vflags |= TOBEUNFACTORED;
6507  e->vflags &= ~TOBEFACTORED;
6508  break;
6509  }
6510  }
6511  if ( ( e->vflags & TOBEFACTORED ) != 0 ) {
6512  if ( keepzeroflag ) e->vflags |= KEEPZERO;
6513  else e->vflags &= ~KEEPZERO;
6514  }
6515  else e->vflags &= ~KEEPZERO;
6516  }
6517  else if ( GetName(AC.varnames,t,&number,NOAUTO) != NAMENOTFOUND ) {
6518  MesPrint("&%s is not an expression",t);
6519  error = 1;
6520  }
6521  *s = c;
6522  }
6523  else {
6524  MesPrint("&Illegal object in (N)Factorize statement");
6525  error = 1;
6526  while ( *s && *s != ',' ) s++;
6527  if ( *s == 0 ) break;
6528  }
6529  }
6530 
6531  }
6532  return(error);
6533 }
6534 
6535 /*
6536  #] DoFactorize :
6537  #[ CoOptimizeOption :
6538 
6539 */
6540 
6541 int CoOptimizeOption(UBYTE *s)
6542 {
6543  UBYTE *name, *t1, *t2, c1, c2, *value, *u;
6544  int error = 0, x;
6545  double d;
6546  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
6547  while ( *s ) {
6548  name = s; while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
6549  t1 = s; c1 = *t1;
6550  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
6551  if ( *s != '=' ) {
6552 correctuse:
6553  MesPrint("&Correct use in Format,Optimize statement is Optionname=value");
6554  error = 1;
6555  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' || *s == '=' ) s++;
6556  *t1 = c1;
6557  continue;
6558  }
6559  *t1 = 0;
6560  s++;
6561  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
6562  if ( *s == 0 ) goto correctuse;
6563  value = s;
6564  while ( FG.cTable[*s] <= 1 || *s=='.' || *s=='*' || *s == '(' || *s == ')' ) {
6565  if ( *s == '(' ) { SKIPBRA4(s) }
6566  s++;
6567  }
6568  t2 = s; c2 = *t2;
6569  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
6570  if ( *s && *s != ',' ) goto correctuse;
6571  if ( *s ) {
6572  s++;
6573  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
6574  }
6575  *t2 = 0;
6576 /*
6577  Now we have name=value with name and value zero terminated strings.
6578 */
6579  if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"horner") == 0 ) {
6580  if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"occurrence") == 0 ) {
6581  AO.Optimize.horner = O_OCCURRENCE;
6582  }
6583  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"mcts") == 0 ) {
6584  AO.Optimize.horner = O_MCTS;
6585  }
6586  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"sa") == 0 ) {
6587  AO.Optimize.horner = O_SIMULATED_ANNEALING;
6588  }
6589  else {
6590  AO.Optimize.horner = -1;
6591  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option value in Format,Optimize statement: %s=%s",name,value);
6592  error = 1;
6593  }
6594  }
6595  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"hornerdirection") == 0 ) {
6596  if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"forward") == 0 ) {
6597  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_FORWARD;
6598  }
6599  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"backward") == 0 ) {
6600  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_BACKWARD;
6601  }
6602  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"forwardorbackward") == 0 ) {
6603  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_FORWARDORBACKWARD;
6604  }
6605  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"forwardandbackward") == 0 ) {
6606  AO.Optimize.hornerdirection = O_FORWARDANDBACKWARD;
6607  }
6608  else {
6609  AO.Optimize.method = -1;
6610  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option value in Format,Optimize statement: %s=%s",name,value);
6611  error = 1;
6612  }
6613  }
6614  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"method") == 0 ) {
6615  if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"none") == 0 ) {
6616  AO.Optimize.method = O_NONE;
6617  }
6618  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"cse") == 0 ) {
6619  AO.Optimize.method = O_CSE;
6620  }
6621  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"csegreedy") == 0 ) {
6622  AO.Optimize.method = O_CSEGREEDY;
6623  }
6624  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"greedy") == 0 ) {
6625  AO.Optimize.method = O_GREEDY;
6626  }
6627  else {
6628  AO.Optimize.method = -1;
6629  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option value in Format,Optimize statement: %s=%s",name,value);
6630  error = 1;
6631  }
6632  }
6633  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"timelimit") == 0 ) {
6634  x = 0;
6635  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6636  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6637  MesPrint("&Option TimeLimit in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6638  AO.Optimize.mctstimelimit = 0;
6639  AO.Optimize.greedytimelimit = 0;
6640  error = 1;
6641  }
6642  else {
6643  AO.Optimize.mctstimelimit = x/2;
6644  AO.Optimize.greedytimelimit = x/2;
6645  }
6646  }
6647  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"mctstimelimit") == 0 ) {
6648  x = 0;
6649  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6650  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6651  MesPrint("&Option MCTSTimeLimit in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6652  AO.Optimize.mctstimelimit = 0;
6653  error = 1;
6654  }
6655  else {
6656  AO.Optimize.mctstimelimit = x;
6657  }
6658  }
6659  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"mctsnumexpand") == 0 ) {
6660  int y;
6661  x = 0;
6662  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6663  if ( *u == '*' || *u == 'x' || *u == 'X' ) {
6664  u++; y = x;
6665  x = 0;
6666  while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6667  }
6668  else { y = 1; }
6669  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6670  MesPrint("&Option MCTSNumExpand in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6671  AO.Optimize.mctsnumexpand= 0;
6672  AO.Optimize.mctsnumrepeat= 1;
6673  error = 1;
6674  }
6675  else {
6676  AO.Optimize.mctsnumexpand= x;
6677  AO.Optimize.mctsnumrepeat= y;
6678  }
6679  }
6680  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"mctsnumrepeat") == 0 ) {
6681  x = 0;
6682  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6683  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6684  MesPrint("&Option MCTSNumExpand in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6685  AO.Optimize.mctsnumrepeat= 1;
6686  error = 1;
6687  }
6688  else {
6689  AO.Optimize.mctsnumrepeat= x;
6690  }
6691  }
6692  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"mctsnumkeep") == 0 ) {
6693  x = 0;
6694  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6695  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6696  MesPrint("&Option MCTSNumKeep in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6697  AO.Optimize.mctsnumkeep= 0;
6698  error = 1;
6699  }
6700  else {
6701  AO.Optimize.mctsnumkeep= x;
6702  }
6703  }
6704  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"mctsconstant") == 0 ) {
6705  d = 0;
6706  if ( sscanf ((char*)value, "%lf", &d) != 1 ) {
6707  MesPrint("&Option MCTSConstant in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6708  AO.Optimize.mctsconstant.fval = 0;
6709  error = 1;
6710  }
6711  else {
6712  AO.Optimize.mctsconstant.fval = d;
6713  }
6714  }
6715  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"greedytimelimit") == 0 ) {
6716  x = 0;
6717  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6718  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6719  MesPrint("&Option GreedyTimeLimit in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6720  AO.Optimize.greedytimelimit = 0;
6721  error = 1;
6722  }
6723  else {
6724  AO.Optimize.greedytimelimit = x;
6725  }
6726  }
6727  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"greedyminnum") == 0 ) {
6728  x = 0;
6729  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6730  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6731  MesPrint("&Option GreedyMinNum in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6732  AO.Optimize.greedyminnum= 0;
6733  error = 1;
6734  }
6735  else {
6736  AO.Optimize.greedyminnum= x;
6737  }
6738  }
6739  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"greedymaxperc") == 0 ) {
6740  x = 0;
6741  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6742  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6743  MesPrint("&Option GreedyMaxPerc in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6744  AO.Optimize.greedymaxperc= 0;
6745  error = 1;
6746  }
6747  else {
6748  AO.Optimize.greedymaxperc= x;
6749  }
6750  }
6751  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"stats") == 0 ) {
6752  if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"on") == 0 ) {
6753  AO.Optimize.printstats = 1;
6754  }
6755  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"off") == 0 ) {
6756  AO.Optimize.printstats = 0;
6757  }
6758  else {
6759  AO.Optimize.printstats = 0;
6760  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option value in Format,Optimize statement: %s=%s",name,value);
6761  error = 1;
6762  }
6763  }
6764  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"printscheme") == 0 ) {
6765  if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"on") == 0 ) {
6766  AO.Optimize.schemeflags |= 1;
6767  }
6768  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"off") == 0 ) {
6769  AO.Optimize.schemeflags &= ~1;
6770  }
6771  else {
6772  AO.Optimize.schemeflags &= ~1;
6773  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option value in Format,Optimize statement: %s=%s",name,value);
6774  error = 1;
6775  }
6776  }
6777  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"debugflag") == 0 ) {
6778 /*
6779  This option is for debugging purposes only. Not in the manual!
6780  0x1: Print statements in reverse order.
6781  0x2: Print the scheme of the variables.
6782 */
6783  x = 0;
6784  u = value;
6785  if ( FG.cTable[*u] == 1 ) {
6786  while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6787  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6788  MesPrint("&Numerical value for DebugFlag in Format,Optimize statement should be a nonnegative number: %s",value);
6789  AO.Optimize.debugflags = 0;
6790  error = 1;
6791  }
6792  else {
6793  AO.Optimize.debugflags = x;
6794  }
6795  }
6796  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"on") == 0 ) {
6797  AO.Optimize.debugflags = 1;
6798  }
6799  else if ( StrICmp(value,(UBYTE *)"off") == 0 ) {
6800  AO.Optimize.debugflags = 0;
6801  }
6802  else {
6803  AO.Optimize.debugflags = 0;
6804  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option value in Format,Optimize statement: %s=%s",name,value);
6805  error = 1;
6806  }
6807  }
6808  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"scheme") == 0 ) {
6809  UBYTE *ss, *s1, c;
6810  WORD type, numsym;
6811  AO.schemenum = 0;
6812  u = value;
6813  if ( *u != '(' ) {
6814 noscheme:
6815  MesPrint("&Option Scheme in Format,Optimize statement should be an array of names or integers between (): %s",value);
6816  error = 1;
6817  break;
6818  }
6819  u++; ss = u;
6820  while ( *ss == ' ' || *ss == '\t' || *ss == ',' ) ss++;
6821  if ( FG.cTable[*ss] == 0 || *ss == '$' || *ss == '[' ) { /* Name */
6822  s1 = u; SKIPBRA3(s1)
6823  if ( *s1 != ')' ) goto noscheme;
6824  while ( ss < s1 ) { if ( *ss++ == ',' ) AO.schemenum++; }
6825  *ss++ = 0; while ( *ss == ' ' ) ss++;
6826  if ( *ss != 0 ) goto noscheme;
6827  ss = u;
6828  if ( AO.schemenum < 1 ) {
6829  MesPrint("&Option Scheme in Format,Optimize statement should have at least one name or number between ()");
6830  error = 1;
6831  break;
6832  }
6833  if ( AO.inscheme ) M_free(AO.inscheme,"Horner input scheme");
6834  AO.inscheme = (WORD *)Malloc1((AO.schemenum+1)*sizeof(WORD),"Horner input scheme");
6835  while ( *ss == ' ' || *ss == '\t' || *ss == ',' ) ss++;
6836  AO.schemenum = 0;
6837  for(;;) {
6838  if ( *ss == 0 ) break;
6839  s1 = ss; ss = SkipAName(s1); c = *ss; *ss = 0;
6840 
6841  if ( ss[-1] == '_' ) {
6842 /*
6843  Now AC.extrasym followed by a number and _
6844 */
6845  UBYTE *u1, *u2;
6846  u1 = s1; u2 = AC.extrasym;
6847  while ( *u1 == *u2 ) { u1++; u2++; }
6848  if ( *u2 == 0 ) { /* Good start */
6849  numsym = 0;
6850  while ( *u1 >= '0' && *u1 <= '9' ) numsym = 10*numsym + *u1++ - '0';
6851  if ( u1 != ss-1 || numsym == 0 || AC.extrasymbols != 0 ) {
6852  MesPrint("&Improper use of extra symbol in scheme format option");
6853  goto noscheme;
6854  }
6855  numsym = MAXVARIABLES-numsym;
6856  ss++;
6857  goto GotTheNumber;
6858  }
6859  }
6860  else if ( *s1 == '$' ) {
6861  GETIDENTITY
6862  int numdollar;
6863  if ( ( numdollar = GetDollar(s1+1) ) < 0 ) {
6864  MesPrint("&Undefined variable %s",s1);
6865  error = 5;
6866  }
6867  else if ( ( numsym = DolToSymbol(BHEAD numdollar) ) < 0 ) {
6868  MesPrint("&$%s does not evaluate to a symbol",s1);
6869  error = 5;
6870  }
6871  *ss = c;
6872  goto GotTheNumber;
6873  }
6874  else if ( c == '(' ) {
6875  if ( StrCmp(s1,AC.extrasym) == 0 ) {
6876  if ( (AC.extrasymbols&1) != 1 ) {
6877  MesPrint("&Improper use of extra symbol in scheme format option");
6878  goto noscheme;
6879  }
6880  *ss++ = c;
6881  numsym = 0;
6882  while ( *ss >= '0' && *ss <= '9' ) numsym = 10*numsym + *ss++ - '0';
6883  if ( *ss != ')' ) {
6884  MesPrint("&Extra symbol should have a number for its argument.");
6885  goto noscheme;
6886  }
6887  numsym = MAXVARIABLES-numsym;
6888  ss++;
6889  goto GotTheNumber;
6890  }
6891  }
6892  type = GetName(AC.varnames,s1,&numsym,WITHAUTO);
6893  if ( ( type != CSYMBOL ) && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
6894  MesPrint("&%s is not a symbol",s1);
6895  error = 4;
6896  if ( type < 0 ) numsym = AddSymbol(s1,-MAXPOWER,MAXPOWER,0,0);
6897  }
6898  *ss = c;
6899 GotTheNumber:
6900  AO.inscheme[AO.schemenum++] = numsym;
6901  while ( *ss == ' ' || *ss == '\t' || *ss == ',' ) ss++;
6902  }
6903  }
6904  }
6905  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"mctsdecaymode") == 0 ) {
6906  x = 0;
6907  u = value;
6908  if ( FG.cTable[*u] == 1 ) {
6909  while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6910  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6911  MesPrint("&Option MCTSDecayMode in Format,Optimize statement should be a nonnegative integer: %s",value);
6912  AO.Optimize.mctsdecaymode = 0;
6913  error = 1;
6914  }
6915  else {
6916  AO.Optimize.mctsdecaymode = x;
6917  }
6918  }
6919  else {
6920  AO.Optimize.mctsdecaymode = 0;
6921  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option value in Format,Optimize statement: %s=%s",name,value);
6922  error = 1;
6923  }
6924  }
6925  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"saiter") == 0 ) {
6926  x = 0;
6927  u = value; while ( *u >= '0' && *u <= '9' ) x = 10*x + *u++ - '0';
6928  if ( *u != 0 ) {
6929  MesPrint("&Option SAIter in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive integer: %s",value);
6930  AO.Optimize.saIter = 0;
6931  error = 1;
6932  }
6933  else {
6934  AO.Optimize.saIter= x;
6935  }
6936  }
6937  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"samaxt") == 0 ) {
6938  d = 0;
6939  if ( sscanf ((char*)value, "%lf", &d) != 1 ) {
6940  MesPrint("&Option SAMaxT in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6941  AO.Optimize.saMaxT.fval = 0;
6942  error = 1;
6943  }
6944  else {
6945  AO.Optimize.saMaxT.fval = d;
6946  }
6947  }
6948  else if ( StrICmp(name,(UBYTE *)"samint") == 0 ) {
6949  d = 0;
6950  if ( sscanf ((char*)value, "%lf", &d) != 1 ) {
6951  MesPrint("&Option SAMinT in Format,Optimize statement should be a positive number: %s",value);
6952  AO.Optimize.saMinT.fval = 0;
6953  error = 1;
6954  }
6955  else {
6956  AO.Optimize.saMinT.fval = d;
6957  }
6958  }
6959  else {
6960  MesPrint("&Unrecognized option name in Format,Optimize statement: %s",name);
6961  error = 1;
6962  }
6963  *t1 = c1; *t2 = c2;
6964  }
6965  return(error);
6966 }
6967 
6968 /*
6969  #] CoOptimizeOption :
6970  #[ DoPutInside :
6971 
6972  Syntax:
6973  PutIn[side],functionname[,brackets] -> par = 1
6974  AntiPutIn[side],functionname,antibrackets -> par = -1
6975 */
6976 
6977 int CoPutInside(UBYTE *inp) { return(DoPutInside(inp,1)); }
6978 int CoAntiPutInside(UBYTE *inp) { return(DoPutInside(inp,-1)); }
6979 
6980 int DoPutInside(UBYTE *inp, int par)
6981 {
6982  GETIDENTITY
6983  UBYTE *p, c;
6984  WORD *to, type, c1,c2,funnum, *WorkSave;
6985  int error = 0;
6986  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == '\t' || *inp == ',' ) inp++;
6987 /*
6988  First we need the name of a function. (Not a tensor or table!)
6989 */
6990  p = SkipAName(inp);
6991  if ( p == 0 ) return(1);
6992  c = *p; *p = 0;
6993  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&funnum,WITHAUTO);
6994  if ( type != CFUNCTION || functions[funnum].tabl != 0 || functions[funnum].spec ) {
6995  MesPrint("&PutInside/AntiPutInside expects a regular function for its first argument");
6996  MesPrint("&Argument is %s",inp);
6997  error = 1;
6998  }
6999  funnum += FUNCTION;
7000  *p = c;
7001  inp = p;
7002  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == '\t' || *inp == ',' ) inp++;
7003  if ( *inp == 0 ) {
7004  if ( par == 1 ) {
7005  WORD tocompiler[4];
7006  tocompiler[0] = TYPEPUTINSIDE;
7007  tocompiler[1] = 4;
7008  tocompiler[2] = 0;
7009  tocompiler[3] = funnum;
7010  AddNtoL(4,tocompiler);
7011  }
7012  else {
7013  MesPrint("&AntiPutInside needs inside information.");
7014  error = 1;
7015  }
7016  return(error);
7017  }
7018  WorkSave = to = AT.WorkPointer;
7019  *to++ = TYPEPUTINSIDE;
7020  *to++ = 4;
7021  *to++ = par;
7022  *to++ = funnum;
7023  to++;
7024  while ( *inp ) {
7025  while ( *inp == ' ' || *inp == '\t' || *inp == ',' ) inp++;
7026  if ( *inp == 0 ) break;
7027  p = SkipAName(inp);
7028  if ( p == 0 ) { error = 1; break; }
7029  c = *p; *p = 0;
7030  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c1,WITHAUTO);
7031  if ( c == '.' ) {
7032  if ( type == CVECTOR || type == CDUBIOUS ) {
7033  *p++ = c;
7034  inp = p;
7035  p = SkipAName(inp);
7036  if ( p == 0 ) return(1);
7037  c = *p; *p = 0;
7038  type = GetName(AC.varnames,inp,&c2,WITHAUTO);
7039  if ( type != CVECTOR && type != CDUBIOUS ) {
7040  MesPrint("&Not a vector in dotproduct in PutInside/AntiPutInside statement: %s",inp);
7041  error = 1;
7042  }
7043  else type = CDOTPRODUCT;
7044  }
7045  else {
7046  MesPrint("&Illegal use of . after %s in PutInside/AntiPutInside statement",inp);
7047  error = 1;
7048  *p = c; inp = p;
7049  continue;
7050  }
7051  }
7052  switch ( type ) {
7053  case CSYMBOL :
7054  *to++ = SYMBOL; *to++ = 4; *to++ = c1; *to++ = 1; break;
7055  case CVECTOR :
7056  *to++ = INDEX; *to++ = 3; *to++ = AM.OffsetVector + c1; break;
7057  case CFUNCTION :
7058  *to++ = c1+FUNCTION; *to++ = FUNHEAD; *to++ = 0;
7059  FILLFUN3(to)
7060  break;
7061  case CDOTPRODUCT :
7062  *to++ = DOTPRODUCT; *to++ = 5; *to++ = c1 + AM.OffsetVector;
7063  *to++ = c2 + AM.OffsetVector; *to++ = 1; break;
7064  case CDELTA :
7065  *to++ = DELTA; *to++ = 4; *to++ = EMPTYINDEX; *to++ = EMPTYINDEX; break;
7066  default :
7067  MesPrint("&Illegal variable request for %s in PutInside/AntiPutInside statement",inp);
7068  error = 1; break;
7069  }
7070  *p = c;
7071  inp = p;
7072  }
7073  *to++ = 1; *to++ = 1; *to++ = 3;
7074  AT.WorkPointer[1] = to - AT.WorkPointer;
7075  AT.WorkPointer[4] = AT.WorkPointer[1]-4;
7076  AT.WorkPointer = to;
7077  AC.BracketNormalize = 1;
7078  if ( Normalize(BHEAD WorkSave+4) ) { error = 1; }
7079  else {
7080  WorkSave[1] = WorkSave[4]+4;
7081  to = WorkSave + WorkSave[1] - 1;
7082  c1 = ABS(*to);
7083  WorkSave[1] -= c1;
7084  WorkSave[4] -= c1;
7085  AddNtoL(WorkSave[1],WorkSave);
7086  }
7087  AC.BracketNormalize = 0;
7088  AT.WorkPointer = WorkSave;
7089  return(error);
7090 }
7091 
7092 /*
7093  #] DoPutInside :
7094  #[ CoSwitch :
7095 
7096  Syntax: Switch $var;
7097  Be carefull with illegal nestings with repeat, if, while.
7098 */
7099 
7100 int CoSwitch(UBYTE *s)
7101 {
7102  WORD numdollar;
7103  SWITCH *sw;
7104  if ( *s == '$' ) {
7105  if ( GetName(AC.dollarnames,s+1,&numdollar,NOAUTO) != CDOLLAR ) {
7106  MesPrint("&%s is undefined in switch statement",s);
7107  numdollar = AddDollar(s+1,DOLINDEX,&one,1);
7108  return(1);
7109  }
7110  s = SkipAName(s+1);
7111  if ( *s != 0 ) {
7112  MesPrint("&Switch should have a single $variable for its argument");
7113  return(1);
7114  }
7115 /* AddPotModdollar(numdollar); */
7116  }
7117  else {
7118  MesPrint("&%s is not a $-variable in switch statement",s);
7119  return(1);
7120  }
7121 /*
7122  Now create the switch table. We will add to it each time we run
7123  into a new case. It will all be sorted out the moment we run into
7124  the endswitch statement.
7125 */
7126  AC.SwitchLevel++;
7127  if ( AC.SwitchInArray >= AC.MaxSwitch ) DoubleSwitchBuffers();
7128  AC.SwitchHeap[AC.SwitchLevel] = AC.SwitchInArray;
7129  sw = AC.SwitchArray + AC.SwitchInArray;
7130 
7131  sw->iflevel = AC.IfLevel;
7132  sw->whilelevel = AC.WhileLevel;
7133  sw->nestingsum = NestingChecksum();
7134 
7135  Add4Com(TYPESWITCH,numdollar,AC.SwitchInArray);
7136 
7137  AC.SwitchInArray++;
7138  return(0);
7139 }
7140 
7141 /*
7142  #] CoSwitch :
7143  #[ CoCase :
7144 */
7145 
7146 int CoCase(UBYTE *s)
7147 {
7148  SWITCH *sw = AC.SwitchArray + AC.SwitchHeap[AC.SwitchLevel];
7149  WORD x = 0, sign = 1;
7150  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
7151  SKIPBLANKS(s);
7152  while ( *s == '-' || *s == '+' ) {
7153  if ( *s == '-' ) sign = -sign;
7154  s++;
7155  }
7156  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) { x = 10*x + *s++ - '0'; }
7157  x = sign*x;
7158 
7159  if ( sw->iflevel != AC.IfLevel || sw->whilelevel != AC.WhileLevel
7160  || sw->nestingsum != NestingChecksum() ) {
7161  MesPrint("&Illegal nesting of switch/case/default with if/while/repeat/loop/argument/term/...");
7162  return(-1);
7163  }
7164 /*
7165  Now add a case to the table with the current 'address'.
7166 */
7167  if ( sw->numcases >= sw->tablesize ) {
7168  int i;
7169  SWITCHTABLE *newtable;
7170  WORD newsize;
7171  if ( sw->tablesize == 0 ) newsize = 10;
7172  else newsize = 2*sw->tablesize;
7173  newtable = (SWITCHTABLE *)Malloc1(newsize*sizeof(SWITCHTABLE),"Switch table");
7174  if ( sw->table ) {
7175  for ( i = 0; i < sw->tablesize; i++ ) newtable[i] = sw->table[i];
7176  M_free(sw->table,"Switch table");
7177  }
7178  sw->table = newtable;
7179  sw->tablesize = newsize;
7180  }
7181  if ( sw->numcases == 0 ) { sw->mincase = sw->maxcase = x; }
7182  else if ( x > sw->maxcase ) sw->maxcase = x;
7183  else if ( x < sw->mincase ) sw->mincase = x;
7184  sw->table[sw->numcases].ncase = x;
7185  sw->table[sw->numcases].value = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs;
7186  sw->table[sw->numcases].compbuffer = AC.cbufnum;
7187  sw->numcases++;
7188  return(0);
7189 }
7190 
7191 /*
7192  #] CoCase :
7193  #[ CoBreak :
7194 */
7195 
7196 int CoBreak(UBYTE *s)
7197 {
7198 /*
7199  This involves a 'postponed' jump to the end. This can be done
7200  in a special routine during execution.
7201  That routine should also pop the switch level.
7202 */
7203  SWITCH *sw = AC.SwitchArray + AC.SwitchHeap[AC.SwitchLevel];
7204  if ( sw->iflevel != AC.IfLevel || sw->whilelevel != AC.WhileLevel
7205  || sw->nestingsum != NestingChecksum() ) {
7206  MesPrint("&Illegal nesting of switch/case/default with if/while/repeat/loop/argument/term/...");
7207  return(-1);
7208  }
7209  if ( *s ) {
7210  MesPrint("&No parameters allowed in Break statement");
7211  return(-1);
7212  }
7213  Add3Com(TYPEENDSWITCH,AC.SwitchHeap[AC.SwitchLevel]);
7214  return(0);
7215 }
7216 
7217 /*
7218  #] CoBreak :
7219  #[ CoDefault :
7220 */
7221 
7222 int CoDefault(UBYTE *s)
7223 {
7224 /*
7225  A bit like case, except that the address gets stored directly in the
7226  SWITCH struct.
7227 */
7228  SWITCH *sw = AC.SwitchArray + AC.SwitchHeap[AC.SwitchLevel];
7229  if ( sw->iflevel != AC.IfLevel || sw->whilelevel != AC.WhileLevel
7230  || sw->nestingsum != NestingChecksum() ) {
7231  MesPrint("&Illegal nesting of switch/case/default with if/while/repeat/loop/argument/term/...");
7232  return(-1);
7233  }
7234  if ( *s ) {
7235  MesPrint("&No parameters allowed in Default statement");
7236  return(-1);
7237  }
7238  sw->defaultcase.ncase = 0;
7239  sw->defaultcase.value = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs;
7240  sw->defaultcase.compbuffer = AC.cbufnum;
7241  return(0);
7242 }
7243 
7244 /*
7245  #] CoDefault :
7246  #[ CoEndSwitch :
7247 */
7248 
7249 int CoEndSwitch(UBYTE *s)
7250 {
7251 /*
7252  We store this address in the SWITCH struct.
7253  Next we sort the table by ncase.
7254  Then we decide whether the table is DENSE or SPARSE.
7255  If it is dense we change the allocation and spread the cases is necessary.
7256  Finally we pop levels.
7257 */
7258  SWITCH *sw = AC.SwitchArray + AC.SwitchHeap[AC.SwitchLevel];
7259  WORD i;
7260  WORD totcases = sw->maxcase-sw->mincase+1;
7261  while ( *s == ',' ) s++;
7262  SKIPBLANKS(s)
7263  if ( *s ) {
7264  MesPrint("&No parameters allowed in EndSwitch statement");
7265  return(-1);
7266  }
7267  if ( sw->iflevel != AC.IfLevel || sw->whilelevel != AC.WhileLevel
7268  || sw->nestingsum != NestingChecksum() ) {
7269  MesPrint("&Illegal nesting of switch/case/default with if/while/repeat/loop/argument/term/...");
7270  return(-1);
7271  }
7272  if ( sw->defaultcase.value == 0 ) CoDefault(s);
7273  if ( totcases > sw->numcases*AM.jumpratio ) { /* The factor is experimental */
7274  sw->caseoffset = 0;
7275  sw->typetable = SPARSETABLE;
7276 /*
7277  Now we need to sort sw->table
7278 */
7279  SwitchSplitMerge(sw->table,sw->numcases);
7280  }
7281  else { /* DENSE */
7282  SWITCHTABLE *ntable;
7283  sw->caseoffset = sw->mincase;
7284  sw->typetable = DENSETABLE;
7285  ntable = (SWITCHTABLE *)Malloc1(totcases*sizeof(SWITCHTABLE),"Switch table");
7286  for ( i = 0; i < totcases; i++ ) {
7287  ntable[i].ncase = i+sw->caseoffset;
7288  ntable[i].value = sw->defaultcase.value;
7289  ntable[i].compbuffer = sw->defaultcase.compbuffer;
7290  }
7291  for ( i = 0; i < sw->numcases; i++ ) {
7292  ntable[sw->table[i].ncase-sw->caseoffset] = sw->table[i];
7293  }
7294  M_free(sw->table,"Switch table");
7295  sw->table = ntable;
7296  sw->numcases = totcases;
7297  }
7298  sw->endswitch.ncase = 0;
7299  sw->endswitch.value = cbuf[AC.cbufnum].numlhs;
7300  sw->endswitch.compbuffer = AC.cbufnum;
7301  if ( sw->defaultcase.value == 0 ) {
7302  sw->defaultcase = sw->endswitch;
7303  }
7304  Add3Com(TYPEENDSWITCH,AC.SwitchHeap[AC.SwitchLevel]);
7305 /*
7306  Now we need to pop.
7307 */
7308  AC.SwitchLevel--;
7309  return(0);
7310 }
7311 
7312 /*
7313  #] CoEndSwitch :
7314  #[ CoSetUserFlag :
7315 */
7316 
7317 int CoSetUserFlag(UBYTE *s)
7318 {
7319  int error = 0;
7320  while ( *s && ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) ) s++;
7321  while ( *s && ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) ) {
7322  int x = 0;
7323  while ( *s && ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) ) x = 10*x+(*s++ - '0');
7324  if ( x < 1 || x > BITSINWORD ) {
7325  MesPrint("&Flag number %d outside the permitted range 1-%d.",BITSINWORD);
7326  error = 1;
7327  }
7328  else {
7329  Add3Com(TYPESETUSERFLAG,x-1);
7330  }
7331  while ( *s && ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) ) s++;
7332  }
7333  if ( *s ) {
7334  MesPrint("&Illegal character in SetUserFlag statement: %s",s);
7335  error = 1;
7336  }
7337  return(error);
7338 }
7339 
7340 /*
7341  #] CoSetUserFlag :
7342  #[ CoClearUserFlag :
7343 */
7344 
7345 int CoClearUserFlag(UBYTE *s)
7346 {
7347  int error = 0;
7348  while ( *s && ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) ) s++;
7349  while ( *s && ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) ) {
7350  int x = 0;
7351  while ( *s && ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) ) x = 10*x+(*s++ - '0');
7352  if ( x < 1 || x > BITSINWORD ) {
7353  MesPrint("&Flag number %d outside the permitted range 1-%d.",BITSINWORD);
7354  error = 1;
7355  }
7356  else {
7357  Add3Com(TYPECLEARUSERFLAG,x);
7358  }
7359  while ( *s && ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' || *s == '\t' ) ) s++;
7360  }
7361  if ( *s ) {
7362  MesPrint("&Illegal character in SetUserFlag statement: %s",s);
7363  error = 1;
7364  }
7365  return(error);
7366 }
7367 
7368 /*
7369  #] CoClearUserFlag :
7370  #[ CoCreateAllLoops :
7371 
7372  Syntax:
7373  CoCreateAllLoops,in-function,out-function,type-argument,ifnoloop;
7374  Types allowed:
7375  vector, index, symbol, snumber
7376  ifnoloop:
7377  ifnoloop=0 or ifnoloop=1
7378  in-function can be a tensor. In that case type can be only vector or index.
7379  out-function can be a tensor. In that case type can be only vector or index.
7380 */
7381 
7382 int CoCreateAllLoops(UBYTE *s)
7383 {
7384  GETIDENTITY
7385  UBYTE *inname, *outname, *stype, c;
7386  WORD infun, outfun, x, type, tensorflag, typenum;
7387  WORD *WorkSave, *to;
7388  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7389  inname = s; s = SkipAName(s);
7390  c = *s; *s = 0;
7391  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,inname,&infun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
7392  || ( ( functions[infun].spec != 0 ) && ( functions[infun].spec != TENSORFUNCTION ) ) ) {
7393  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular function or a tensor.",inname);
7394  if ( type < 0 ) {
7395  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&infun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
7396  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
7397  }
7398  return(1);
7399  }
7400  infun += FUNCTION;
7401  *s++ = c;
7402  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7403  outname = s; s = SkipAName(s);
7404  c = *s; *s = 0;
7405  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,outname,&outfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
7406  || ( ( functions[outfun].spec != 0 ) && ( functions[outfun].spec != TENSORFUNCTION ) ) ) {
7407  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular function or a tensor.",outname);
7408  if ( type < 0 ) {
7409  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&outfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
7410  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
7411  }
7412  return(1);
7413  }
7414  outfun += FUNCTION;
7415  *s++ = c;
7416  if ( functions[infun].spec == TENSORFUNCTION ||
7417  functions[outfun].spec == TENSORFUNCTION ) tensorflag = 1;
7418  else tensorflag = 0;
7419 /*
7420  Now the type: type=....
7421 */
7422  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7423  stype = s;
7424  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
7425  c = *s; *s = 0;
7426  if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"type") != 0 || c != '=' ) {
7427  MesPrint("&In CreateAllLoops statement: expected type=vartype.");
7428  return(1);
7429  }
7430  *s++ = c;
7431  stype = s;
7432  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
7433  c = *s; *s = 0;
7434  if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"vector") == 0 ) {
7435  typenum = -VECTOR;
7436  }
7437  else if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"index") == 0 ) {
7438  typenum = -INDEX;
7439  }
7440  else if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"symbol") == 0 ) {
7441  if ( tensorflag ) goto notintensor;
7442  typenum = -SYMBOL;
7443  }
7444  else if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"snumber") == 0 ) {
7445  if ( tensorflag ) goto notintensor;
7446  typenum = -SNUMBER;
7447  }
7448  else {
7449  MesPrint("&Unknown/not allowed variable type in CreateAllLoops: %s",stype);
7450  return(1);
7451  }
7452  *s = c;
7453  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7454 
7455  stype = s;
7456  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
7457  c = *s; *s = 0;
7458  if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"ifnoloop") != 0 || c != '=' ) {
7459  MesPrint("&Unrecognised option in CreateAllLoops statement: %s",stype);
7460  return(1);
7461  }
7462  *s++ = c;
7463  x = -1;
7464  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
7465  x = 0;
7466  do { x = 10*x + (*s++-'0'); } while (FG.cTable[*s] == 1);
7467  }
7468  if ( x != 0 && x != 1 ) {
7469  MesPrint("&Only options allowed for ifnoloop are 0 or 1.");
7470  return(1);
7471  }
7472  WorkSave = to = AT.WorkPointer;
7473  *to++ = TYPEALLLOOPS;
7474  *to++ = 6;
7475  *to++ = infun;
7476  *to++ = outfun;
7477  *to++ = typenum;
7478  *to++ = x;
7479 
7480  AddNtoL(WorkSave[1],WorkSave);
7481 
7482  return(0);
7483 notintensor:
7484  MesPrint("&Variable type not allowed in tensors: %s",stype);
7485  return(1);
7486 }
7487 
7488 /*
7489  #] CoCreateAllLoops :
7490  #[ CoCreateAllPaths :
7491 
7492  Syntax:
7493  CreateAllPaths,end-function,intermediate-function,out-function,type-argument,ifnopath;
7494  Types allowed:
7495  vector, index, symbol, snumber
7496  ifnoloop:
7497  ifnoloop=0 or ifnoloop=1
7498  in-function can be a tensor. In that case type can be only vector or index.
7499  out-function can be a tensor. In that case type can be only vector or index.
7500 */
7501 
7502 int CoCreateAllPaths(UBYTE *s)
7503 {
7504  GETIDENTITY
7505  UBYTE *endname,*inname, *outname, *stype, c;
7506  WORD endfun, infun, outfun, x, type, tensorflag, typenum;
7507  WORD *WorkSave, *to;
7508  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7509  endname = s; s = SkipAName(s);
7510  c = *s; *s = 0;
7511  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,endname,&endfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
7512  || ( ( functions[endfun].spec != 0 ) && ( functions[endfun].spec != TENSORFUNCTION ) ) ) {
7513  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular function or a tensor.",endname);
7514  if ( type < 0 ) {
7515  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&endfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
7516  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
7517  }
7518  return(1);
7519  }
7520  endfun += FUNCTION;
7521  *s++ = c;
7522  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7523  inname = s; s = SkipAName(s);
7524  c = *s; *s = 0;
7525  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,inname,&infun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
7526  || ( ( functions[infun].spec != 0 ) && ( functions[infun].spec != TENSORFUNCTION ) ) ) {
7527  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular function or a tensor.",inname);
7528  if ( type < 0 ) {
7529  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&infun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
7530  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
7531  }
7532  return(1);
7533  }
7534  infun += FUNCTION;
7535  *s++ = c;
7536  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7537  outname = s; s = SkipAName(s);
7538  c = *s; *s = 0;
7539  if ( ( ( type = GetName(AC.varnames,outname,&outfun,WITHAUTO) ) != CFUNCTION )
7540  || ( ( functions[outfun].spec != 0 ) && ( functions[outfun].spec != TENSORFUNCTION ) ) ) {
7541  MesPrint("&%s should be a regular function or a tensor.",outname);
7542  if ( type < 0 ) {
7543  if ( GetName(AC.exprnames,s,&outfun,NOAUTO) == NAMENOTFOUND )
7544  AddFunction(s,0,0,0,0,0,-1,-1);
7545  }
7546  return(1);
7547  }
7548  outfun += FUNCTION;
7549  *s++ = c;
7550  if ( functions[infun].spec == TENSORFUNCTION ||
7551  functions[outfun].spec == TENSORFUNCTION ) tensorflag = 1;
7552  else tensorflag = 0;
7553 /*
7554  Now the type: type=....
7555 */
7556  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7557  stype = s;
7558  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
7559  c = *s; *s = 0;
7560  if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"type") != 0 || c != '=' ) {
7561  MesPrint("&In CreateAllPaths statement: expected type=vartype.");
7562  return(1);
7563  }
7564  *s++ = c;
7565  stype = s;
7566  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
7567  c = *s; *s = 0;
7568  if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"vector") == 0 ) {
7569  typenum = -VECTOR;
7570  }
7571  else if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"index") == 0 ) {
7572  typenum = -INDEX;
7573  }
7574  else if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"symbol") == 0 ) {
7575  if ( tensorflag ) goto notintensor;
7576  typenum = -SYMBOL;
7577  }
7578  else if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"snumber") == 0 ) {
7579  if ( tensorflag ) goto notintensor;
7580  typenum = -SNUMBER;
7581  }
7582  else {
7583  MesPrint("&Unknown/not allowed variable type in CreateAllPaths: %s",stype);
7584  return(1);
7585  }
7586  *s = c;
7587  while ( *s == ',' || *s == ' ' ) s++;
7588 
7589  stype = s;
7590  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
7591  c = *s; *s = 0;
7592  if ( StrICmp(stype,(UBYTE *)"ifnopath") != 0 || c != '=' ) {
7593  MesPrint("&Unrecognised option in CreateAllPaths statement: %s",stype);
7594  return(1);
7595  }
7596  *s++ = c;
7597  x = -1;
7598  if ( FG.cTable[*s] == 1 ) {
7599  x = 0;
7600  do { x = 10*x + (*s++-'0'); } while (FG.cTable[*s] == 1);
7601  }
7602  if ( x != 0 && x != 1 ) {
7603  MesPrint("&Only options allowed for ifnopath are 0 or 1.");
7604  return(1);
7605  }
7606  WorkSave = to = AT.WorkPointer;
7607  *to++ = TYPEALLPATHS;
7608  *to++ = 7;
7609  *to++ = endfun;
7610  *to++ = infun;
7611  *to++ = outfun;
7612  *to++ = typenum;
7613  *to++ = x;
7614 
7615  AddNtoL(WorkSave[1],WorkSave);
7616 
7617  return(0);
7618 notintensor:
7619  MesPrint("&CreateAllPaths: Variable type not allowed in tensors: %s",stype);
7620  return(1);
7621 }
7622 
7623 /*
7624  #] CoCreateAllPaths :
7625  #[ CoCreateAll :
7626 
7627  Syntax: subkey, two or three functions, type, ifnone
7628 */
7629 
7630 int CoCreateAll(UBYTE *s)
7631 {
7632  UBYTE *subkey;
7633  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
7634  subkey = s;
7635  while ( FG.cTable[*s] == 0 ) s++;
7636  if ( *s != ' ' && *s != ',' && *s != '\t' ) {
7637  MesPrint("&Illegal subkey in CoCreate statement.");
7638  return(1);
7639  }
7640  /* c = *s; */ *s++ = 0;
7641  while ( *s == ' ' || *s == ',' || *s == '\t' ) s++;
7642  if ( StrICmp(subkey,(UBYTE *)"loops") == 0 ) {
7643  return(CoCreateAllLoops(s));
7644  }
7645  else if ( StrICmp(subkey,(UBYTE *)"paths") == 0 ) {
7646  return(CoCreateAllPaths(s));
7647  }
7648 /*
7649  else if ( StrICmp(subkey,(UBYTE *)"motics") == 0 ) {
7650  }
7651  else if ( StrICmp(subkey,(UBYTE *)"onepi") == 0 ) {
7652  }
7653  else if ( StrICmp(subkey,(UBYTE *)"cuts") == 0 ) {
7654  }
7655 */
7656  else {
7657  MesPrint("&Illegal subkey in CoCreate statement: %s.",subkey);
7658  return(1);
7659  }
7660 }
7661
